" _ enkaam _ nakmiigh lta _ apostle-kaghqameng _ tugu sqellug qu _ Judas-em _ qepghagh kaqsagh kanga _ . _ kina _ nakmike lteggu _ maligsaagh ikagh _ whangkunneng _ iglegha lgusigh aqe yamteggu _ Jesus _ . _ Tawantekaalghii _ ima _ John-em _ ungipagh ke llegh aneng _ paaptaaye llegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh ste llegh anun _ Jesus _ qilag mun _ . _ enkaam _ whangkunnun _ maligte te luni _ ungipagh li _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh gket _ maalghug _ yug k _ : _ Matthias-enkuk _ , _ Joseph _ Justus-enkuk _ , _ allameng _ ategh leg _ Barsabbas-meng _ .
taagken _ yughaghkagh t _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ simigh i stekaghqagh nge yug aqe ukut _ Judas-mun _ , _ qayughllak _ unite kanga _ qepghaqagh ni _ nekaghqagh minun _ aglagh lghii _ . _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh _ liisima kan _ . _ enkaam _ naligh _ nakmike zigu _ apostle-nguluku _ qepghaghtekaghqaq _ elpenun _ ? _ "
taagken _ maalghug _ uyghag k _ sa mun _ kanaghte lukek _ aghulasaqmegteggu _ aag llegh a _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ Matthias-nguftuq _ nakmikegkagh _ . _ enkaam _ ila tke aq _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-enun _ .
Pentecost-em _ aghnegh anun _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ ataasigh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ .
taagken _ nuuskagllagan _ anuqe ghllag stun _ sulug ghllag m _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ ukig luni _ i mi qaa _ mangteghagh _ .
taagken _ llangaqa _ ulusugnite ngugh t _ key- nghhagh at _ allgeghkagh t _ , _ esghapagkagh it _ ila meggnun _ nekeghqaallghiit _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ imeg iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ qamagte luki _ tawanlenguut _ . _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ akuzi stekagh i _ nakumiistun _ .
tamaa nguq _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ Jews-et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ . _ naken _ nuna neng _ tagi aqe luteng _ Jerusalem-eghmiingughquutkat _ .
nagaqugh te yameng _ sulug ghllag meng _ upleg tke ait _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte vig itnun _ . _ kaate yalghiimeng _ nakumiistun _ ugpeqagh t _ akuzite ghllagu ut _ repall _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ .
saghiigha yagute magh ita _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite lghiit _ galilee-kagh mii u ut _ .
naten _ ukut _ qamagte luta _ akuzillegh mtestun _ akuzi ut _ nallukngwaaghkagh meggneng _ ?
whaa _ whaantutut _ Parthia-ghmiit _ , _ Media-ghmiit _ , _ Elam-eghmiit _ , _ Mesopotamia-ghmiit _ , _ Judea-ghmiit _ , _ Cappadocia-ghmiit _ , _ Pontus-eghmiit _ , _ Asia-ghmiit _ ,
Phrygia-ghmiit _ , _ Pamphyllia-ghmiit _ , _ Egypt-eghmiit _ , _ Libya-ghmiit _ Cyrene-em _ tunganganeng _ pi t _ , _ Crete-eghmiit _ , _ Arabia-ghmiit _ , _ whaa _ whaante ut llu _ Rome-emeng _ laalighte aat _ Jews-et _ , _ Gentile-etlu _ maniguute kayug t _ Jews-estun _ . _ nagate aput _ akuzillegh mtestun _ ungipagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh ghllag aneng _ . _ "
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ saghiigha yagutekagh it llu _ kukriqe tkekagh it llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ellmeggneng _ aapqughwaaghutkat _ , _ " _ sa aqe aat _ ukut _ ? _ "
iwernga _ ila ita _ nenglaghyugsagh tke magh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ meghe ghllagu ut _ ! _ "
peter- llu _ tawanlenguq _ apostle-elgutmini _ . _ nekeve luni _ iglagtu luni _ yug t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ngnga _ .
meghe ghllagu ni ghngaaghpesikut _ meghe ghllagu nghite ukut _ nutaan qun _ 9-eklaakanga _ unaangu luku _ .
una _ whaten _ aneghte llegh _ Joel-em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ whaten _ :
' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh si _ , _ panig si _ uuknaliqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nukalpigagh si _ esghaghwaagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ nanevgagh si _ qavangugh yaghqaa ut _ .
talwa _ qepghaghtemnun _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ uuknaliqesqelluki _ .
yug nun _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke anka _ sa u aat _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ qilag mi llu _ nuna mi llu _ : _ aakwh _ , _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh ghllag _ ,
siqi i negh _ mamlegte yaghqagh _ , _ tanqigh _ kavighte yaghqagh _ aaw stun _ . _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ Atanghem _ nanqigtivigkagh a _ aghneq _ pi yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ aghneq _ taana _ kaate ste gpenaan _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ seghevute sqe lghii _ atanegh mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ Joel _ uuknaliqe kau uq _ .
" _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liisimakekagh i _ Nazareth-eghmii _ Jesus _ , _ uglagh pigte luku _ allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaalghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi stekaqe a _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ ellmi nun _ nakmike kaqe te ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisima llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ elpek si _ qaquuraghtestaghsi _ tamaakunun _ waakigalngughnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ , _ iteme te kaqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ asighqe te llegh aneng _ , _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ nuqneghpagningite kaqe a _ .
David-em _ akuzite kegka qaa _ Jesus _ whaten _ : _ ' _ esghagh aqe aqa _ atanegh _ sivu mnite luku _ quunpeng _ : _ unite igate aanga _ , _ enkaangam _ seghlegh mun _ qaprag snaanghite unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaame na ke _ quya ghllagu uq _ , _ akuzillegh nka _ quya lleg perewaagh meng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ghngaaghma _ sighimake naqe amken _ atanegh _ ,
qayughllak _ unite naanghite agken _ unguva sigh gka _ tuquma lghii ni _ , _ talwa _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh m _ yugusigh a _ aghu snaanghite an _ .
Apeghtuqaqaghpenga _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh meng _ , _ whangamnisimanginalleghpek _ quya ste ghllagu aanga _ . _ ' _ "
Peter-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ whateghlluwaaq _ apegh yug aqa _ sivunegh ut _ David _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ llivegh a llu _ naantulanga _ liisimakagh ut _ .
unguva u luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ kingunghen _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ yug gpeneng _ . _ ' _ David-em _ uuknaliqe i ste u te mineng _ liisimake kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ Christ-a _ tuquma lghiinite naanghite ni luku _ talwa _ yugusigh a _ aghu naanghite ni luku _ , _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Taananguuq _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ , _ tawaten _ quulvaqaqaa _ . _ akeqe llegh mitun _ Jesus _ , _ tuune kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ellnga nun _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ whangkunnun _ tuune ak _ . _ tamaakut _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ esghagh kesi _ , _ nagate kesi _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ pillghuut _ .
" _ David _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ Atanghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe ste lleg mnun _ anguyag ten _ . _ ' _ David _ mayugh ma ite u te mineng _ qilag mun _ Jesus-etun _ , _ ellmi neng _ akuzitkengngunghituq _ , _ akuzitkengngwaa _ Jesus _ .
" _ Ungipaataghllamsi _ qamagte lusi _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapestaaq _ nakmike kaqe a _ Jesus _ Atanghulukullu _ Christ-angulukullu _ . _ Taananguuq _ Jesus _ qaquuraghkagh i _ ! _ "
yug t _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh t _ enkaam _ peter- llu _ apostle-elgutangillu _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ sa naqe sta _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Avuteghqellusi _ , _ seghleghqennanighlusi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ paaptaayeteklu _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghevutellengesqelluki _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunute yakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh tekek _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ elpesi nun _ , _ kingunegh gpesinun _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ uyavaghpansaghngaan _ tuqlughkagh minun _ . _ "
Peter-em _ tawatenginaq _ pi gpenaki _ wata _ sa meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ pi ke ai _ . _ kelenga sagh uqagh i llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghletun _ pistet _ , _ enkaam _ ellngistun _ seghletun _ pi gpenasi _ luuraq _ elpek si llu _ aghyuughyaaghiisi _ . _ "
taagken _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ ungipagh aneng _ paaptaayekagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ 3,000 _ yuug _ ila tke aq _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ iiwleng _ qerngughte te u lghiit _ liite na luteng _ apostle-eneng _ . _ Christ-akun _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ kiyaghte aaghet _ , _ negh aqe lghiit _ , _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ .
Apostle-et _ uglagh ghngaan _ allaaghlluwhaghtikaalghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ saghiigha yug kau lghii _ , _ tallugh yagute kaqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ nagneqagh u lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ , _ saghya teng _ atunem _ atuqe luki _ .
akike luki _ nuna teng llu _ saghya teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ tuune aqe kangit _ sa meng _ aklu lghii nun _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ temple- mi _ . _ neghe lgute ngllagh aqe luki _ ila teng _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luki _ neqe teng _ upugha te sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ piniqe nigh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe manginagh aqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Atanghem _ yugulingukangi _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
taagken _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ aglaghkagh k _ temple- mun _ 3-klaagem _ yughagh te llegh ani _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ piyug igate ngughk _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ , _ aqume luni _ tungangakun _ Temple-em _ iteghvig ani _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ , _ pinighnagh lghii _ amig ghllag _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ kevegtugh aqe kangat _ tawavek _ naghughtaneng _ tungsigh naigh sqellug qu _ mani meng _ .
esghagh yamikek _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ itegh lghiik _ temple- mun _ tungsigh vike gkakek _ mani meng _ .
qerngagh egmek _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ tawavek _ , _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ukavek _ qiive i _ whangkutegnun _ . _ "
sighima pigte luni _ tuune aqe ni luni _ qiive gkakek _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Maniqraggiitngwaaghtunga _ iwernga _ sa meng _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ Nazareth-eghmiim _ , _ piyug i _ ! _ "
tugu luki _ aghenqignegh i _ iigge i _ nekevesimaluku _ yug m _ itegagh i llu _ tukughagh i llu _ iknaqughtekat _ ,
repall _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ nekevekagh _ aga _ piyug inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ . _ taagken _ maligte lukek _ iteghkagh _ temple- mun _ piyug magh mi _ , _ qetgegh qaghaqe luni _ , _ usuqe magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Temple-metullghiim _ esghaghkagh at _ piyug lghii _ , _ usuqe i lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
liisuqekagh at _ tungsighraghtenguyalghii _ aqume luni _ tungangani _ iteghvig an _ Temple-em _ . _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ esghagh yamegteggu _ yuug _ piyug lghii _ .
paninang _ naallghutekagh m _ yug m _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ qete nga ma lukek _ , _ yug lghute m _ saghiigha yug magh meng _ kangllu qaghtekagh it _ Solomon-em _ Porch-ngani _ .
Peter-em _ esghagh yamiki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ sangafsi _ saghiigha yug tsi _ ? _ sangamta _ esghapag uute ste kut _ ? _ Piyugtesneghitaghpung _ una _ yuug _ aghtughyaghqaanghillemtegnegun _ , _ nalighmeng _ pinigh te mtegneng _ . _ piyug igate ngugh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ ugpeqsaqminigu _ naallghute uq _ .
Abraham-enkut _ , _ Isaac-enkut _ , _ Jacob-enkut _ , _ sivunegh mta llu _ qamagte luteng _ manigugh qite te a _ kiyaghnegh m _ quulvaghaa _ Qepghaghteni _ Jesus _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ aglaatkaqaghsi _ pilate- mun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ , _ ighsakegkaqaghsillu _ Pilate-em _ iteme te yug aqe yagu _ .
yeghlegi _ pilate- mun _ yugte aghagh llegh ke aq _ itemutesqegkaqaghsi _ ighsake luku _ Jesus _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ , _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ tuqutestekaqaghsi _ unguvallegh m _ Allgeghvigpigaa _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Liisimakngwaaghaghpung _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaqaghkagh ung _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ enkaam _ apeghyaghqaqaghpung _ .
esghagh kesi _ una _ yuug _ nekevgha lghii _ sivu gpesini _ , _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ piyug igate yagh lghii u uq _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ . _ Iknaqughtekaaguq _ ugpeqe luku _ ategh a _ taam _ ataasigh m _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaan _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aa-a _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ Jesus-kun _ naallghutngwaaghaa _ , _ esghagh kesi _ maaten _ .
" _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ uuknaliqistetgun _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ-a _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu lleqe ni luku _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh at _ apeghiigh kau uq _ igleghte te i stekete te lghii ni _ tuqute ste aqe yafsigu _ Jesus _ , _ nalluke luku _ Christ-angutanga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avuteghqellusi _ , _ seghleghqennanighlusi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ugpeqe teggu _ atanegh _ enkaam _ sangigte lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atanghem _ nutaghte aqe naagh ai _ taghneghagh si _ , _ kayaggneqiglleqaallu _ Jesus _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ-anguluku _ elpesi nun _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ tagi vagilgami _ qilag mete yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghte llegh anun _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau uq _ neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistetgun _ aaftekagh mikun _ ellmi nun _ qepghaghtenguluki _ .
moses _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ , _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ Nagatngwaaghnakesi _ akuzillegh a _ qamagte luku _ .
tamaakut _ nagate nghite ngugh t _ uuknaliqistemun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ aafte luki _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ . _ '
" _ sa u a _ maana _ atugh ut _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ Samuel-em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ . _ Samuel-em _ kingu aneng _ ila ita llu _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqutqegkaqiit _ .
kingunegh ke aisi _ uuknaliqistet _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ akequsagh t _ ellngitgun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Abraham-emllu _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamiki _ sivunegh si _ Abraham-kun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ abraham _ , _ kingunegh gpegun _ quya ste lleqe anka _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ ' _ akequsagh _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u uq _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Qepghaghteni _ kayagte yuwhaagh kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ quya ste na lusi _ qamagte lusi _ tunute ste llegh mikun _ seghleghqe ma llegh gpesineng _ . _ "
Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ paninang _ ungipagh ma lukek _ Solomon-em _ Porch-ngani _ , _ priest-etlu _ umiileg at llu _ Temple-em _ kelengakistengita _ , _ Sadducees-etlu _ tagi laghate tke aat _ .
piyuke ma ite kangat _ apostle-ek _ apeghtuusagh ak _ yug nun _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ taam _ ipapighqegkanga _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ unguvallegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apostle-ek _ tugu lukek _ anusimingllaqagket _ . _ siingenllu _ unug naqe kanga _ unaaqusitkagket _ nanqigte gpenakek _ .
iwernga _ tamaa na _ ila a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nagatekagh _ Peter-enkugneng _ John-enkugneng _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ . _ Enkaangam _ yuggagh inagh t _ ugpeqagh t _ entaqun _ 5,000-ngughtekat _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ ilate gpenaki _ .
unaami ani _ Jerusalem-emi _ qerngughte tke aat _ Jews-et _ igleghutistengit _ , _ siivanllegh t _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ ,
High _ priest- a _ Annas _ , _ Caiaphas _ , _ John _ , _ alexander _ , _ ila i llu _ high _ priest-em _ ilakwaagh i _ .
taagken _ apostle-ek _ tagite ste lukek _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ kitum _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ yuug _ piyugte sag u te stegnegu _ ? _ kitum _ ategh a _ atuqe luku _ tawaten _ pi stek _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ , _ " _ Igleghutistenillu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ ,
aaptaghpesikung _ aneghneghte i lleg mtegneng _ , _ naten _ naallghute ma ta a _ piyug igate ngughk _ yuug _ .
Enkaangam _ liigike sug amsi _ qamagte lusi _ , _ ila i llu _ Israel-eghmiit _ qamagte luki _ naten _ una _ yuug _ naallghute kau ta a _ . _ naallghute kau uq _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ Nazareth-eghmiim _ . _ ellnga n _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghan _ naallghute kaqe a _ , _ elpek si _ qaquuraghkagh gpesi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ una _ yuug _ piyug igate yagh lghii _ whaa _ maaten _ nekevgha uq _ sivu gpesini _ .
Jesus-nguuq _ ukut _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ uyghag _ ighsakekagh i _ elpek si _ mangteghangllaghteni _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ nuna mun _ , _ ellnginaghhaaguq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ . _ alla _ naten _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ aataghakun _ Jesus-em _ . _ "
Jews-et _ agghistengita _ saghiighayagutkagket _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ tetug nghite llegh gkeneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kegket _ igaghyagh ma ite ngugh k _ . _ Liigiksaqmegtekek _ Jesus-metkaatmegneng _ tawaten _ akuzi u uk _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ naallghutngwaaghluni _ nekevgha lghii _ Peter-enkugni _ John-enkugni _ .
agghi vig meng _ agghistet _ aane stekagh it _ Peter-enkut _ John-enkut _ naagh llegh u tke aq llu _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit _ agghi te inagh u magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
Aapqughaaghutkat _ ellmeggneng _ , _ " _ naten _ pi naqe stekek _ yug k _ ? _ seghleghhalek _ ipa u ni naqagh ut _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghak _ , _ qayughllak _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake aat _ .
taawanginaq _ ineghte yagh kumtekek _ alla llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ Jesus _ pi sqellug qu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ wata _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nagaqugh na yu katgu _ . _ "
enkaam _ itegh ste lukek _ ineghtengngwaaqagket _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke fqaan _ Jesus _ pinakesek _ . _ "
iwernga _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Qaatkellamsii _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ ? _ naligh _ efqugh nagh a _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ? _ ataasiighte ki _ umyugagh si _ .
whangkutung _ akuzite kete nghmeng _ taaqnaanghitaghpung _ esghaghkagh ung llu _ nagaqughkagh ung llu _ . _ "
Agghistet _ aghyuughpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ usuqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun _ . _ enkaam _ temngi _ alingsequ lukek _ aanestekagket _ .
taana _ yuug _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka lghii _ , _ piyugpagningite yagh lghii _ iwernga _ maaten _ naallghute lghii _ .
Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ aanesistek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqaalgutmegnun _ . _ ungipagh ke ak _ chief _ priest-etlu _ siivanllegh t llu _ pillghitneng _ .
nagate lukek _ ataasiighte luteng _ yughaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ulima kaqe aten _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ megh _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ taakunilnguq _ , _ igleghte te u aten llu _ qamagte luki _ .
Ayumirugllak _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ akuzi kau uten _ sivunegh mteggun _ David-kun _ qepghaghtegpegun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sangan _ Gentile-et _ temngi _ sakrituteghllagtatkek _ Atanghenkuk _ Christ-akullghiik _ , _ sangan llu _ yug t _ seghletun _ piyug pigte atkek _ pipagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ ?
nuna m _ umiileg i llu _ igleghutistetlu _ qerngughte te luteng _ yataaghqe te ut _ pilluwaghnalukek _ Atanghenkuk _ Christ-akullghiik _ ! _ '
" _ ipapestaaq _ maani _ Jerusalem-emi _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ Herod-enkuk _ Pontius _ Pilate-enkuk _ ilate kau uk _ Gentile-enunllu _ Israel-eghmiinunllu _ kipullginaaghnaluku _ , _ Jesus _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Qepghaghten _ , _ nakmike gkan _ Christ-anguluku _ .
atanegh _ liisimakngwaaqenllu _ yataaghqe kaqe ken llu _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
nagate aqe aten _ maaten _ whaa _ alingsiqukanginkut _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luta _ . _ atanegh _ , _ iknaqughsaqaghtikut _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaamta _ ungipagh lta _ ungipagh gpeneng _ ,
whangkutgun _ naallghute ki _ qinuyuget _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghtistikutlu _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh qun _ Qepghaghtegpegun _ . _ "
yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ qerngughte te vig at _ mangteghagh _ ufsug tke aq _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ imeg iqe ai _ qamagte luki _ , _ enkaam _ tetug gpenateng _ ungipaghyag tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
Apostle-et _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelighllagluteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ghllagu kangi llu _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ataasigh stun _ lli aqe aat _ ilu megteggun llu _ unguva sigh megteggun llu _ . _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi igate ngughk _ saghya teng _ ellnginaghmeggnun _ pikniluki _ , _ atunem _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
nunaleg t _ , _ mangteghagh leg t _ akike nghmegteki _ nuna teng llu _ mangteghagh teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ apostle-enun _ tuune aqe kangit _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ sa meng _ aklu nghata _ manilitaqegkangit _ , _ tawaten _ kina _ alngunak _ aklu ma ite ngughk _ .
Joseph _ tawanlenguq _ , _ Cyprus-eghmii _ , _ Levi-em _ kingungha _ , _ ellnga n llu _ akike luku _ nuna ni _ tuunekagh a _ allgegh ta ni _ apostle-enun _ . _ Apostle-et _ ata iqe aat _ Barnabas-meng _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ kayeme sta _ . _ "
taawa nguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ Ananias _ , _ nulighh a _ sapphire _ . _ akikekagh a _ nalighnegh a _ nuna mi _ .
nuliigh mi _ liisima nghaani _ aksaqekagh a _ ila a _ mani m _ ellmi nun _ pi u luku _ . _ taana _ siipnegh ni _ tuunekagh a _ apostle-enun _ sumegh mini _ qamagte luku _ tuune i luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yeghlegi _ Peter-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ qaute kete zigu _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu llegh a _ iqlengiqesqelluten _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ aksaqe llegh gpegun _ ila a _ mani m _ ?
sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh ma ziin _ ? _ yug nun _ iqlengiqe nghite uten _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iqlengiqe uten _ . _ akike llghite luku _ nuna n _ elpek _ piksaghan _ , _ enkaam _ aki kaqe yavgu _ mani a llu _ taana _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi yaghqaqe yagh an _ . _ "
legan _ Ananias-em _ peter _ nagate luku _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh luteng _ qiipaghakun _ imeg te luku _ yugusigh a _ aane te luku _ llivegh ke aat _ . _ ungipagh _ Ananias-em _ iqlengiqe llegh a llu _ tuqu llegh a llu _ mingitekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nagaqugh tke aat _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
pi nga yu t _ aflu t _ atugh luki _ Ananias-em _ tuqu llegh aneng _ , _ nulighh a _ iteghkagh _ nalluke luku _ ugi ni _ samatagh nge a _ .
Peter-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ tawaten _ akitutka an _ akikestegneguu _ nuna ek _ ? _ " _ Sapphira-m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
Peter-em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ sa yaftek _ ugi ke te lghii gni _ sumeghtaghagh ma stek _ nanghiiqu na lukek _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh kek _ ? _ yug t _ llivegh ikagh t _ ugi gpeneng _ qakma _ manughagh mete ut _ . _ elpek llu _ tawaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ . _ "
Tawanighlluggiinaq _ ellnga llu _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sapphira- llu _ taawa _ tuquma lghii _ , _ enkaam _ aane te luku _ ugi an _ saaghw akun _ llivegh ke aat _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ nagaqugh te lghiit _ Ananias-enkuk _ Sapphira-nkuk _ tuqu llegh gkeneng _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
yug lghute t _ qungangitni _ apostle-et _ allaaghlluwhaghtighllagumanginaqat _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t llu _ apostle-etlu _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ Temple-em _ manughagh ani _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ Solomon-em _ Porch-ngani _ .
iwernga _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ Jesus-meng _ ilate igate ngugh t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qayughllak _ alingekanighaqelghiit _ , _ naqam _ pinigh na iqe kangit _ .
iwernga _ uglapiglleghiit _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe u kangat _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
Apostle-et _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghit _ apallugh ke luki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ qinuyugtiiteng _ allighagh itgun _ tagite luki _ tume tgun _ lli aqe kangit _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ qayughllak _ Peter-em _ naghughtekaki _ luuraq _ taghneghagh nge te llegh an _ naallghute na yu kaki _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
enkaam _ Jerusalem-emun _ qantaghanlengughneng _ nuna neng _ tagi laghate tke aq _ yug lghute _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Qinuyugtiitengllu _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ tagi tke ait _ apostle-enun _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tagi tke ait _ naallghute uute tke aat _ .
High _ priest-enkut _ ila ke te lghiit _ Sadducees-et _ aqina tke aat _ apostle-neng
enkaam _ tugu ste luki _ kanagh stekagh it _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ .
iwernga _ unug yan _ yaquleg an _ Atanghem _ qelpeghtekagh i _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig i _ . _ enkaam _ aane te luki _ apostle-et _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ aglagh lusi _ temple- mun _ , _ qamagte luku _ apegh teggu _ una _ nutaghagh _ kiyaghtaalleq _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ "
Apostle-et _ qaatkekagh at _ yaquleg _ . _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ itegh luteng _ temple- mun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ . _ High _ priest-enkut _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngughtekagh it _ Jews-et _ siivanllegh it llu _ qamagte luki llu _ agghistet _ , _ agghi te kete na luki _ apostle-et _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiilwaaghitnun _ aqfa stekagh it _ apostle-et _ .
iwernga _ umiileg u aaghet _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ apostle-et _ aviite ut _ . _ enkaam _ agghistenun _ aglagh luteng _ ungipagh tke ait _ ,
" _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiikut _ amig t _ maghqaqughwaaghngaftut _ , _ kelengakistetlu _ amignitu te ut _ naqam _ itegh yalghiikut _ paaghqite uq _ ! _ "
Temple-em _ kelengakistengita _ umiileg at llu _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ ungipaasisteng _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ samatagh nge i _ apostle-et _ .
taagken _ kitum _ itegh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taakut _ yug t _ anusimingllagh kaqsagh kesi _ inga _ temple- mi _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ . _ "
Kelengakistet _ umiileg ke te lghiit _ aqfakagh it _ apostle-et _ . _ seghletun _ pi ma ite kangit _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ yug neng _ Temple-melngughneng _ tuqunnayukangisteng _ milughpagaataghhiinaq _ .
tagite luki _ itghutekagh it _ agghistenun _ enkaam _ high _ priest-em _ pi ke ai _ apostle-et _ ,
" _ Ineghtengngwaaqaqsaghamsi _ allameng llu _ apeghtugh i fqaafsi _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ pisqellusi _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke ma nge itagh zikut _ ! _ yeghlegi _ allute luteng _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ liite aat _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ whangkuta llu _ avutngusnaqutkaghpekut _ Jesus-em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh tke ai _ apostle-et _ , _ " _ Qaatkesaghqaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luki _ yug t _ .
qaquuragh luku _ tuqutestekaqaghsi _ Jesus _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ quulvaghnaluku _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ nekegtekaqe a _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ . _ tawaten _ pika qaa _ Israel-eghmiit _ avuteghqesaghqaaghtesqelluki _ seghleghqennaniisqelluki _ , _ qiivesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
whangkuta _ ungipaghte u ukut _ tamaakunun _ pi llegh nun _ , _ maligte te luta _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh gkenun _ tamaakunun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
Agghistet _ sakritutkaalghiit _ Peter-em _ kiimsighyisteng _ tawaten _ , _ repall _ tuqute yu kaqe kangit _ apostle-et _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh _ agghi sta _ nekevekagh _ akuzi na luni _ . _ Gamaliel-nguftuq _ , _ Pharisee _ , _ apeghtughiste at _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh ita _ , _ elngaatall _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatkumtaagha _ . _ Kelengakistenun _ aane te aghte sqekagh i _ apostle-et _ .
taagken _ agghistelgutni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghmiilgutemni _ , _ piraamsi tete luki _ taakut _ yug t _ pi teki _ .
Neqamikenghistegguu _ qavnganghhaq _ Theudas _ pi kau lghii _ igleghte te ste ghllagu ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ 400 _ yuug _ maligsaagh ikagh _ ellnga neng _ . _ iwernga _ Theudas _ tuqute yatgu _ maligsaaghtengi _ qimagugh tke aat _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke sug ma ite kangat _ .
Taakwaningani _ Judas-llu _ galilee-kagh mii _ , _ qerngughte ikagh _ yugkagh meng _ kavema _ keste i ta iqe yan _ yug m _ uglaghtala aneng _ . _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ yug i _ mingite kau ut _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ sume mni _ itagnagh nayagh ukut _ sa fqiita _ qakemkut _ yug t _ pi yagh kumteki _ . _ Ellmeggneng _ pi u kumeng _ tawaten _ pillghat _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pilqegkagu _ aghula i aghte naanghite asi _ , _ kipullginaaghlleqaghsillu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ enkaam _ agghistet _ qaatkekagh at _ gamaliel _ .
taagken _ kelengakistenun _ itghute ste luki _ apostle-et _ kagsagmig stekagh it _ . _ Ineghtengngwaaqiitlu _ ungipagh ke nanigh sqellug qu _ Jesus _ . _ apeghiigh yamegteki _ aane stekagh it _ .
Apostle-et _ aanesisteng _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayngusaghagh te stekaqe kangi _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ temple- mi llu _ kinku ni llu _ ungipagh kaqe kangat _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe kangat _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-anguniluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ ugpeqagh t _ nula u luki _ Greek-stun _ akuzi kayug t _ Jews-et _ seghleghyugkagh t _ , _ Hebrew-stun _ akuzi kayug neng _ Jews-eneng _ , _ qayughllak _ ugingighaghtiiteng _ aklukegkiitneng _ tuunlaaghigalkangit _ . _ enkaam _ yiillgikagh it _ , _ " _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ uyegtistet _ palasqughhaan _ tuune aqe ait _ whangkuta _ ugingighagh put _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ , _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ anaggute lleqe ukut _ pegtekumteggu _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ uyegtistengughhnaluta _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nakmike teki _ maaghraghvinleg _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ imigh nga lghiit _ , _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ uyegte i ste ngllagh lleqe aput _ .
tawaten _ pi kumta _ whangkuta _ apostle-eni _ yughagh manginagh lleqe ukut _ , _ ungipagh ke i manginagh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ "
ugpeqagh t _ efqugh kekagh it _ apostle-et _ agghi llegh it _ . _ enkaam _ nakmikegkagh at _ stephen _ , _ elngaatall _ ugpeqe i nga ghllag _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nakmikegkagh it llu _ Philip-enkut _ , _ Prochorus-enkut _ , _ Nicanor-enkut _ , _ Timon-enkut _ , _ Parmenas-enkut _ , _ Nicolaus-llu _ gentile- a _ Antioch-eghmii _ Jews-estun _ manigugh u sag u tke aq _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ apostle-enun _ yughaatkesqelluki _ , _ naasqwitgun _ saafte luki _ yughagh tkekagh it _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ nula kau lghiit _ ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ priest-elghutetlu _ ila lghute it _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ maligte te luteng _ .
stephen _ kayusillegh leg ghllag u te mineng llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllagutminengllu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaq _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ , _ Cyrene-eghmiinguyalghiitlu _ , _ Alexandria-ghmiinguyalghiitlu _ aaghtiiraagh yaghtugh qu aat _ stephen _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ synagogue-ngita _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ iteme tke aat _ Qepghaghtelaaghet _ . _ " _ yug t _ Cilicia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu _ , _ Asia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu _ ila tke aat _ taakunun _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ peghqinegh pigte luku _ akuzi stekagh a _ repall _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ila i _ yug t _ aksaqe luku _ akileghtugh qu ait _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ whaten _ , _ " _ Nagatkaqaghput _ seghlequuqek _ Moses-enkuk _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ . _ "
siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ nagate luteng _ iqlengiqe llegh itneng _ sakritutkat _ . _ taagken _ aaghtiiraagh te luteng _ aglagh tke aat _ stephen _ agghistenun _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ agghistenun _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Stephen-em _ quunpeng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe a _ temple- a _ , _ liilightuusagh t llu _ Moses-em _ tuunekagh i _ whangkunnun _ .
Nagatkaqaghputlu _ pi lghii _ Jesus-emnguq _ Nazareth-eghmiim _ naafqe lleqe a _ temple- a _ , _ allangughte lleqe a llu nguq _ kiyaghtaalleghput _ Moses-em _ apeghtugh tke a _ whangkunnun _ . _ "
qamagte luteng _ tawanlenguut _ esghaghkagh at _ Stephen-em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute lghii _ yaquleg m _ gginagh atun _ .
taagken _ high _ priest-em _ aaptekagh a _ stephen _ , _ " _ ipa _ tawaten _ akuzi kau ziin _ ukut _ avutkistegpek _ apellghistun _ ? _ "
Stephen-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ , _ siivanllegh ni llu _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ ungipamsug te naqe amsi _ ! _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ salin _ Mesopotamia-melluku _ , _ nuugte llghite luku _ haran- mun _ , _ Nighughqengngalghiim _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh vike luku
pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ unite gu _ allgeghvig n _ nuna _ , _ ilakwaagh ten llu _ , _ aghulaqe i _ maghyaghqugh naagh amken _ . _ '
enkaam _ abraham _ aghulaqekagh _ Chaldea-meng _ , _ nuugtekagh _ haran- mun _ . _ ata a _ tuqu yan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ maghyaghqugh qu a _ abraham _ nuna mun _ maaten _ kiyaghfig gpesinun _ .
tagite yuwhaagh aqe yamigu _ natengiighhaq _ nunalisimangitaa _ ellnga nun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ talwa _ salin _ avaquti uute luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ una _ nuna _ ellnga nun llu _ kingunghanunllu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ whaten llu _ pika qaa _ , _ ' _ kingunegh ten _ aghulaqe yaghqaa ut _ nuna ke nghite ke meggnun _ enkaam _ nunatagh u lleqe ut _ . _ tamaani _ qepghaghtelaaghuyaghqaagutlu _ amyuqetagh tkesigh ghllag yaghqaa ut llu _ 400 _ ayumiqullegh lghute ni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuugh lleqe anka _ qepghaghtelaaghughtestilghiit _ . _ kingu aneng _ aghyuugh i llegh ma _ kingunegh ten _ tagi lleqe ut _ nuna mun _ akequsagh kekagh mnun _ , _ tamaani _ manigugh lleqe aatnga _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllaghkagh _ Abraham-emun _ nalluniigh tke sqellug qu _ circumcise-elleq _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ circumcise-ekaq _ . _ ighnegh nge yami _ Isaac-meng _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yagu _ circumcise-ekaa _ ellnga llu _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Isaac-em _ circumcise-ekaa _ ighnegh ni _ Jacob _ . _ Jacob-em _ circumcise-elaqii _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighnegh ni _ . _ taakut _ piinligh sigh ke ai _ ramke an _ Israel-em _ .
" _ angli laghate te luteng _ Jacob-em _ ighnegh ita _ aqinake pigtekagh at _ anglegutseng _ Joseph _ , _ enkaam _ akikekagh at _ Egypt-eghmiinun _ qepghaghtelaaghuluku _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh kekagh a _ ,
seghleliigh nghaani _ kayusigh aqe kanga _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellelitkaa _ enkaam _ Pharaoh-m _ umiileg an _ Egypt-em _ , _ efqugh ke luku _ umiilgataghaaghtestekaa _ Egypt-mun _ , _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a llu _ mangteghagh minun llu _ , _ qepghaghteminunllu _ .
taagken _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ Egypt-millu _ , _ Canaan-millu _ , _ elngaatall _ uglagh _ iyatagh iqe te ghllag ke aq _ . _ sivunegh put llu _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aat _ .
Jacob-em _ nagaqugh yamiki _ Egypt-eghmiit _ grain-meng _ kagpag ghllag ma ni luki _ , _ ighnegh ni _ pikengyaghtiisqegkii _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ alla _ pi yata _ , _ Joseph-em _ anengagh ni _ ungipagh tke ai _ ellngit nun _ uyughagh ke ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ Pharaoh-m _ anglegutkututangi _ liigikekagh i _ .
taagken _ Joseph-em _ lipeghsagh ke a _ ata ni _ Jacob _ , _ nengllugute lghutagh nge i llu _ nuugtesqelluki _ Egypt-mun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ 75-nguftut _ .
enkaam _ Jacob-enkut _ nuugtekagh t _ . _ tamaani _ Jacob _ tuqukagh _ , _ kingu aneng _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ ila i llu _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
Taakwaningani _ neghqwaagh it _ aglagh te luki _ Shechem-emun _ , _ llivegh nqigtekagh it _ nuna kun _ Abraham-em _ tukfighkagh akun _ Hamor-em _ kingunghaneng _ .
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ Abraham-emun _ akequsagh a _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ sivunegh put _ nula ghllagkagh t _ Egypt-mi _ .
taagken _ Egypt _ nutaghagh meng _ umiileg ngekagh _ , _ taam _ umiileg m _ nallukngwaagh kanga _ Joseph _ .
sivunegh mta _ nula ghllag llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ umiileg m _ peghqiniqe te luki _ ikfiqe stekagh i _ sivunegh put _ , _ talwa _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ aane te ste aqe luki _ pi ke ai _ tuqusqelluki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ moses _ allgeghkagh _ , _ yuukegtepiglleghii _ taghnughhagh _ . _ angayuqagh gkenka _ ne megteni _ iighaghtumeng _ aflengakekagh ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ .
iighaghtughpagningite te yamegnegu _ aane tke ak _ . _ umiileg m _ panig an _ naalkellug qu _ allughqi luku _ , _ angli stekagh a _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ .
Egypt-eghmiit _ apeghtugh qu aat _ liitekagh meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ moses _ peghqinghughighllagyalghiimi _ akuzillguughqaaghllakaq _ , _ aghtugh igate ngughk llu _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ moses _ 40 _ uksughtutkaligh yami _ Israel-eghmiilgutni _ esghagh yug luki _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ai _ .
tawani _ esgha qaa _ Egypt-eghmiim _ amyuutke kanga _ Israel-eghmii _ . _ enkaam _ Moses-em _ Israel-eghmii _ igugh luku _ tuqu tke a _ Egypt-eghmii _ .
tawani _ sumeghtaghagh kaayagh lghii _ Israel-eghmiilgutminun _ liigike lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagte lleg ni _ ellngit nun _ aghulaqe te i ste u luku _ Egypt-meng _ . _ iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ .
unaami ani _ esghagh kakek _ Israel-eghmiik _ pillugute lghiik _ . _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kek _ , _ ' _ pillugute gpenatek _ yug lgu tke te utek _ . _ '
yeghlegi _ amyuqetagh iqe lghii m _ yug m _ ayagaghte luku _ moses _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten _ , _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whangkunnun _ ?
whanga llu _ tuqute yug zinga _ ighivgaq _ tuqute llegh gpetun _ Egypt-eghmii _ ? _ '
yug m _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ moses _ qimagkagh _ Midian-mun _ , _ tamaani _ allaneghtagh ukagh _ . _ qenwat _ nulightugh luni _ ighnegh ngekagh _ maalghug gneng _ .
" _ moses _ , _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh _ Midian-metutkelluku _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqekagh _ Mount _ Sinai-em _ uvitanganun _ . _ tawani _ esgha qaa _ yaquleg _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
Allaaghlluwhaghyagutkaqegkanga _ . _ Kenqigtengngwaaghnaluku _ takukagh a _ , _ kaate yaghtugh aqe a llu _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh u unga _ , _ sivugh nghpek _ Abraham-enkut _ Isaac-enkut _ Jacob-enkut _ kiyaghnegh ke aatnga _ . _ ' _ moses _ alingruughkagh _ repall _ ungelegtekagh _ talwa _ esghagh yug ma nge i tke a _ .
Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kameg gken _ mataghte kek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ nekevgha vig n _ .
esghapag anka _ yug nka _ amyuutke kangit _ Egypt-mi _ , _ nagate anka _ ngillegte lghiit _ . _ ukig unga _ yugulinaluki _ Egypt-eghmiineng _ . _ enkaam _ whaa _ kayagte naqe amken _ Egypt-mun _ . _ '
" _ Taananguuq _ moses _ Israel-eghmiit _ ighsa kaqe yamegteggu _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten llu _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whangkunnun _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uteghnigh stekagh a _ Egypt-mun _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ ellngit nun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ yaquleg kun _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
moses _ allaaghluwhaghtighllagaataghluni _ Egypt-mi _ , _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ Egypt-meng _ . _ wata _ allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaaguq _ Red _ Sea-millu _ , _ iglegha llegh meggni llu _ kilgaa ni _ maghyaghqugh aqe yamiki _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
Taananguuq _ moses _ Israel-eghmiinun _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ '
Taananguuq _ moses _ sivunemnnitkaq _ qerngughte te aqngata _ kilgaa ni _ Mount _ Sinai-em _ tungangangi _ . _ tawani _ naayghagh mi _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh yatni _ tugukagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apeghtuusagh t _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ . _ taagken _ apeghkagh i _ taakut _ sivunegh mnnun _ enkaam _ ellngit a _ nagneghtekaqiit _ whangkunnun _ .
" _ iwernga _ sivunegh mta _ moses _ qaatke sug mangite aat llu _ , _ igleghte te i steke yug mangite aat llu _ , _ yeghlegi _ uteghte yu kau ut _ Egypt-mun _ .
enkaam _ Moses-em _ anengagh a _ aaron _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ Kiyaghnengllaghteghqut _ maghyaghqiisqelluta _ . _ nallukagh ut _ moses _ samatagh nge a _ , _ legan _ aghulaqe te luta _ Egypt-meng _ unite ainkut _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kaawaghaghsugnilngughmeng _ , _ aghqerragh uqagh at llu _ . _ neqenghaghqekagh t llu _ quulvaghnaluku _ ulimaagh eng _ .
" _ tawaten _ pi yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunutekagh i llu _ , _ pegtekagh i llu _ elngaatall _ maniguutesqelluki _ siqinegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ighaleqetaagh nun llu _ . _ atanegh _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqe llegh itni _ , _ ' _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ iglegha u lusi _ kilgaa ni _ aghqerraaghumangitaghpesinga _ tuqutagh ii negh gpesini _ teghig ke te yameng _ .
yeghlegi _ kelqutaaqegkaqasi _ tiinta t _ manigugh vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Moloch-mun _ , _ kelqutaaqegkaqaghsillu _ ighaleqetaagh ngllaghkagh _ maniguute yu i luku _ rephan- mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anguyag gpesinun _ aghulaqe te ste lleqe amsi _ naghughte luku _ Babylon _ . _ ' _ "
stephen _ paninang _ akuzikagh _ , _ " _ sivunegh put _ kilgaa nite luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tiinta nglligh sqekagh i _ amigh meng _ manigugh vig u luki _ ellmi nun _ . _ ulima kaqe ait _ tawatengwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh te llegh atun _ Moses-mun _ . _ Kelqutaaqegkiit _ taakut _ tiinta t _ neqangugh sigh u luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ .
Taakwaningani _ moses _ tuqu yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ Joshua _ igleghutistekesqelluku _ sivunegh mnnun _ . _ Joshua-m _ maghyaghqughyisteng _ nuna mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ taakut _ tiinta t _ kelqekagh it _ . _ takukagh meggnun _ nuna mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ yug lgu uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivunegh mnnun _ ighllegh stekagh i _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ sivunegh put _ nelikagh t _ taaggun _ nuna kun _ . _ tamaani _ nagnegh tke ait _ taakut _ tiinta t _ maniguute vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kenlanga _ umiileg liite llegh meggnun _ David _ .
David-em _ kiyaghtaallgha _ elngaatall _ efqugh nagh pigtekau lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ enkaam _ David-em _ aaptekaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh a _ Jacob-em _ , _ mangteghangllaghlakaan _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi te ma ite kanga _ ,
yeghlegi _ David-em _ ighnegh an _ Solomon-em _ mangteghagh ngllagh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
" _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh ghllag _ kiyaghsigate uq _ mangteghagh ni _ yug t _ ulimaagh itni _ . _ whaten _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliqistem _ igaqe llegh ani _ ,
' _ qilag _ aqumutagh ke aqa _ , _ nuna llu _ itegagh iitagh ke aqa _ . _ sangan _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe ste ngnga _ ? _ Meghnalivigitaangunghitunga _ .
Ulimaaqenghiisikuun _ sa u a _ qamatengngwaaghluku _ ? _ ' _ "
Stephen-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pi neghllug ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ qaatkesugigataghsi _ , _ ugpeqsugigataghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ nagate yug igate asi _ , _ ighsa keraaghagh ke agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ sivuneghpesistungwaaq _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqistengi _ sivunegh gpesi _ amyuutke kaqe ait _ . _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe te kete yatgu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ tagi yaghqaa ni yatgu _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yan _ , _ uvegh ghpagte te luku _ tuqutkaqaghsi _ .
elpesi u usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qaatke mangite asi _ . _ "
Agghistet _ nagate luku _ stephen _ sakrituteghllakat _ repall _ ggiiste aghagh tke aat _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ imigh nga lghii _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ sivugte yalghiimi _ qilag mun _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqellgha _ , _ Jesus-llu _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ ! _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ yug m _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ ! _ "
Agghistet _ sigute teng _ saape luki _ iigge meggneng _ , _ araghaatagh te magh meng _ qamagte luteng _ sughukagh at _ stephen _ .
Siingvagaatameng _ aghulaqe tke aat _ Jerusalem-emeng _ , _ tuqute na luku _ milughpagaataghhiinaq _ . _ taagken _ Stephen-em _ avutkistengita _ qaasligh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ nukalpigagh m _ Saul-em _ saaghw akun _ lli luki _ milugh agaatagh yuggaagh ke aat _ . _ tamaakut llu _ ila ita _ milugh agaataghkagh at _ .
whaa _ uyghag m _ tekegh igh qagh vike yatni _ stephen _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ tugukligh kek _ . _ "
segesqughte luni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ seghevute ki _ whaken _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi luni _ tuqukagh _ .
Saul-em _ itagnaqegkaa _ Stephen-em _ tuqute llegh a _ . _ yug t _ piniqe i nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ llivegh ke aat _ stephen _ qiya ke ghllag u magh an _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh meng _ kenlanga _ amyuutke ghllag yagutekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ . _ Saul-em _ elngaatall _ amyuutkekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ naangesqelluki _ . _ itegh aqe luni _ ne itnun _ qamughsiighmeng _ aane te qugh qu ai _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ yug t llu _ anusimingllagh ste qugh na luki _ . _ Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ pelleghmun _ qimagugh tke aat _ nuna nun _ Judea-melngughnunllu _ , _ Samaria-melngughnunllu _ , _ apostle-nginaghhaat _ qimag ma ite ngugh t _ .
tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ qimagugh tke aat _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ naansaghngaaghmeng _ .
philip _ Samaria-lluni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Christ-a _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaqlu _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ nagate u aqe aqe kangat _ esghapag luki _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghi _ .
uglagh pigte lghii neng _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh t _ akilghuungitgun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ piyug igate ngugh t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
Enkaangam _ Samaria-ghmiit _ elngaatall _ quya ghllagkagh t _ .
Samaria-minguq _ taawa _ alignagh lghii _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ . _ salin _ philip _ kaate llghite luku _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ saghiighayugtaqegkangi _ yug t _ , _ qukaayugtaqelghiillu _ aghtugh igate ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tamaanlenguut _ , _ pingwaagh ghllag neng _ , _ ukavanlleghpigaghnun _ nagate yu kestagh luku _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ aghtughyaghqaanghillengeghllakaaguq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ "
yug t _ nagate yu pigte luku _ ayuqe kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ allaaghlluwhaghyugtekayugukangi _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ .
iwernga _ Philip-em _ ungipagh ke yaki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ategh aneng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ugpeqekagh it _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t llu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
talwa _ Simon-emllu _ ugpeqekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ paaptaaye llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ maligsaagh qagh a _ philip _ . _ esghapag luku _ philip _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ allaaghlluwhaghtiighaatalghii _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
Apostle-et _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ nagaqugh luki _ Samaria-ghmiit _ ugpegh ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ kayagtekagh gket _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ellngit nun _ .
Samaria-ghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh inagh ghhagh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ naqam _ salin _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ allgeghsigalkegket _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ Samaria-mun _ kaate lutek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ taagken _ saafte aqe luki _ yughagh te kau uute aqe aik _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgeghtekagket _ .
Simon-em _ esghapag kakek _ apostle-ek _ , _ saafte nghmegneki _ ugpeqagh t _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ apostle-ek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ tukfigh i aghte langa _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng _ whanga llu _ saaftekumki _ yug t _ allgeghutesqelluki _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
iwernga _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqelliten _ manituumagh gpek _ . _ Sumeghpenii-i _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ tukfigh lleqe ni luku _ pi zigu _ ?
qepghagh lgusigh i naanghite uten _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ anaggute nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ .
Avuteghqelluten _ seghleghqe sigh ke nanigh ghhu ngam _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ piyuke llegh n _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh a _ atanegh mun _ luuraq _ seghevute na yu kagu _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ seghleghqe llegh n _ .
taawa _ liigike amken _ aqina lleg leg ghllag u uten llu _ asighqengngaatenllu _ seghleghqe llegh gpeneng _ . _ "
Simon-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ yughagh te kaghte gnenga _ atanegh mun _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ pi fqaama _ pisqellunga _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ tistemunilutek _ , _ ungipagh ke i lutek _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ aghulaqekagh k _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Samaria-mi _ iglegha u lutek _ , _ ne nun _ kaate negh megteni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghiik _ .
taagken _ yaquleg an _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Yataaghqelluten _ ikevaam _ tunganganilengughnun _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ paaghqillghanilngughnun _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ gaza- mun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
enkaam _ yataaghqelluni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ taakwani _ tumangani _ esgha qaa _ Ethiopia-ghmii _ eunuch _ , _ Ethiopia-m _ queen- nge an _ Candace-em _ , _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste nga _ . _ Jerusalem-emeng _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ ne minun _ maniguute yaghtugh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Chariot-mikun _ igleghte te kete luku _ atightugh aqe ai _ uuknaliqestem _ Isaiah-m _ igaqegkagh i _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Chariot-ngan _ saaghw anun _ aglagh luten _ maligsaagh ghhu _ . _ "
enkaam _ malighqagh luku _ nagatekagh a _ atightugh lghii _ uuknaliqestem _ Isaiah-am _ igaqegkagh aneng _ . _ Philip-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Liigiksikii _ atightuqagh ten _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ naten _ liigikesqelluki _ pi ziki _ , _ wetku qun _ kitum _ liigike stekaki _ whanga mnun _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta i _ . _ " _ taagken _ uugte ste luku _ saaghw mikun _ aqume sqekagh a _ .
Eunuch-em _ atightugh aqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ : _ " _ penniigh t _ tuqusaghtunghisteng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aat llu _ qigunghisteng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ ellnga llu _ sa meng _ pi aghte ma ite ngughk _ .
Kayngusaakestaqngatgu _ igughistengitkaq _ . _ unguvallegh a _ kenletghuutestekaq _ nuna mi _ . _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ apegh u aghte lleqe aki _ seghleghtu langi _ yug lgu ta an _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ ? _ "
Eunuch-em _ aaptekagh a _ philip _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte nga _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ellmi neng _ akuzite kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ alla _ pi aqe agu _ ? _ "
Philip-em _ piinligh sigh ke luki _ Isaiah-am _ igaqegkagh i _ , _ ungipagh tke a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Jesus-meng _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ megh mun _ kaate yamek _ eunuch-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esgha _ taana _ megh _ ! _ sa u a ngam _ eltugh sigh ke lleqe zikun _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mnun _ ? _ "
Philip-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Ipapighqelluten _ ugpegh kuvek _ paaptaaye lleqe amken _ . _ " _ Eunuch-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa _ , _ ugpeqe aqa _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ ighnegh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
enkaam _ eunuch-em _ igleghutisteni _ aghuliigh sqekagh a _ . _ ategh lutek _ chariot-meng _ megh mun _ ategh ke ak _ , _ enkaam _ Philip-em _ tawani _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
megh meng _ uugte yayek _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghulaqe tke a _ philip _ , _ enkaam _ eunuch-em _ alla _ esghamangitkaa _ , _ iwernga _ nagneqe aq _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luni _ .
taana _ philip _ pi yalghiimi _ Azotus-meteftuq _ . _ Caesarea-mun _ aglagh te kete luku _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ .
Saul _ Jerusalem-emelluni _ taawa _ paninang _ alingsiqukii _ tuqu qugh naqe ni luki _ maligsaaghtengi _ Atanghem _ . _ qenwat _ Damascus-esukaq _ , _ luuraq _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghtengi _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tamaa uute na yu kata _ . _ esghagh kumiki _ tagite na luki _ Jerusalem-emun _ anusiminglliisqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ high _ priest- mun _ pi luni _ lata ngllagh te sqekagh _ pilleghqalitesqelluni _ igleghutistengitnun _ synagogue-et _ Damascus-melngughnun _ , _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ .
enkaam _ Saul _ aghulaqekagh _ Damascus-mun _ . _ iiwenllu _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ , _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag m _ kukegtekagh a _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ nagaqugh qu a _ me _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke manginagh zinga _ ? _ "
Saul-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ " _ me m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Jesus-nguunga _ amyuutke gkan _ .
makete luten _ aglagh a _ Damascus-mun _ , _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
yug t _ igleghalgutangi _ aghula i iqe aat _ tawani _ , _ akuzipag nigh ngunateng _ nagatekagh at _ me _ , _ naqam _ kina _ alngunak _ esghagh ma ite kangat _ .
Saul _ makete yalghiimi _ esghaate nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ayaa ma lghii _ . _ enkaam _ tasluqluku _ aglagh tke aat _ Damascus-mun _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ ayaa ngakagh _ , _ talwa _ negh ma ite ngughk llu _ , _ megh ma ite ngughk llu _ .
taawa nguq _ Damascus-mi _ , _ yuug _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ Jesus-meng _ , _ ategh a _ Ananias _ . _ Esghaaghwaalleghqun _ Atanghem _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ Ananias _ . _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ay _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ "
Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ ategh ke lghii nun _ , _ ' _ taklaghrukegte aq _ ' _ taagken _ Judas-enkunun _ aapte yaghtugh ghhu _ yuug _ , _ Saul-nguuq _ , _ tarsus- meng _ pi u uq _ , _ yughagh aqe uq _ .
Esghaghwaaghqun _ esghamaa _ yuug _ itegh lghii _ , _ ategh a _ Ananias _ , _ saafsaqminigu _ esghaghyagunneqigtuq _ . _ "
iwernga _ Ananias-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ uglagh pigte lghii neng _ , _ apegh naqe pigte aqe aat _ seghletun _ pi llegh ghllag a _ yug gpenun _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
pi lleghqagh nge kau uq _ chief _ priest-eneng _ tagi luni _ Damascus-mun _ tugulagh na luki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh kayug t _ ategh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aglagh a _ , _ taku gu _ qayughllak _ nakmike ma aqa _ ungipaqesqellunga _ Gentile-enun _ , _ umiileg nun _ , _ Israel-eghmiinunllu _ .
liigike ste naqngu aqa _ aange luku _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Ananias-em _ takukagh a _ Saul _ . _ itegh luni _ saafte magh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anglegute mni _ Saul _ , _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ esghaghkagh gpek _ tume ni _ tagi u luten _ , _ kayagte aanga _ elpenun _ . _ kayagte te aaten _ saaftesqelluten _ esghaasagunneqigtesqelluten _ , _ imiisqellutenllu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ iqallug m _ qaltesugningi _ iye gkeneng _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh sag u tke aq _ . _ taagken _ makete luni _ paaptaayekagh _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ negh yalghiimi _ iknaqsuugtekagh _ . _ Saul _ ugpeqanitkaq _ Damascus-mi _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
mulu gpenani _ synagogue-ni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Nagatullghiim _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ repall _ ellmeggneng _ aapte qugh aghte tke aat _ , _ " _ Unangunghitaa-a _ yuug _ Jerusalem-emi _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aq _ yughagh kayug neng _ Jesus-em _ ategh akun _ ? _ maavek _ tagi u yagh lghii _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ tugulagh na luki _ , _ aglannaluki _ chief _ priest-enun _ . _ "
Saul-em _ ungipagh ke i llegh mikun _ wata _ liigikestaghaqaa _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-angutanga _ repall _ Jews-et _ Damascus-melnguut _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
Saul _ ungipagh ke i lqinagh yan _ tawaten _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ Jews-et _ wataqaaghaq _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ , _ repall _ qerngughte te luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ .
enkaam _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ Damascus-em _ amig ghllag lghute ani _ kelengakekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ . _ iwernga _ Saul-em _ nagaqugh qu a _ tawaten _ agghi llegh at _ .
enkaam _ unugmi _ ataasigh mi _ , _ Saul-em _ maligsaaghtengita _ pasket-eghrugllagegnekun _ mingllute meng _ eslate mun _ ukigtekaat _ .
taagken _ Saul _ kaa sa mi _ Jerusalem-emun _ ilate naqe kau yaag lghii _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghtengitnun _ . _ taawanginaq _ iingunaghhaghmeng _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga llu _ maligte yaaghte ngughsi ma ta a _ .
iwernga _ Barnabas-em _ Saul _ aglagh te luku _ apostle-enun _ aapte qugh a _ Saul-mun _ tume mi _ esghagh ma ni luku _ atanegh _ , _ aleghquute kau ni lutek llu _ . _ aapte qugh a llu _ Damascus-mi _ ungipagh kau ni luku _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ .
enkaam _ tugukligh iqe aat _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ Saul _ ugpeqanitkaq _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ Greek-estun _ akuzi kayug t _ aaghtiiraaghkagh an _ tuqute yu kaqe kangat _ .
ugpeqagh t _ liigike yamegteggu _ Jews-enun _ tuqute naqe ni luku _ Saul _ , _ aglagh tke aat _ Caesarea-mun _ , _ taagken _ kayagtekagh at _ tarsus- mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Judea-mi _ , _ galilee- mi _ , _ Samaria-millu _ amyuutkestengngunateng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ . _ ugpegh llegh it _ iknaqughtekat _ , _ alinge aqe lghiit _ qaatke te nghite lleghqagh meggneng _ atanegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ kayusi i u kangi _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nulakagh t _ .
Peter-em _ iglegha te kete luku _ laalighfike te qugh u i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ naansaghngaata _ . _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ laalightekagh _ Lydda-melngughnun _ .
tamaani _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ ategh a _ Aeneas _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayumiqullegh _ makete igate ngughk _ uniigh nga te mii neng _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Aeneas _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ naallghute aaten _ , _ makete luten _ allighagh n _ imeg ggu _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ Aeneas _ maketekagh _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ Lydda-ghmiitlu _ Sharon-eghmiitlu _ esghagh yamegteggu _ Aeneas _ naallghute luni _ , _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ atanegh kun _ .
Joppa-minguq _ taawa _ ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ategh a _ tabitha _ , _ ( _ Greek-stun _ Dorcas _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ quyngigh _ ) _ , _ quunpeng _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakunun _ aklumalghii nun _ .
taagken _ qinuyug luni _ tuqukagh _ enkaam _ ughvughqellug qu _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ .
Joppa-ghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ nagaqugh qu aat _ peter _ Lydda-menniluku _ . _ lydda _ , _ Joppa-meng _ qantaghaghhanlenguq _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ kevgaqegkagket _ maalghug _ yug k _ peter- mun _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ Joppa-mun _ .
Peter-em _ yataaghqelluni _ maligtekakek _ . _ kaate yan _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ . _ legan _ itegh uq _ ugingighagh t _ qiya magh meng _ kangllu qaghte luku _ keleg u vikekagh at _ aatkagh neng _ Dorcas-em _ ulimaagh aneng _ .
Peter-em _ aane ste qugh luki _ segesqughte luni _ yughaghkagh _ . _ taaqe luni _ yughagh nghmeng _ qiive luku _ yugusigh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tabitha _ , _ maketen _ . _ " _ tabitha _ esghaate kete luku _ esghagh yamigu _ peter _ aqumekagh _ .
Peter-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ tuqlugh qu ai _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvagh ma ta a _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ Joppa-ghmiit _ nagaqugh qu aat _ Tabitha-m _ unguvallegh a _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
peter _ mulukagh _ Joppa-mi _ , _ Simon-enkunitkaq _ sanaghtistemi _ .
Caesarea-minguq _ taawa _ yuug _ ategh a _ Cornelius _ . _ umiileg at _ Rome-em _ pilluwaghtengita _ italy- meng _ pi t _ .
yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ yughaghtuqagh llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ qepghaghtekullghiit _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ 3-klaagmi _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ . _ Whateghlluwaaq _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg a _ itegh lghii _ , _ yaquleg m _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ Cornelius _ ! _ "
alingruugh magh mi _ esghapagtugh luku _ yaquleg _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ sa meng _ pi ziin _ ? _ " _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma ai _ yughagh llegh ten _ , _ efqugh ke pigte a llu _ kayusigh i llegh n _ aklumalghii nun _ enkaam _ neqamike aaten _ .
Joppa-mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
Simon-enkunituq _ sanaghtistemi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ tawaten _ pi luku _ unitekagh a _ . _ taagken _ Cornelius-em _ tuqlugh kakek _ maalghug _ qepghaghtegni _ , _ pillugwaghtallu _ . _ taana _ pilluwaghta _ Cornelius-em _ kayute anga _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tagi yata _ ungipaate u aqe ai _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ , _ taagken _ keveg aqekagh i _ Joppa-mun _ .
unaami ani _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ kevgat _ kaate yaghtugh aqe ut llu _ Joppa-mun _ , _ peter _ mat- yuqagh _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ yughagh na luni _ .
taagken _ iyataghkagh _ , _ sa meng _ neghyuke aq _ . _ sama _ neqe meng _ yataaghqe ma luki _ peter _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ .
esgha qaa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taagken _ esgha qaa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ ukigtekangat _ nuna mun _ estamatgun _ tekerqagh akun _ .
taawa nguq _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ reptile-eneng _ , _ qawaag neng llu _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate unga _ iinghutekagh meng _ ukmangite nghite ngugh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ "
me m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ taakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ pi gpenaki _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ pi nga yu neng _ ketwhell _ . _ taagken _ tawaninginaq _ taana _ iingunagh mi _ qilag mun _ mayugh tke aq _ .
Peter-em _ kukriqe tkekagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma luku _ Cornelius-em _ keveg ai ta _ liite tke aat _ Simon-em _ mangteghagh a _ naantulanga _ , _ enkaam _ manughagh anun _ kaate tke aat _ .
qamavek _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ whani _ aqelqagh u nghite a _ yuug _ ategh a _ simon _ peter _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ , _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ , _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ ivagh aqe aaten _ .
ukig luten _ qaqilqa fqaavek _ maligte ki _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ Peter-em _ ukig luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ ivaghkagh i _ . _ sa meng _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Cornelius-em _ keveg aqe ainkut _ , _ umiileg u uq _ Rome-em _ pilluwaghtengitnun _ . _ yuug _ pinigh ghllag uq _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ Jews-et _ sii vag ke pigte aqe aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ pika qaa _ Cornelius _ , _ ' _ aqfa ste gu _ peter _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh a _ elpenun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ itegh sqekagh i _ , _ tawani llu _ qavigh sqekagh i _ . _ unaami ani _ yataaghqelluni _ maligtekagh i _ Cornelius-em _ keveg ai _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ila i _ Joppa-meng _ maligte tke aat _ .
taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate tke aat _ Caesarea-mun _ . _ Cornelius-em _ ilakwaagh ni llu _ ilakumtaagh ni llu _ tagi laghate te ste luki _ ellmeggnun _ utaqakagh at _ peter _ .
peter _ itegh aqe uq llu _ Cornelius-em _ payegh luku _ segesqughte vikekagh a _ manigugh na luku _ .
iwernga _ Peter-em _ nekevestutkelluku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nekeve i _ , _ whanga llu _ yugu unga _ . _ "
iitghute kete luku _ Peter-em _ aleghqugh qu a _ Cornelius _ . _ itegh yalghiimi _ taawa _ yuug _ qerngughte te ghllag ma lghii _ tawani _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Liisimakngwaaghaghsi _ whangkuta _ Jews-eni _ liilightuusagh mta _ ineghtekaqe ainkut _ ilate fqaamta _ pisqelluta _ Gentile-enun _ , _ talwa _ laalighfike snanigh kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kina _ alngunak _ ukmangite nghite ni luku _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
aqfate yafsinga _ tagi unga _ qaqilqa gpenanga _ . _ sangama _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
Cornelius-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaten _ lliigh magh an _ akuwaaq _ pi aqe lleg mtun _ yughagh ma lunga _ 3-kellaagmi _ , _ yuug _ manu mkun _ nekeve uq _ aatkagh i _ nighug ghllag t _ .
whaa _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Cornelius _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughagh llegh ten _ nagaqugh ma ai _ , _ neqamike ai llu _ aklumalghii nun _ kayusigh i llegh ten _ .
Joppa-mun _ kina _ keveg aqe gu _ aqfa sqellug qu _ simon _ peter _ . _ Simon-enkunituq _ sanaghtistemi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ '
enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ aqfa sqe amken _ , _ quyake amken _ tagi lghiiten _ . _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh ke llegh a _ qamagte luta _ whaanlengughni _ nagaqughyugaghput _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ Atanghem _ elpenun _ apegh sqekagh a _ whangkunnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa _ liigike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pikayug u a _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag an _ yuug _ ataasigh stun _ .
tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ kina _ alngunak _ nakumiinguyaghngaan _ alike i lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ pinitun llu _ pikayug _ .
liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ungipagh kekagh _ Israel-eghmiinun _ , _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ yug t _ nekeggmellegh nge sighqagh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tamaghhaghwaaghmi _ yug m _ .
liisimakagh i _ taana _ ungipagh _ mingite kau uq _ Judea-lqaaghaghmi _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ galilee- mi _ John-em _ ungipagh kaqe yagu _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
liisimakagh i _ Jesus _ Nazareth-eghmii _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ i mi qaa _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmengllu _ . _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ pinitun _ pi aqe kangi _ yug t _ , _ naallghute qugh qu ai llu _ tamaakut _ tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ Jesus-melnguq _ .
whangkuta _ apostle-eni _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ tawaten _ pillghanun _ Jews-et _ nuna itni _ , _ Jerusalem-emillu _ . _ tuqute kaqe aat _ tuquuqagh te luku _ qaquuragh kun _ .
iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ esghagh stekaqe a llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ esghagh mangite a _ . _ whangkuta _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ liisimake i ste u luta _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ meghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh ste llegh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ , _ apegh sqe kau uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmike kaqe ni luni _ nanqigte i ste u luni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqistet _ pi kau ut _ , _ kitum nguq _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ategh akun _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ . _ "
peter _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ qamagte luki _ nagate lghiit _ ungipagh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ iteghkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ allaaghlluwhatun _ akuzi stekagh i llu _ usuqe i stekagh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ Circumcise-ekat _ ugpeqagh t _ Joppa-meng _ maligte tke aat _ peter- mun _ saghiigha yuke aat _ nagate yamegteki _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ . _ liigikekagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ tunusagh ke kek _ talwa _ Gentile-enun _ . _ taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ yug t _ allgegh te ut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ whangkuteghpigaghestun _ . _ kitum ngam _ paaptaaye snanigh nagh kaki _ megh kun _ ? _ "
taagken _ qelqe ai _ paaptaayesqelluki _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaat _ peter _ .
Apostle-etlu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ Judea-melnguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ Gentile-enunllu _ ugpeqe ma ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
peter _ kaate yan _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh t _ circumcise-eghiyukat _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqagh itneng _ seghlequuqaat _ peter _ , _ pi ke aat _ ,
" _ sangan _ circumcize-emangilnguut _ itegh vike luki _ ne itnun _ neghe lgusigh ziki _ ? _ "
Liigikesqelluki _ Peter-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ kenlanga _ aapte qugh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghiighkagh _ .
" _ Joppa-mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh kau unga _ . _ esghagh aqa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gni _ estamatgun _ tekerqagh akun _ ukigtekangat _ qilag meng _ whanga mnun _ .
tawavek _ yuvghiighwaaghyaqegka _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ reptile-eneng _ , _ qawaag neng _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ '
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ yeghlegi llu _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate anka _ tamaakut _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ neqe t _ iinghutekagh t _ . _ '
" _ me m _ pi laatagh aanga _ qilag meng _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ sumeghtaghagh te kete yaghqaqe nghite aten _ . _ '
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ pi nga yu neng _ ketwhell _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ taakut _ aga _ qilag mun _ mayugh te aqe ut llu _ ,
whaa _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ kaate ut _ tukugh mnun _ , _ kevgaaftut _ whanga mnun _ Caesarea-meng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ qaqilqa fqaama _ maligte sqe ai _ . _ ukut llu _ aghvinleg _ yug t _ ugpeqaalguteput _ maligte te ut _ Joppa-meng _ Caesarea-mun _ . _ kaa llu ta _ Cornelius-enkunun _ iteghaatukut _ .
Cornelius-em _ apegh aa _ yaquleg meng _ esghaate lleg ni _ ne mini _ , _ yaquleg m nguq _ whaten _ pi a _ , _ ' _ Joppa-mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
ungipaate lleqe aisi _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ . _ '
enkaam _ akuzi aqe unga llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ai _ tawatengwaaq _ whangkunnun _ itegh llegh mitun _ Pentecost-em _ aghnegh ani _ .
taagken _ neqangugh aqa _ Atanghem _ pillgha _ whaten _ , _ ' _ John _ paaptaayelaqaaguq _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ paaptaaye lleqe usi _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kaki _ Gentile-et _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ tunute yameng _ tuunekagh mineng _ whangkunnun _ ugpeqe aqe yamteggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ whanga _ kina u zinga _ aghula i aghte naqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pillghaneng _ Gentile-enun _ ? _ "
tawaten _ Peter-em _ piyisteng _ qalleg nanigh luteng _ , _ yeghlegi _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taawa _ liigikagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ talwa _ Gentile-et _ pilleghqalisimakangi _ avuteghqesqelluki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ unguvallengesqellukillu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ! _ "
Stephen-em _ tuqute llegh a _ kenle ke luku _ Jews-et _ amyuutkekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ anagkagh t _ Jerusalem-emeng _ . _ aghulaqe te tke aat _ kenlanga _ Phoenicia-mun _ , _ Cyprus-mun _ , _ Antioch-munllu _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh kekagh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Jews-nginaghhaghnun _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ Cyprus-mengllu _ Cyrene-mengllu _ Antioch-etkat _ , _ kaate luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ talwa _ Jews-ngunghilngughnun _ .
Atanghem _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ ellngitnite kau lghii _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pestaagh _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ qiive te tke aq _ atanegh mun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ Barnabas _ kayagtekagh at _ Antioch-mun _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ quya ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ liigikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ yug nun _ . _ Barnabas _ pinigh lghii u lghii _ yuug _ , _ imigh nga ghllag llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg leg ghllag llu _ . _ taagken _ allangughte fqiita _ ataasiighmete kestigh sqekagh i _ atanegh mun _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
taagken _ Barnabas-em _ Saul _ ivagh yaghtuqagh a _ tarsus- mun _ .
Naalkesamigu _ kelqekagh a _ Antioch-mun _ . _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ tamaantelleghmegni _ ilate aqe lutek _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ tamaani _ Antioch-mi _ ugpeqagh t _ atigh yuwhaagh ke ait _ , _ " _ Christian-et _ . _ "
tamaani _ ila i _ uuknaliqistem _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Antioch-mun _ tagikagh t _ .
ataasigh _ Agabus-nguftuq _ , _ nekeve luni _ uuknaliqekagh _ Taghneghagnekun _ neqangisag ghllag naqe ni luku _ tea- ma ani _ . _ taawa _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ Claudius _ Umiilegpigaaluku _ .
ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqaalguteteng _ Judea-melnguut _ kayusigh yug qu ait _ pitutalmegestun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte i luteng _ mani meng _ tuyugh ikagh t _ elder-enun _ Jerusalem-emelngughnun _ Barnabas-enkugnekun _ Saul-enkugnekun _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ amyuutke sag u tke ai _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
John-em _ anglegutanga _ James _ tuqute stekagh a _ savigpag kun _ .
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ liigike yamigu _ Jews-eneng _ efqughtagh igh lleg ni _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ , _ qelegh tke a _ peter _ tugu sqellug qu _ . _ ( _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ Neqenghaghqengnguluki _ Yeast-aliimangilngughmeng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ )
peter _ tugu yatgu _ , _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ qelegh tke a _ 16-eghyagnun _ pilluwaghtenun _ kelengake sqellug qu _ estamat kaghte ai ta _ kipullegte te aqe luki _ . _ yugtuqagh mi _ nanqigte yukagh a _ kingu aneng _ Passover-em _ .
enkaam _ peter _ anusimingllaghvig mete stekagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh te ke ghllag ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
peter _ qavaa lghii _ maalghug _ kelengake istek _ akule gkeni _ , _ petug nga lghii llu _ malghugneghteggun _ qiipraghute tgun _ . _ allameng _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig a _ kelengakistelek _ . _ whaa _ aghtekan _ Herod-em _ tagite ste naqngu kanga _ yug nun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ .
Atanghem _ yaquleg a _ aliigh aghtekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nighug _ kuukgute ke aq _ anusimingllaghvig m _ ilu anun _ . _ yaquleg m _ peter _ tuye akun _ aghulate luku _ , _ teghtughllug qu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ egmiinaq _ maketen _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ qiipraghute t _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ iiggagh neng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ pilugug luten _ kameg gken _ aate kek _ . _ " _ peter _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ yaquleg m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ qaasligh gken _ aate lukek _ maligte nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Peter-em _ maligtekagh a _ . _ ugpeqe mangite u aqe aqe yagh kanga _ aane te lleg ni _ , _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ esghaghwaagh ni luni _ .
sivuligh t llu _ tuungligh ghhagh i llu _ kelengakistet _ naghughte luki _ kaate tke ak _ savikenghaagh mun _ amig mun _ . _ amigh k _ ellmi neng _ qelpegh yan _ , _ aane lutek _ igleghteghngaagmek _ tume tgun _ yaquleg _ aviite qaghtekagh _ .
taagken _ Peter-em _ liigike u aqe a _ sa mate ni _ enkaam _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa u uq _ Atanghem _ kayagte ma a _ yaquleg ni _ iqitutesqellunga _ Herod-meng _ , _ Jews-etlu _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
liigike luku _ sa mate ni _ Mary-nkunun _ aglaghkagh _ , _ John _ Mark-em _ naa anun _ . _ tawani _ yug lghute _ qerngughte te luni _ yughagh te ghllagu lghii _ qerngagh mi _ .
peter _ eslaklighqun _ amig kun _ tenglugtugh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ qepghaghtem _ , _ Rhoda-m _ qelpegh te yaghtuqagh a _ .
liisuqe yamigu _ Peter-em _ me a _ , _ quyaghllagem _ angtalanganeng _ qelpegh te gpenaan _ , _ yeghlegi _ ilu te mun _ itegh qaghte luni _ aapte qugh a _ qakma _ peter _ manughamenniluku _ .
iwernga _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ temngi _ pi uten _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ sagiqe tke ai _ ipa u ni luku _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yaquleg ke nghite agu wha _ . _ "
qakma _ peter _ tenglugtugh ma inagh ke aq _ . _ Qelpeghusaqmegteggu _ ellnga u uq _ enkaam _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
Peter-em _ apaqukagh i _ qallegnaniisqelluki _ , _ enkaam _ ungipamsug te u aqe ai _ Atanghem _ aane te llegh aneng _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ apegh qagh nakefsinga _ James-munllu _ ugpeqaalgutemnnunllu _ tawaten _ pi ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane luni _ natmun _ pi ke aq _ .
aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ kelengakistet _ aviilngaqaat _ peter _ , _ alingrughumaghmeng _ kukriqekagh t _ samatagh nge a _ .
Herod-em _ ivaghtesimayaqanga _ iwernga _ naalke ma nge i tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ kelengakistet _ aapqughaaghtesluki _ nalluke yatgu _ tuqu qugh stekagh i _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ herod _ Judea-meng _ Caesarea-lluni _ tamaanteghraakaq _ .
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ ugumi yagute ghllagu kangi _ Tyre-eghmiitlu _ Sidon-eghmiitlu _ , _ iwernga _ tamaakumiit _ yug t _ kayagtekagh it _ Blastus-mun _ akuzitunnaqaghtesqelluteng _ Herod-mun _ . _ Blastus _ igleghutistekegkanga _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ mangteghagh ghllag an _ . _ kaate luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Blastus _ akuzitutaghtesqelluteng _ umiileg mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghiit _ neqenge nanigh na yukagh meng _ Herod-em _ nuna aneng _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ pi vigkagh meggni _ Herod-em _ umiileg u sigh t _ aatkagh ni _ aatqughluki _ aqume luni _ aqumutagh ghllag gmikun _ akuzikagh _ .
taaqe yan _ akuzi nghmeng _ yug t _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ yugu nghite uq _ akuzi lghii _ , _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ ! _ "
Tawaninginaq _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ qinuyug ste ghllag qagh a _ herod _ , _ qayughllak _ tugukligh kanga _ quulvalleq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi a _ . _ Unguvaghmi _ kingugtagh u ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke aat _ enkaam _ wata _ yuug _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ .
taake uk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul-enkuk _ apeghiigh yamegnegu _ qepghaqagh ek _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ Antioch-mun _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ .
Antioch-mi _ ugpeqagh m _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u ut llu _ apeghtughiste u ut llu _ . _ Taakunguftut _ Barnabas _ , _ simeon _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ niger- meng _ , _ Lucius _ ( _ Cyrene-meng _ pi _ ) _ , _ Manaen _ ( _ angli lgute anga _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ ) _ , _ Saul-llu _ .
maniguute ma luki _ atanegh mun _ , _ fast-emalukillu _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aafte kek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul-enkuk _ , _ qayughllak _ nakmike agka _ alla neng _ qepghaqagh meng _ qepghigh sqellug kek _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taaqe yameng _ fast-elleghmengllu _ yughagh llegh meng llu _ saafte lukek _ yughagh tkellug kek _ aghulaqestekagket _ .
