unaami ani _ ila i _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ , _ taakut _ kuunitistet _ nagnegh tke aat _ Paul _ Caesarea-mun _ .
kaate luteng _ Paul _ aglagh tke aat _ governor-mun _ , _ lata t llu _ tuunekagh it _ .
Governor-em _ lata t _ atightugh luki _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ nalighnegh aneng _ Rome-em _ pi u ziin _ ? _ " _ Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Cilicia-meng _ " _ .
Governor-em _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ Avutkisteten _ kaate kata _ nanqigte lleqe amken _ . _ " _ taagken _ kelengakistenun _ kayagte tke a _ kelengake sqellug qu _ Praetorium-emi _ mangteghagh mi _ Herod-em _ ulima stekagh ani _ .
tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ High _ priest- a _ Ananias _ , _ ila i llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ akuzi stekaghqagh at llu _ tertullus _ , _ kaate tke aat _ Caesarea-mun _ . _ nanqigtivig mi _ Governor-mun _ Felix-mun _ apeghkagh it _ Paul-em _ seghletun _ pillghi _ .
tuqlugh yatni _ tertullus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ angegh lleg mni _ governor _ Felix-mi _ , _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ nuna mnni _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ . _ tamaakut llu _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ allangughte qughkagh ten _ pinigh ut _ .
sa llegh gpenun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu ukut _ .
kimaawi ste nayuke amken _ takestaaghhaa luku _ akuzi naqe unga _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ nagate naqe kefkut _ .
una _ yuug _ Paul _ seghleliighqistenguuq _ . _ seghleliighqagh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ Jews-et _ naansaghngaata _ . _ Maghyaghqughtekaat _ Jesus-em _ Nazareth-eghmiim _ maligsaaghtengita _ .
talwa _ sakusiiqe naqe kaqsagh aa _ temple- a _ , _ iwernga _ tugukaqaghput _ .
Nanqiggnaqegkaqsaghaghput _ liillightuusamta _ pillghatun _ , _ taawanginaq _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ Lysias-em _ tagi luni _ pilluwaghteminun _ wayagh stekaqe a _ whangkunneng _ . _ taagken _ qelegh ai _ avutkistengi _ elpenun _ tagisqelluki _ .
governor _ Felix-mi _ , _ aapqughaaquvgu _ liigike lleqe aten _ anaggute ni lleg put _ ipa u ta i _ . _ "
Jews-et _ ilate qaghtekagh t _ tertullus- mun _ , _ akuzillegh i _ qamagte luki _ ipa u nikagh it _ .
taagken _ governor-em _ Paul _ akuzi sqekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ Paul _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ governor _ Felix-mi _ , _ quya unga _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake amken _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ nanqigte i ste u uten _ whangkunnun _ Jews-enun _ .
elpek ni _ liigike yugnagh uq _ ipa u ta a _ akugaarugllak _ Jerusalem-etelqa _ maniguute na lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Anaggunnistema _ liisimake aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh mangite aqa _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ qapraghqiimangitungallu _ yug neng _ temple- mi _ , _ synagogue-nnillu _ , _ talwa _ nani _ alngunak _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
Enkaangam _ tawaten _ pi ma ni ghngaaghmegtengnga _ ipapighqennaanghitaat _ .
iwernga _ apegh naqe aqa _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ manigugh aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh at _ sivunegh mta _ maligte luku _ Tumanga _ Jesus-em _ . _ ukut _ yug t _ pi kangat _ temngingu ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ whanga llu _ ellngistun _ ugpeqe anka _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ uuknaliqistetlu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
Anaggunnistemtunllu _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtesaghqaqii _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ tuqukagh t _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ , _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ .
Enkaangam _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte naqutke aqe unga _ seghleghyug te kaghqagh ite te lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
" _ qafsinegyag _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ qantaghaqu nghhagh _ uteghnigh unga _ Jerusalem-emun _ manilinnaluki _ akluma lghiit _ Jews-elgutenka _ , _ aghqerraaghnalungallu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
pelungighsagh nghmeng _ apeghiigh lunga _ temple- mi _ aghqerraaghumalunga _ , _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ Asia-meng _ pi t _ esghagh aatnga _ . _ uvite ka _ paaghqite uq llu _ seghleliigh i tuq llu _ .
taakut _ Jews-et _ sangameng _ tagi nghite aat _ ? _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kuma _ ellnginguyaghtut _ apegh i stekaghqagh nka _ seghletun _ pilleg mneng _ iwernga _ aviite ut _ .
yeqay _ ukut _ whaanlenguut _ nagate kaqe aatnga _ mesighagh aqngama _ Jews-et _ agghi vig itni _ , _ apegh litgu _ anaggute llegh meng _ naalkefikumakumegtengnga _ .
entaqun _ ellngit ni _ seghleghu uq _ whaten _ pi aqe yamki _ , _ ' _ Nanqigtaghpesinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ ' _ "
iwernga _ Felix-em _ , _ liisimakngwaaghluku _ kiyaghtaalleq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh a _ , _ wintakusitkaa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ Paul _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ Lysias _ kaate kan _ agghi tke lleqe aqa _ Paul _ . _ "
taagken _ umiilwaaghmun _ kayagte tke a _ Paul _ kelengake sqellug qu _ , _ naqam _ anusimingllagh snanigh qagh a _ . _ ighsake ste na nigh ke ai llu _ ilakumtaagh ita _ sa meng _ tagite nghatgu _ aklukegkaaneng _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ Felix-em _ Jews-a _ nuliigh ni _ , _ Drusilla _ , _ kelqellug qu _ tagikagh _ . _ tagsiqligh luku _ Paul _ , _ nagatekagh ak _ ungipagh lghii _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Paul-em _ akuzi tke sag ke i _ ukut _ : _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleq _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ governor _ Felix-em _ alinge luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Aanelghaatenʼngam _ , _ alla _ aqfa ste lleqe amken _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuma _ . _ "
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ felix _ neghyu u yagh lghii _ Paul-mun _ manililleqniluni _ pegtekunigu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagsiqligh aqe kanga _ mulu te gpenaan _ aleghquute na lutek _ .
taagken _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ atugh lukek _ , _ Porcius _ festus _ governor-ngughtekaq _ . _ iwernga _ Felix-em _ efqughsugluki _ Jews-et _ Paul _ unitekagh a _ paninang _ qiipraghusighngaluku _ .
festus _ kaa sa mi _ Caesarea-mun _ igleghte te i na luni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqekagh _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
tawani _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ igleghutistengitallu _ Jews-et _ ungipitekagh at _ , _ Paul _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag kau ni luku _ Jews-eneng _ .
sagiqe tke aat _ festus- mun _ , _ Paul _ tagite sqellug qu _ Jerusalem-emun _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ tuqute yu ke aat _ tumangani _ .
iwernga _ Festus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Paul _ kelengakaqaghput _ Caesarea-mi _ . _ qantaghaqun _ uteghnigh yaghqaa unga _ ,
igleghutistegpesi _ maligte nakangatnga _ . _ elngaatall _ tawani _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kan _ apegh nakangat _ . _ "
festus _ Jerusalem-emetaghaqaq _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ nalighmeng _ qula _ aghneq _ , _ taagken _ Caesarea-tkaq _ . _ unaami ani _ nanqigtivig m _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ aqume luni _ aqfa stekagh a _ Paul _ .
tagite yatgu _ , _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ Jews-et _ kangllu qaghte luku _ anaggute aatagh ghllag mani ke aat _ iwernga _ ipapighqepagningitkiit _ anaggute llegh i _ .
Paul _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ qaatke igate nghite anka _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ , _ seghletun _ pi igate unga _ temple- mi _ , _ seghletun _ pi mangite aqa _ Rome-em _ Umiilegpigaa _ . _ "
Festus-em _ efqughsugluki _ Jews-et _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-emi _ whanga mnun _ nanqigte sug ziin _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ nakaa _ ! _ whaa _ Umiilegpigaam _ nanqigtivig ani _ nekevgha unga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whani _ nanqigte yaghqaa unga _ . _ Liisimakngwaaghan _ Jews-enun _ anaggute llghite unga _ .
anaggute ma kuma _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh an _ pillghani _ repall _ tuqute yaghqaa lunga _ , _ anag naqe naanghite aqa _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ Jews-et _ anaggute ni llegh at _ temngingu kan _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ Jews-enun _ sastegkanganga _ , _ taana _ yuug _ qaatke te naanghite uq _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ Rome-em _ Umiilegpigaanun _ nanqigte sug unga _ . _ "
Festus-enkut _ agghi lgutke te lghiit _ agghite nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ Paul-em _ piyuke llegh aneng _ , _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nanqigte sug u lghiiten _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ , _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ aglagh lleqe uten _ . _ "
Taam _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ umiileg _ agrippa _ kaate tke aq _ Caesarea-mun _ kelqellug qu _ nayag ni _ Bernice _ , _ quyake na luku _ governor _ festus _ .
Tamaansimalukek _ Festus-em _ ungipamsug tke a _ agrippa _ Paul-meng _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Governor-ngughsalghiinga _ Felix-em _ yuug _ anusimingllaghvig mete ste aqe a _ maani _ .
Jerusalem-emellunga _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ igleghutistengitallu _ Jews-et _ ungipaate aatnga _ Paul-em _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ taagken _ aapte aatnga _ whanga mnun _ tuqute ste sqellug qu _ ,
iwernga _ kiimsigh kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ Rome-eghmiini _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nanqigte gpenaki _ tuqute igate aput _ . _ liilightuusagh put _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ seghletun _ pini ke aat _ , _ sivuke luni _ apeghtesaghqaaguq _ ipa _ pi ma ta a _ anaggunnistet _ nagatestekluki _ . _ taagken _ liigikelleqaghput _ sa lleghqagh ut _ . _ '
enkaam _ Paul-em _ anaggunnistengi _ tagi laghate te yata _ aga _ unaami ani _ aqume kau unga _ nanqigtivig kun _ , _ tagite stekaqe aqa llu _ Paul _ .
Anaggunistengi _ nekeve uute luteng _ seghletun _ pillghi _ apeghyaqmegteki _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ seghleghtutka nghite ut _ .
Taawanginaghhaq _ aaghtiiraagh ma kangat _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ , _ taana llu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Jesus-meng _ tuquma ni luku _ , _ iwernga _ Paul-em _ sagiqe te kaqe a _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ .
liisimakepagunghite te mneng _ tamaakut _ , _ Paul _ aapte aqa _ nanqigte sug ta a _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ nanqigte sug unga _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ . _ kelengake ste nga _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste llegh gpenun _ ellnga nun _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghtesneqigtaqa _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste lleghqagh mnun _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ . _ "
Agrippa-m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ nagate yug aqa _ Paul _ . _ " _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ unaami _ nagate lleqe an _ . _ "
unaami ani _ Agrippa-nkuk _ Bernice-enkuk _ iteghkagh k _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ elngaatall _ aarraghwaaghlutek _ umiileg m _ aatkagh aneng _ , _ maligtestekluki _ umiileg it llu _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ igleghutistengillu _ Caesarea-m _ . _ taagken _ Festus-em _ itghute sqekagh a _ Paul _ .
Festus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ whaanlengughni _ , _ una _ yuug _ esghagh kesi _ , _ Paul-nguuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ maanlenguut _ , _ Jerusalem-emelnguutlu _ qikeghqukegkaqaat _ whanga mkun _ repall _ akilghuu tke kaqe aat _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luku _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ . _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte sug kau ta aneng _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ aglagh ste na luku _ pi aqe aqa _ .
iwernga _ lata tgun _ sa meng _ ipapighqengngalghiimeng _ apegh yaghqagh ite unga _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ uumeng _ yug meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagite aqa _ sivu gpesinun _ , _ kiyang _ elpenun _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ ! _ neghyuke aqa _ aapqughaaqumteggu _ sa meng _ lata sighqagh meng _ naalkefiknayukamkun _ .
whanga mni _ temngingu uq _ aglagh stekumkun _ anusimingllagh aq _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ sa meng _ anaggute llegh meng _ apallugh ngunaan _ . _ "
Agrippa-m _ pi ke aa _ Paul _ , _ " _ taawa _ mesighagh yaghqaaghte uten _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ akuzi _ . _ " _ Paul-em _ iigge ni _ nengug te luki _ , _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ elngaatall _ aneghneghte unga _ sivu gpeni _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ Jews-et _ anaggutelqennikangitneng _ ,
qayughllak _ nallukenghitngwaaghaten _ Jews-et _ nangaghnegh it llu _ apallugh ke te kaqe kangit llu _ . _ enkaam _ nangllegsipigllunga _ aapte amken _ nagataghtesqellunga _ .
" _ Nunamnilnguutlu _ Jerusalem-emelnguutlu _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ liisimake aat _ kiyaghtaalqa _ anglinghhagh u te mneng _ ima _ .
apegh yug yagh kumegteggu _ liisimakekagh eng _ apegh nayagh aatnga _ iiwleng _ qaatke te nga lghiinga _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ .
whaa _ Jews-et _ tagi ste aatnga _ whavek _ nanqigtesqellunga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke u kegka _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtilleghqaa _ tuqukagh neng _ akequsagh kekagh a _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
taana ta _ akequsagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke lghiit _ ramke mta _ neghyuke kangat _ allgeghhnaluku _ , _ elngaatall _ maniguute u luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ . _ umiileg mi _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ neghyuke i llegh _ apallugh ke luku _ Jews-et _ nanqigte sug aatnga _ .
sangafsi _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tsi _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvaghtipagninginniluku _ tuqukagh neng _ ?
" _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ ugpeqe pigtekaqe aqa _ kipullginaalleghllaka _ elqughute nga ni luku _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ Nazareth-eghmiim _ .
tawaten _ pi kau unga _ Jerusalem-emi _ . _ Chief _ priest-eneng _ pi lleghqagh nge kau unga _ anusimingllagh ste na luki _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ . _ tuqu qugh naqe yatki _ itagnagh ke pigtekaqe anka _ tuqutesqelluki _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ aghyuugh stekaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ synagogue-nni _ , _ whaten llu _ pi ste naqutke kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ Jesus _ . _ ' _ ugumi yagute pigtekaqe anka _ repall _ malighqagh kaqe anka _ talwa _ Gentile-et _ nuna itnun _ amyugh te kete na luki _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Damascus-etunga _ pi lleghqagh ligh lunga _ , _ qelegh lleg ligh lunga _ chief _ priest-eneng _ .
umiileg mi _ , _ igleghtaaluta _ aghneq _ qukaghite aqe uq llu _ esghagh aqa _ nighug _ nighugataghalghii _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ . _ elngaatall _ nighugh pigte luni _ kuukgute kau uq _ uvite mnun _ , _ igleghalgute mnun llu _ .
qamagte luta _ ulleghaatukut _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ Hebrew-ghmiistun _ , _ ' _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ ! _ sangama _ amyugh te kete zinga _ ? _ aqnigh qugh u uten _ elpeneng _ amyuutke i llegh gpegun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ ox-em _ aqnigh qugh llegh atun _ kete igh qugh llegh mikun _ yug mi _ maghyaghqugh sagh i _ . _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ Atanghem _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus-nguunga _ , _ amyuutke ken _ .
nekeve i _ . _ aliigh vike amken _ qayughllak _ nakmike amken _ qepghaghtengulutenllu _ liisimake i ste u luten llu _ . _ apegh naketen _ tamaakut _ esghagh uqagh ten _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ tamaakut llu _ kelgute yaghqagh nka _ kinguvaqun _ aliigh vike gkumken _ .
yuguligh u iqe naagh amken llu _ elpek _ katam _ yug gpeneng _ , _ Gentile-enengllu _ . _ ellngit nun _ kayagte naqngu amken
esghaghtestesqelluki _ , _ tunute luki _ mamleg meng _ qiivesqelluki _ nighughmun _ , _ tunute luki _ tughneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ qiivesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun _ . _ taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ ila lleqe ai llu _ tamaavek _ aaftekagh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ whanga mneng _ . _ '
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ qaatke kaqe aqa _ taana _ esghaghwaagh llegh ka _ qilag meng _ .
sivuke lunga _ ungipagh ke i unga _ Damascus-mi _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ tea- ma ani llu _ Judea-mi _ . _ ungipagh ke i unga _ Jews-enunllu _ Gentile-enunllu _ avuteghqelluki _ seghleghqennanighluki _ qiivesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi sqe anka _ ipapighqutkesqelluku _ avuteghqelluteng _ seghleghqennaniimatangi _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ apallugh ke luku _ temple- mi _ Jews-et _ tugu lunga _ tuqute naqutke kaqe aatnga _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aqe aanga _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ , _ enkaam _ sivu gpesigun _ nekeve lunga _ apegh aqa _ Christ-a _ pingwaagh ghllag nun llu _ ukavantalghiinunllu _ . _ apegh kaqe a _ taananguuq _ ataasigh _ uuknaliqistetlu _ Moses-emllu _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ .
pi kau ut _ Christ-a _ ikfiqe pestaagh lleqe ni luku _ enkaam _ sivulii luni _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ apegh yaghqaa ni luku llu _ nighug a _ yuguligh llegh m _ yug nun llu _ Gentile-enunllu _ . _ "
Paul _ mesighagh ma luku _ Festus-em _ akilghuu ghllag qagh a _ , _ " _ Paul _ , _ nallungughte uten _ ! _ liite llegh ghllag gpek _ nallungughte ste aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ governor _ festus- mi _ , _ nallungughte llghite unga _ , _ liisima lunga _ ipa meng _ akuzi u unga _ .
umiileg m _ Agrippa-m _ liisimakngwaaghaa _ tamaa na _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaan _ aleghqugh aqa _ . _ liisimake aqa _ nagaqugh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ pi kau nghite ut _ .
umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ ugpeqaqsikii _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ ? _ liisimake amken _ ugpeqe aqe aten _ ! _ "
umiileg m _ Agrippa-m _ aaptekagh a _ Paul _ , _ " _ Sumeghpenii-i _ whaa _ tan- squghhagh n _ aleghqugh lunga _ ugpegh ste naqe zinga _ Christ-ameng _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ tan- squghhagh u ghngaan _ , _ nalighmeng _ taake luku _ aleghqugh yagh ghngaamken _ yughaatkengngwaamken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeghesqelluten _ . _ ellnginagh gpek _ yughaatkengngunghitamken _ , _ yughaatkengngwaamsi _ qamagte lusi _ nagate lghii ni _ whanga mneng _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ whanga mtun _ lliighesqellusi _ iwerngaqun _ qiipraghute ngunasi _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg _ agrippa _ , _ governor _ festus _ , _ Bernice _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila i _ nekeve te tke aat _ .
aane luteng _ ellmeggneng _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ Uumun _ yug mun _ sa meng _ apallugh ite ukut _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllagh sighqagh meng _ . _ "
Agrippa-m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ Aanesnayaghaghput _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ nanqigtesqelluni _ pi kau nghite yagh kan _ . _ "
Festus-em _ Italy-tesqesugyinkut _ angyaghpag kun _ , _ aglagh te stekagh i _ Paul-llu _ ila i llu _ anusimingllaghagh t _ umiilwaaghmun _ Julius-mun _ . _ Julius-enkut _ pilluwaghtekullghiit _ ategh ke lghiit _ , _ " _ Umiilegpigaam _ Pilluwaghtengi _ . _ "
taawa _ angyaghpag _ Adramyttium-emeng _ pi _ , _ aghulaqsaqleggiinaaghtekaq _ ne nun _ Asia-m _ esnenganilngughnun _ . _ tawavek _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ Aristarchus-em _ maligte ainkut _ Thessalonica-ghmiim _ . _ ( _ thessalonica _ Macedonia-melnguq _ ) _ .
unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ Sidon-mun _ . _ Julius-em _ pinitungwaaq _ pi ke aa _ Paul _ , _ laalighte ste aqe luku _ ilakumtaagh anun _ Sidon-mi _ , _ sa meng _ aklukegkaaneng _ tuune aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
Sidon-meng _ aghulaqe ukut _ anuqe _ aygugh mun _ enkaam _ igleghte ukut _ uqiinellghakun _ qiighqagh m _ Cyprus-em _ .
iglegha ukut _ esne akun _ Cilicia-mllu _ Pamphylia-mllu _ , _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ myra- mun _ Lycia-melngughmun _ .
Tamaanteftuq _ angyaghpag _ Alexandria-meng _ pi _ , _ enkaam _ Umiilwaaghem _ Julius-em _ liigike luku _ Italy-nnaqutanga _ uugte ste ainkut _ .
Nunmaasqughhaq _ igleghte ukut _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ kaate ukut _ Cnidus-mun _ . _ anuqligh te m _ igleghapagningiitesinkut _ taagavek _ , _ igleghte ukut _ uqiinellghakun _ qiighqagh m _ Crete-em _ , _ naghughte luku _ Salmone _ .
esne ngiighhagh akun _ igleghte ukut _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ , _ kaate ukut _ kangighagh mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ , _ Uqitaghvik _ kangegh igh aq _ , _ taana _ qantaghanlenguq _ Lasea-meng _ .
Tamaanteghllagtukut _ qenwat _ yakugh nagh a _ taake luku _ igleghamun _ , _ siingenllu _ aghneq _ naghughte lghii _ priest-et _ aghqerraaghvigat _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ Jews-et _ . _ enkaam _ Paul-em _ kelenga sagh u aghagh u i _ angyaghpag m _ umiilwaaghi _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sume mni _ whaa _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh naqe ukut _ iglegha lleg mnni _ . _ ifla aqe lteggu llu _ angyaghpag ut _ usituumagh an _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ tuqu laghate te lleqe ukut _ . _ "
iwernga _ Umiilwaaghem _ Julius-em _ nagate kaqe kek _ angyaghpag m llu _ umiileg a _ , _ angyaghpag leg llu _ yuug _ avelghagh luku _ Paul _ .
allute luteng llu _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ igleghte yu ke aat _ qayughllak _ taana _ kangegh igh aq _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ uksughte vig u luni _ . _ kaate naqe na luteng _ Phoenix-mun _ pikagh t _ uksughte yaghqaa luteng _ tamaani _ . _ Phoenix-em _ kangighagh a _ qiighqagh mete ngughk _ Crete-mi _ , _ northwest-munllu _ southwest-munllu _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Ikegkemeng _ anuqataghaaghte yan _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taana ta _ anuqe _ utaqakagh ut _ . _ " _ enkaam _ uyghigh te a _ sayug luku _ telanangaakut _ Crete-em _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
iwernga _ anuqligh ghllag uq _ nakaghya meng _ enkaam _ qiighqagh meng _ atghaghtegh ghllag aa _ .
angyaghpag _ awatmun _ tengsagu _ qute mun _ taglagh naqutkesagh luta _ iilqayug ukut _ enkaam _ upuupeng _ tengtestukut _ .
qiighqagh squghhagh m _ Cauda-m _ uughqa anun _ lliigh sigh nkut _ up- qite ghraag ukut _ . _ tawani _ qamuqsaqefut _ angyat ghhagh ut _ piyaqleg iigh tke ghngaamteggu _ qaakagh ut _ .
taagken _ angyaghpag _ ayugighsagh aat _ asighte luku _ tapghaghmeng _ . _ alinge luteng _ qenaaghte lugh qugh te na yukagh meng _ Syrtis-mi _ telanangat _ ifkagh qugh luki _ tengtestukut _ .
unaami ani _ paninang _ esla _ almesiqe ghllag yagu _ , _ angyaghpag m _ usi an _ ila i _ megh mun _ ategh qugh ait _ .
awakaghaani _ esla _ almesiqe yagu _ angyaghpag m _ sanqute i _ ategh qugh ait _ .
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ siqinngunani _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ngunani _ pi uq _ esla m _ seghlegh ghllag m _ angtalanganeng _ . _ enkaam _ talwa _ iilqayug ukut _ , _ isigima qun _ tuqu laghate te naqe lghiikut _ .
yug t _ neghe gpenateng _ muluugh ghllag yata _ Paul-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ nagate kaqsagh kufsinga _ kete nayagh nghite ngugh u kut _ Crete-meng _ enkaam _ aghsaan _ seghleliigh nayagh nghite usi _ , _ saghya igh te nayagh nghite usi _ .
iwernga _ iilqayug gpenasi _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ .
unuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ taku kaqe aanga _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh _ manigugh aqe kegka _ , _ ellnga n _ pi ke aanga _ .
yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Paul _ , _ alinge gpenang _ , _ kaate lleqe uten _ Rome-emun _ , _ nekeve lleqe uten _ sivungagh kun _ Umiilegpigaam _ . _ yughagh tke kaqe te gpeneng _ angyaghpagmetelguteten _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulilleqii _ . _ '
enkaam _ quya tek _ , _ ugpeqe i unga _ kiyaghnegh kun _ tawatetngwaaghesqelluku _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ .
iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ "
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ unuk _ kellii mi _ Adriatic-mi _ tengtiinkut _ . _ taakwani _ unugem _ qukaa ni _ yulaagh t _ pi aqe ut _ qute mun _ tughwaaghsugnite ni luta _ .
tapghagh _ uqigkutagh igh luku _ megh mun _ ateghsaqmegteggu _ yuginagh _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutka uq _ . _ Tazingapighqaaghyamta _ tapghagh _ ateghllaataghyaqmegteggu _ aki mig aq _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutkaligh ma lghii _ .
yulaagh t _ alingekagh t _ angyaghpag _ qalmesite na yu kan _ enkaam _ estamaneng _ uyghigh aat _ kingu akun _ . _ taagken _ yughagh ut _ aghte ragkiigh sqellug qu _ .
angyaghpag m _ yulaagh i _ anag naqekagh t _ sivuyag a _ angyaghpag m _ uyghiite ligh naqe sighwaagh te kete luku _ , _ angyat ghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghtekagh at _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ umiileg u aq llu _ pilluwaghtetlu _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ aghulaqe gkata _ kayute pagite te lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ elpek si _ tuqu laghate te lleqe usi _ . _ "
enkaam _ pilluwaghtet _ angyat ghhagh _ kepe tke aat _ .
aghtaghagh naqe aqe a llu _ Paul-em _ qamagte luki _ neghesqughwaaqii _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ aghneq _ neghelqunghitusi _ qayughllak _ elngaatall _ kelengaruugh lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ neghesqughwaaghnaqamsi _ iknaqughtesqellusi _ . _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ talwa _ aqnighte naanghite uq _ . _ "
nepiigh yami _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tugu tete luni _ igamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ manu itni _ ikute luni _ neghekagh _ .
yug t _ ilutughsaghyisteng _ ellngit llu _ qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ .
Qerngaghllagemta _ angyaghpagmelngughni _ 276-nguukut _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ angyaghpag _ uqengelli na luku _ wheat-a _ megh mun _ ategh qugh aat _ .
aghte yagu _ qute meng _ esghaate ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liisuqe nghite aat _ natungutanga _ . _ iwernga _ kangighagh lgu uq _ esnagh leg meng _ enkaam _ taaggun _ tamlag naqe yug ut _ .
kepugh te luki _ uyghiite t _ unitekagh it _ megh mete luki _ , _ petugutagh ik llu _ aquutagh k _ naghigh qugh qu ait _ . _ taagken _ sayug luki _ telaananga t _ sivuyagmelnguut _ tengtestut _ tespikavek _ esnagh mun _ .
iwernga _ angyaghpag m _ sivuyag a _ aghqe itagh i sagh n _ kingu a _ qagi ghllag t _ kagimte aat _ .
Pilluwaghtet _ pi yagh ait _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tuqu qugh na luki _ luuraq _ qute mun _ pugime luteng _ navek _ anag na yu kata _ .
iwernga _ umiilwaaghem _ tuqute sug ma nge i tke a _ Paul _ enkaam _ iinghutekagh i _ . _ yeghlegi _ qelqe ai _ pugimaqayuggaat _ qute mun _ tagliisqelluki _ .
tamaakut _ pugime lleg ite ngugh t _ angyaghpag m _ ikellghaakun _ tugu luki _ taglagh naqe sqekagh i _ qute mun _ . _ tawaten _ qamagte luta _ yaywaaseng _ uuglleghaatukut _ qute mun _ .
yaywaaseng _ qute mun _ uugte yamta _ liigikagh ut _ qiighqagh _ malta- nge ta a _ .
Tamaakumiit _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ kumagh qite magh emta _ qayughllak _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ eslallugughte magh mi _ .
Paul _ saqumig luni _ quugkagh meng _ qiigh i ma luku _ , _ tuqunagh lghii _ nemeghyagh _ maatnegh m _ aane ste luku _ quug neng _ , _ iiggagh kun _ amqeghtekagh a _ .
Tamaakumiit _ esghagh luku _ nemeghyagh _ Paul-em _ iiggagh neng _ qughagh nga lghii _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ qaywa _ unʼgani _ megh mi _ tuqu nghite ghngaaghmi _ esghaghhu _ tuqu yaghqaa ma lghii _ . _ "
Paul-em _ iigge ni _ ufsugusaqminiki _ nemeghyagh _ ifkagh uq _ kenghegnun _ iwernga _ talwa _ nemeghyagh m _ aqnighte ma ite kanga _ .
yug t _ pi kaqsagh kangat _ Paul _ puuve ghllag naqe ni luku _ nalighmeng _ tuqu naqe ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ sa gpenani _ muluugh ghllag yan _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ una _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ . _ "
Taam _ qiighqagh m _ umiileg a _ Publius _ , _ nuna lgu uq _ ughugsigh vig mta _ tungangani _ . _ Publius-em _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ , _ ellnga nite ukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
ata a _ puqlegha u uq _ aqsalliqe magh mi _ . _ Paul-em _ esghagh yaghtugh luku _ yughagh te kete luku _ , _ saafsaqminigu _ naallghute uq _ .
Paul _ tawaten _ pi yan _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ qinuyuget _ tagi laghate tke aat _ enkaam _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tunqughtaagiinkut _ tunute yameng _ . _ tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yamta _ tunqughtagh u laatagh ainkut _ tumangani _ atughqagh mnneng _ . _ angyaghpag _ Alexandria-meng _ pi _ uksughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ ategh ke a _ " _ malghi k _ kiyaghnegh k _ " _ sivuyaganiteftuklu _ ulimaagh u lutek _ taake uk _ . _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yan _ taaggun _ uugte ukut _ .
Syracuse-mun _ kaa llu ta _ tamaantukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qapiighwtagh ukut _ Rhegium-emun _ kaate lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ . _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ tamaani _ , _ unaami ani _ anuqataghaaghte te ainkut _ ikevaghmeng _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ Puteoli-mun _ kaate ukut _ .
Tamaanteftut _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ ellmeggnitesqiinkut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ . _ taagken _ Rome-emun _ nagnegh ukut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Rome-emelnguut _ nagaqugh luta _ , _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tungangitnun _ akilpegaghvig t _ Appius-melnguut _ , _ ila ita _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tungangitnun _ pi nga yu t _ aqelqagh lghutagh t _ . _ Paul-em _ esghagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ ilutughtekagh _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Rome-emun _ kaate yamta _ Paul _ ellnginaghmetestaat _ nani _ piyukelghani _ iwerngaqun _ ataasigh m _ pilluwaghtem _ kelengake a _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ Paul-em _ tagsiqligh ai _ Jews-et _ igleghutistengit _ . _ tagi yata _ pi a _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ sa nghite ghngaamki _ yug put _ , _ nalighmeng _ kipullginaanghiteghngaamki _ nangaghnegh it _ sivunegh mta _ , _ paninang _ igleghutistemta _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ tugu lunga _ tuune aatnga _ Rome-eghmiinun _ .
Aapqughaaghlunga _ sa meng _ apallugh ite yama _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ iteme te na lunga _ pi yagh aatnga _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ ighleke aatnga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pi aqa _ nanqigte i sta _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ nanqigte sug ni lunga _ . _ Umiilegpigaghmun _ seghlequughyaghtuunghitanka _ yug lgute nka _ .
enkaam _ tagsiqligh amsi _ apegh na luki _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ . _ liite sug aqa llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ ataasigh _ Israel-eghmiit _ neghyukekagh at _ apallugh ke luku _ qiipraghusighngaanga _ . _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Judea-ghmiit _ lata tke igate aaten _ whangkunnun _ . _ talwa _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ ugpeqaalgutemta _ taagegken _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh ke igate aaten _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ akuzi tke igate aaten _ .
whangkuta _ liisugaghput _ elpenun _ sa meng _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Jesus-meng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ nani _ alngunak _ seghlequughaqiit _ . _ "
taagken _ nakmikegkagh at _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ qerngughte te vig u luku _ . _ taana _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ uglagh pigte luteng _ tagi laghate tke aat _ Paul-em _ kiyaghfig anun _ . _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ unug llegh anun _ kenlanga _ apeghtugh qu ai _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liigikestengngwaaghnaqutkegkiillu _ Jesus-meng _ atuqe luki _ liilightuusagh i _ Moses-em _ , _ uuknaliqistetlu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqekagh at _ iwernga _ ila ita _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ . _ nekeve uute aqe ut llu _ aanleghaate na luteng _ Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ipa _ pi ma lghiik _ sivunegh gpesigun _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ Isaiah-kun _ .
whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ taku luki _ ukut _ yug t _ whaten _ pi ki _ , _ Nagasaghngaaghpesi _ , _ esghapagngaaghpesi _ liigike naanghite usi _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tawatete ut _ qayughllak _ umyugagh it _ pineghlluugtekaagut _ enkaam _ sigute teng llu _ iye teng llu _ saape kaqe ait _ . _ tawatete nghite yagh kumeng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ qiive nayagh ut llu _ whanga mnun _ naallghutesqelluteng _ . _ ' _ "
Paul-em _ taaqe niite te kun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ liigike sug aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtengngwaaqaqii _ ungipaghteni _ ungipiisqelluki _ yuguligh llegh meng _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
tawaten _ Paul _ pi yan _ Jews-et _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag magh meng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ .
maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ Paul-em _ kiyaghfig kekagh a _ mangteghagh _ llivike aqe luku _ . _ upugha te aqe kangi _ qamagte luki _ iteghteni _ ,
tetug gpenani llu _ ungipagh ke aq _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ apeghtugh tkekagh a llu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ tawaten _ pillgha _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte ma ite kanga _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ ; _ qepghaghtekaanga _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ apostle-ngulunga _ , _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ ungipaqesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh ni _ .
ayumigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe ai _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ uuknaliqistemikun _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ait _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau uq _ umiileg m _ David-em _ kingunghitgun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u uq _ ighnegh a _ . _ taghneghagh m _ ipapighqegkaqaa _ unguvagh ste luku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ellnga kun _ nanglleg ke lleg nge ma unga _ apostle-ngulunga _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi kaqe aanga _ tuqliisqelluki _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ yug i _ ugpeqe sqellug qu llu _ , _ qaatke sqellug qu llu _ Christ-a _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-am _ ategh a _ quulvallengellequq _ .
elpek si llu _ Rome-emelngughni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ pikesqellusi _ .
qamagte lusi _ elpek si _ Rome-emelngughni _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ , _ tuqlugh qite te ni llu _ yuknalusi _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ Atanghemllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ kayusiillisi _ , _ nekeggmellelisillillu _ .
sivuke luku _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ mingite u uq _ yug lghute nun _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ quunpeng _ yughaatkengngukemsi _ .
yughagh aqe unga llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ qenwat llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaa lunga _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ quyastellelinnalusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ iknaqsuugtesqellusi _ .
whaten _ pi u amsi _ : _ qerngagh emta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ , _ elpek si _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ , _ whanga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ awen _ laalighfike yug aqe amsi _ iwernga _ saam _ quunpeng _ pi nghite ste aqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ kayusiite yug anka _ Rome-eghmiit _ ugpeghesqelluki _ Christ-akun _ , _ ila itnun _ Gentile-enun _ pilleg mtun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipaqesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ , _ Greek-enunllu _ Greek-ngunghilngughnunllu _ , _ peghqinegh nun llu _ nalluuqanunllu _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ ungipagh ke i yug ghllagu unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun llu _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ Rome-emi _ .
kayngu ke igate anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilqii _ yuguligh llegh mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ Jews-enun _ taagken _ Gentile-enun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ liigike ste ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh inagh itgun _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ . _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Nallghughqegkaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ neghyuke luku _ ellnga _ . _ "
qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ sakritutnguniluki _ , _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pillghitnun _ . _ seghletun _ pi llghite a _ liigike nanigh ste ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapillghaneng _ .
sa u a _ yug t _ liisimakekagh at _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ whateghlluwaaghuuq _ ellngit nun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ whateghlluwaaghughtaa _ ellngit nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima ta aneng _ nuna _ , _ yug t _ liigikngwaaghaqaat _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ , _ ipallu _ kiyaghnegh u ta a _ . _ qaywa _ yug t _ esghaghpagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ taake uk _ , _ paninang _ liisimake agket _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh akun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ apallugh ite ut _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ nallukagh ut _ kiyaghnegh lgu ta a _ .
liisimake ghngaaghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ quulviigataat _ kiyaghnegh u luku _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike igate aat llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ kiyaghnegh meng _ sea-te u nanigh kau ut _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ liigike nanigh kau ut _ .
Peghqinghuniiqut _ iwernga _ nalluughtaqut _ .
enkaam _ manigugh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ manigugh aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ , _ qawaagsugnite ngugh t _ , _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ nemeghyaghsugnite ngugh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ atuqesqelluki _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe ait _ yugusigh teng _ anagnga luki _ , _ seghleghqe aqe luteng _ sex-kun _ ila meggnun _ ,
qayughllak _ ipapilleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ naavghute ma ut _ iqlengamun _ . _ Enkaangam _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ , _ qepghagh te aqe ait llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ , _ avelghagh luku _ ulimaghista _ ellnga _ katam _ . _ ellnga u uq _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ atuqesqelluki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ aghnagh t _ sex-eyugnanighiit _ yug t _ , _ yeghlegi _ sex-eyagutut _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ yug t llu _ sex-eyugnanighiit _ aghnagh t _ , _ yeghlegi _ sex-eyaguteghllagtut _ yug lgute meggneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ta itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh ai _ yugusigh itgun _ apallugh ke luki _ anaggute llegh ghllag it _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ sumegh meggni _ sea-te u nghite na iqe aat _ liisimakipiilleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ sea-te u nghite ngugh nun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itnun _ , _ atughqagh ke nghite yagh ka itnun llu _ .
Allaaghhinaghmeng _ seghlegh meng _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ , _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ , _ pakignegh u ut _ , _ ugumi ketagh ut llu _ . _ aqinaketagh ut _ , _ yugtagh yuneghtu ut _ , _ pilluwaghyuneghtuut _ , _ puughte i yuneghtu ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ait llu _ ila teng _ seghlegh pigu luki _ . _ yiillgi aqe ut _ ,
seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ait _ ila teng _ . _ ugumi ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ yukeghqenghuut _ , _ qukaayugneghuutlu _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ wata _ seghletun _ pi na luteng _ ; _ qaatke te igate ut _ angayuqagh meggnun _ ,
nallu ut _ , _ akequsagh teng _ atuqe igate ait _ , _ nanglleg yug igate ut _ , _ nafugh ta ii te aqe ut llu _ ila meggnun _ .
liisimake ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pi lghiit _ tawatelnguut _ yug t _ allgeghsaghqaqaanʼnguq _ tuqu llegh _ . _ Nagneghutnginaghpenaki _ tamaakut _ atuqekagh teng _ , _ talwa _ itagnagh kaqe ait _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nanqigte i kuvek _ yug neng _ anagniilqavigituten _ . _ nanqigte nghpeki _ , _ elpeneng _ nanqigte aqe uten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ ellngistun _ pi aqe lghiiten _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ yug neng _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi lghii neng _ , _ liisimakagh ut llu _ nanqigte i llegh i _ elqughute nga ut _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte aqe aten _ anaggute lghiit _ , _ naqamllu _ elpek _ katam _ pi aqe aten _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ anaggute llegh t _ . _ enkaam _ sumeghpenii _ anag yaghqaa ni luku _ piziguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ ?
Liigikenghisiguu _ nangllegtaghtu langa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ aghyuugh aghte igate kangaten _ tawaninginaq _ qayughllak _ nuqetutaqegkangaten _ . _ Sumeghpenii-i _ taakut _ sea-te u nghite aat _ ? _ Liisimakenghisiguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aqe kangaten _ qayughllak _ avuteghqe sqe sug kangaten _ ?
iwernga _ elpek _ aleghqugh neghllug u uten _ , _ pineghllug u uten _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avuteghqe sug igate uten _ . _ Enkaangaam _ elpek _ katam _ ulima u an _ aghyuugh lleg nge lleghqagh n _ seghleghataghaaluku _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh lleqe ak _ sakraa lleg ni llu _ , _ elqughutngagh lghii llu _ nanqigte i lleg ni _ .
nanqigte lleqe ai _ tamaghhagh ita _ yug t _ apeghiighutellghistun _ .
ila i _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh meng _ allgeghsukangit _ usuqe llegh _ , _ quulvalleq _ , _ yugusigh llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallelilleqii _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ ellnginaayugneghuut _ . _ ugpeqe yug igate aat _ ipapilleq _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi na luteng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakrituteghllagluki _ , _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ nuna mete ngughk _ yuug _ , _ Jews-a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ seghleliighmengllu _ ikfiqe llegh meng llu _ .
iwernga _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ yuug _ , _ Jews-a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ pinitun _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe lleqe a _ , _ quulvaghlleqaa _ , _ nekeggmellelilleqaallu _ .
Taniillngunaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ .
Gentile-et _ allgeghtellghitiit _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ Moses-mun _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lghiit _ nalluke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh lgu ut _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe gkata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
tamaakut _ nagate ghesnagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh igate ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke te lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ nallghughqaqii _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
Gentile-et _ allgeghtellghitiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ iwernga _ qaute kete nghmegteki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ qaatke te llghite a _ liilightuusagh leg stun _ ayuqe ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ , _ allgeghtekaqenghiteghngaaghmegteki _ .
qaatke te llghite a _ yug nun _ liigike ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ liisimake ait _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a llu _ liisimake ste ait _ liilightuusagh t _ ilungite nightu langi _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a _ ilangakun _ anaggute na iqe ait _ nalighmeng _ ilangakun _ itagnagh na iqe ait _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ yug t _ aksaqekagh it _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ apegh aqe aqa _ taana _ ungipaqnemki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
Maatenʼngam _ lata yug anka _ Jews-et _ . _ Jew-ngukuvek _ , _ neghyu katen _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ qukaayug uten llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pikniluten _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ liisima kan _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa sqe sug llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ naten llu _ nakmike yaghqaa ta a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ sumegh gpeni _ maghyaghqughtenguniiquten _ ayaakagh nun _ , _ nighug u na iqe uten llu _ mamlegmelngughnun _ .
sumegh gpeni _ nallghusaghtenguniiquten _ nalluuqanun _ , _ apeghtughistenguniiqutengllu _ taghnughhagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh lgute gpeneng _ , _ sumegh gpeni _ liisimake ni luku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi iigh kan _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ ipapilleq _ .
apeghtugh aqe aten _ ila ten _ , _ sangan _ elpeneng _ apeghtugh igate ziin _ ? _ ungipagh kau iqe uten _ , _ " _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ " _ elpaa-ak _ , _ tegleg qiigate ziin _ ?
pi aqe uten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ " _ elpaak _ , _ gelgaghniigh qiigate ziin _ ? _ ugumi ke pigte aten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ , _ elpaak _ , _ tugute niigh qiigate ziin _ temple- nge i te neng _ ?
qukaayug taqu te n _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ni _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite nghpeki _ liilightuusagh t _ quulviigatan _ kiyaghnegh _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ apallugh ke lusi _ elpek si _ Jews-eni _ , _ Gentile-et _ sa ngugh ughte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ . _ "
Qaatkengngukufki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ circumcise-ellghen _ pinigh uq _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite kufki _ liilightuusagh t _ circumcise-ellghilngughestun _ ayuqe uten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg nge naanghite uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
gentile- a _ circumcise-ellghilnguq _ qaatke te lghii _ qelegh sagh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe a _ nikimqun _ circumcise-ekaaluku _ .
elpek si _ Jews-eni _ liilightuusagh lgu usi _ igaqe nga lghii neng _ , _ circumcise-ekaagusillu _ , _ taawanginaq _ qaatke igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ Gentile-et _ circumcise-ellghilnguut _ , _ qaatke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
Circumcise-enginaghluku _ yug m _ yugusigh a _ Jew-pigughtesnaanghitaa _ . _ Circumcise-ellepiik _ pi igate uq _ yugusigh m _ qaye inagh akun _ .
itupill _ , _ yuug _ Jew-piiguuq _ Jew-ngukumi _ ilu mikun _ . _ Ighsaqghwa _ circumcise-ekaaguq _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ nakaan _ igaqegkagh tgun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh meng _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ .
sa u a _ aneghneghqusiigwa _ yuug _ allgegh kuni _ Jew-nguluni _ ? _ sa u a _ aneghneghqusiigwa _ circumcise-elleghmun _ ?
uglagh u pigte ut _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh t _ ! _ Sivulighpigaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ Jews-enun _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ .
ila i _ ataasiighmete nghite kata _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmenneghitesleqatguu _ ?
yeghlegi llu _ ! _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ iqlengiqe ste u ghngaan _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ipa u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ akuzi negh gpeni _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake lleqe aaten _ elqughute nga ni luten _ . _ yug t _ nanqigtegkangaten _ , _ ipapighqelleqaten _ anaggute nga ni luki _ . _ "
anaggute negh mta _ , _ anaggute lleg mta _ yug t _ liigikestengngwaaghaqiit _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ pi lleqe sta _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute ni luku _ aghyuugh kanginkut _ anaggute lleg mnnun _ ? _ ( _ akuzi u unga _ yug stun _ . _ )
tawatete nghite uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughutngagh nghite kan _ , _ naten mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ nuna m _ yug i _ ?
iwernga _ yuug _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ yug t _ usuqe i ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ aliigh a qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipa u llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ sanganʼngam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte anga _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lunga _ seghleghqe stetu te _ ? _ "
yuug _ pi nayagh lghii llu _ , _ " _ seghletun _ pi lta _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ seghletun _ pilleg mnneng _ . _ " _ ila i _ yug t _ temngimeng _ pi aqe ut _ whangkuta _ apeghtugh i aqe ni luta _ tawaten _ . _ nanqigte lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ , _ aghyuugh lleghqagh megestun _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ Jews-enii _ , _ pinigh aghagh sta _ Gentile-eneng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ apegh u aqe aqe anka _ Jews-etlu _ , _ Gentile-etlu _ tawateghpigaq _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aaghqute aqe luki _ ayuqe ai _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ taawa _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
kina _ alngunak _ liigike igate uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ivagh igate a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luni _ yuug _ tunute kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ anaggute kau ut _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi igate uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
ighsalqagh it _ qelpalngughestun _ llivegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ ; _ ulu teng _ atuqe u ait _ puughtimun _ , _ qezigh megteggun _ poison-elguut _ nemeghyagh stun _ ;
qaanghit _ imigh nga ut _ curse-elleghnengllu _ , _ ugumiketiqelleghmengllu _ .
yugtagh i rakegte ut _ ;
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh meggni _ naafqii ste u aqe ut _ , _ seghleliighqistengwaaqutlu _ .
nalluke aat _ nekeggmelluni _ kiyaghte lleghqagh _ ,
talwa _ alike igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
liisimake aput _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh leg t _ qaatkesaghqagh ke ait _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ enkaam _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ nepiighqelleqiit _ yug t _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh itneng _ , _ " _ nalluke aput _ sa u ta i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ " _ liilightuusagh t llu _ liigike ste lleqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigte lleqe ni luki _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ .
nanqigtekumiki _ yug t _ nallghusagh naanghite ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ itupill _ liilightuusagh t _ liite ste ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste u ni luki _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ liilightuusagh tgun llu _ , _ uuknaliqistetgunllu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpegh lghii nun _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ allake te nghite ut
qamagte luteng _ seghleghqe kau te meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ nuughhute kau ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ itemutistengitgun _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aaw akun _ seghevute aqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ liigike stekaqe a _ elqughute nga ni luni _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuqetutkaqii _ yug t _ enkaam _ nepiigh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ ipapighqaa _ elqughute nga ni luni _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ alngunak _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ Jesus-kun _ .
enkaam _ sangaawa _ qukaayug te kete yaghqagh ut _ ? _ qukaayug te kaghqagh ite ukut _ ! _ Qukaayuggnaanghitestaa _ qayughllak _ qaute kete naqutke ke put _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kangi _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ Jesus-kun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh ut _ yuug _ nallghusagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh kun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ Jews-nginaghhaat _ Kiyaghneqatguu _ ? _ Gentile-etlu _ Kiyaghneqenghitatguu _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ Gentile-etlu _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ ,
ataasigh ghhagh u ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ enkaam _ nallghusagh lleqe ai _ Jews-et _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ , _ Gentile-etlu _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
liilightuusagh at _ sea-te u nanighqe stekagh i _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ qaatke sug ste aqe ai _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh tke ait _ .
Samengʼngam _ pi lleqe sta _ Abraham-emeng _ , _ sivunegh mnneng _ whangkuta _ Jews-eni _ ? _ sa meng _ liite kau a _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe u kagu _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ sallghakun _ , _ sa meng _ qukaayug sighqagh lgu nayagh uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qukaayug tkepagningite ai _ salleg ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh lghii u luku _ . _ "
yuug _ qepghagh llegh mineng _ akileghtuusagh nge kayugu uq _ . _ akileghtuusagh a _ tunusagh u nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ allgeghtekaqaa _ qepghagh te luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qepghagh te i llegh akun _ ellmi nun _ . _ itupill _ yug m _ neghyuke yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nallghusagh i kayug _ seghleghqesteneng _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
umiileg m _ David-em _ igaqe kaqe a _ taana _ ataasigh _ . _ pi kau uq _ yug t _ quyastepikaaniluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe yaki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ avelghagh luki _ qepghagh te i llegh it _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ segheve tke ai _ , _ anaggute llegh it _ saapekagh i _ !
quya stekau uq _ yuug _ seghleghqe llegh i _ Atanghem _ sumeghmike nanigh kangi _ . _ "
taana _ quya ste llegh _ David-em _ akuzi tkekagh a _ , _ circumcise-ekaghhiinaghnun _ pi u a _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ Circumcise-ellghilngughnunllu _ pi u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ "
qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ circumcise-ellghaan _ nalighmeng _ kingu aneng _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ circumcise-ellghan _ , _ nakaan _ kingu aneng _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ abraham _ circumcise-ekaaguq _ . _ Circumcise-ellgha _ nalluniilkutagh u uq _ ipapighqusiiluni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe kanga _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ . _ salin _ circumcise-ellghilluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ ata u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ circumcise-ellghiteghngaata _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma ai _ elqughute nga luki _ .
Abraham-llu _ ata ke aat _ circumcise-ekat _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ taawanginaghhaq _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kumeng _ Abraham-etun _ , _ salin _ circumcise-ellghilluku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe ai _ Abraham-enkut _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ iingunaghhaan _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ pagi lleqe ni luku _ . _ akequsagh ke llghite a _ taana _ Abraham-emun _ qayughllak _ qaatke kangi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ tuune yaghqaa yagh kan _ qaatke te lghii nun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ taawa _ ugpeqe i llegh _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ akequsagh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh _ sakrite aqe uq _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite nghata _ liilightuusagh nun _ tuunekagh anun _ Moses-mun _ . _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh ite yagh kan _ taawa _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite sagh ite nayagh ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ yug t _ allgegh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ aki ite ngugh u luku _ tunusagh _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ Abraham-em _ kingunghita _ allgeghtepestaaghlleqaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ Jews-nginaghhaghnun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ liilightuusagh leg nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lghii nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe i llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ qamagte luta _ atakagh ut _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ata ughte ste amken _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ akeqe kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuqukagh neng _ unguvaghtikayuk _ , _ qelegh i llegh mikun llu _ ulima te kayug _ sa meng _ sa ite ngugh meng _ .
Abraham-em _ avaquti lleghqagh a _ sighima niite kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sighimake manginagh kaqe a llu _ . _ enkaam _ ata ughtekau uq _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ kingunegh ten _ kestepagningite yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Abraham-em _ nulighh a _ , _ sarah _ , _ qumingepagningite kau lghii _ . _ ellnga _ abraham _ 100 _ ayumiqulleghtu tekagh ligh yaghtugh luni _ , _ tuqumun _ tughaaghulghii _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ sumegh ke ghngaaghmiki _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ukavagh ma ite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i nanigh mangite uq _ talwa _ aygughike mangite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh _ , _ usuqekagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Abraham-em _ ipapighqutkengngwaaqaqaa _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi yaghqaqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuguqliqaqaa _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ .
taakut _ akuzite t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuguqliqaqaa _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ igaqe kau ut _ nakaan _ Abraham-nginaghmun _ ,
iwernga _ igaqe kau ut _ whangkunnunllu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ainkut _ elqughute nga luta _ qayughllak _ ugpeqegkefut _ ellnga _ . _ ellnga u uq _ Jesus-meng _ atanegh mnneng _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqumatkesqelluki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ unguvaghtekaqaallu _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallghusagh kau te mnneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghte ste ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ani _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu ukut _ qayughllak _ liisimakngwaaghaghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengigh ste lleqe ainkut _ nighughqelleghmineng _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ quya aqe ukut _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ seghleliigh llegh m _ nuqete neghtu lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
nuqete neghtu lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnagh kaqe ainkut _ . _ itagnagh ke igh llegh an _ sighima lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
Taam _ sighima llegh m _ iilqamiqnaanghitiinkut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ qamavek _ ilu mnnun _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh mikun _ whangkunnun _ .
yugulighpag nigh nge i llu ta _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqestet _ , _ tawani _ pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ani _ .
entaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh inagh t _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh ut _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ yug mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ entaqun _ kina _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh uq _ pinigh lghii mun _ yug mun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ whangkunnun _ , _ paninang _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ !
Nalluneqniighaghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ma ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ Christ-am _ aaw akun _ . _ Nalluneqniighataghaghaghput _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ .
whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke yagh ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ ilaliigh kaqe ainkut _ tuqu llegh akun _ ighnegh mi _ . _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilakumtaagh ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ nalluneqniighataghaghaghput _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ Christ-am _ unguvallegh akun _ !
Taam _ saaghw akun _ , _ quya ghllagu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ whangkunnun _ ilaliigh te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Yuksuwhaaq _ , _ adam _ , _ seghleghqe aqngan _ , _ seghleghqe llegh an _ tuqu llegh _ itegh stekaqe a _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ qayughllak _ qamagte luni _ seghleghqe kau uq _ .
seghleghqe lleg lgu kau uq _ nuna mi _ salin _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune llghite luki _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses-mun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llghite ai _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ qayughllak _ Liilightusiilnguq _ .
paninang _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ima _ Adam-emeng _ Moses-mun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ , _ maligte te luteng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ Adam-em _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh t _ . _ adam _ Christ-atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ tagi yaghqagh tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ Adam-em _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ipa u uq _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ allgeghtekaqaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqeghqengngalghii _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ , _ piniqe llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
allake te ghllag uk _ , _ Adam-em _ seghleghqe llegh a llu _ , _ tunusagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ kingu aneng _ adam _ seghleghqe aqngan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ . _ iwernga _ kingu itneng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh stekaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ataasigh _ yuug _ seghleghqe kau uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ igleghte te ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh te lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ kemnagh pigte lghii meng _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ tunusagh aneng llu _ elqughutngagh llegh aneng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ kiyaghte llegh mi _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
apallugh ke luku _ Adam-em _ ataasigh _ seghleghqe llegh a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ ataasigh _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pillgha _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ tuune ai llu _ unguvallegh meng _ .
qaatke te nghite llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste ngughte kau ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ , _ qaatke te llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ nallghusagh yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ Moses-mun _ yug t _ liite yaaghagh ste ait _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug t _ seghleghqe aghagh yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula inaghkagh _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ igleghte te kaqe ai _ yug t _ tuqu llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ igleghte te u ai _ yug t _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ ellngit _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh aat _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
Samengʼngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ Seghleghqumanginaaltaa-a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula sqellug qu _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ qayughllak _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu kau kumta _ naten _ seghleghqe manginagh naqe sta _ ?
liisimakagh i _ , _ qamagte luta _ paaptaayaaqngamta _ ilate kau ukut _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ . _ Ilatkaagutkutlu _ tuqu llegh anun _ paaptaayaaqngamta _ .
paaptaaye lleg mteggun _ tuqu qagh u ukut llu _ qungukaagukutlu _ Christ-ami _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun _ ata m _ unguvaghtekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ kiyaghtaallelighraghaghluta _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ma kanginkut _ Christ-amun _ tuqu llegh akun _ , _ taagken _ ilate ste pestaagh lleqe ainkut llu _ ellnga nun _ unguvagh ste luta _ ellnga tun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ whangkuteluguyalghiit _ qaquuragh te kau ut _ Christ-akun _ igleqataqnaniisqelluta _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghunanighnalutallu _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yuug _ tuqu nghmini _ iteme aqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ seghleghqe llegh m _ .
tuquma kumta _ Christ-ami _ , _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghtelgusighyaghqaqaghputlu _ ellnga _ .
liisimakagh ut _ Christ-a _ unguvagh stekau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite uq _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghii ii te kau uq _ ellnga nun _ .
ataasigh ghhagh meng _ tuqu kau uq _ kayaalqennaluku _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ iwernga _ unguva te mineng _ , _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ tuqu kau lusi _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tek llu _ unguva u lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ igleqataqestegpenaki _ yugusigh si _ tuqu kayug t _ . _ seghleghqe llegh m _ igleqataqegkaki _ yugusigh si _ , _ qaatke sug lleqe asi _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ .
alngunak _ nalighnegh i _ yugusigh gpesi _ tuune gpenaki _ seghleghqe sigh u luki _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ tuune lleqe asi _ seghlegh mun _ . _ itupill _ tuune tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaqiisi _ . _ enkaam _ tuune teki _ iingunagh ita _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellnga nun _ atuqesqelluki _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ igleqataqnaanghitiisi _ qayughllak _ igleqataqngwiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ ; _ igleqataqngunghitiisi _ liilightuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ? _ itagnaghtaa- a _ seghleghqe lleghqagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ igleqataqngukanginkut _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ itagnagh nghite uq _ !
liisima kaqe usi _ tuune gkufsi _ kitumun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga n _ qepghaghtelaaqaaghlleqiisi _ . _ qaatke gkufsigu _ seghleghqe llegh _ , _ tuqu ste lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke gkufsigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nallghusagh lleqe aisi _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ maaten _ qamakerugllak _ qaatke kesi _ apeghtugh te yagh ragh aat _ apeghtuusagh kekagh t _ elpesi nun _ .
iteme te kau usi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ liigike neghllug ta itneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ uspute aqe u anka _ qepghaghtelaaghetlu _ piliitestengitlu _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ tuune kayugu yagh asi _ yugusigh si _ qepghaghtelaaghuluki _ nukeggnagh lghii nun llu _ nula manginagh lghii nun llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ . _ maaten _ tuune teki _ yugusigh si _ qepghaghtelaaghuluki _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ kiyaghtesqellusi _ pelungite lusi _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghwaaqngafsi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ igleqataqellghitiisi _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ pi kau usi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ kayngukaaghtasi _ tamaakut _ seghletun _ pi kasi _ . _ sangaawa _ allgeghtekaghsi _ tamaakut _ pi luki _ ? _ Allgeghtekaqaghsi _ tuqullghiinaghhaq _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ iteme te lusi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pelungiightesimiisi _ , _ allgegh tesi ma aisi llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
akileghtuusagh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqu llegh u uq _ ; _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngugh u uq _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ lata amsi _ liisimake i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ liigike asi _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh aqe ait _ yug t _ kiyaghtengnguluki _ .
ugu i iqe aq _ aghnagh _ usputagh u uq _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ qelegh llegh ani _ aghnagh _ ugiminisaghqaaguq _ tagtale atun _ ugi mi _ kiyaghte llegh an _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu kan _ ugi ni _ , _ taawa _ iteme lleqe uq _ liilightuusagh aneng _ nengughte llegh m _ .
iwernga _ , _ ugi ni _ unguva luku _ alla mi _ yug mi _ kiyaghtekuni _ gelgaghni ii aghte u luni _ atigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugi a _ tuquma kan _ , _ iteme lleqe uq _ taagken _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ gelgaghniigh u nghite uq _ ugiigh nqigtekuni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpek si llu _ iteme ma usi _ liilightuusagh neng _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ Christ-ami _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ pi ke aisi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ whangkunnun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
sivugh nghaani _ qaatke aqe aput _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe i ste sug aqe ainkut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gkumteki _ tuqu ste lleqe ainkut _ .
sivugh nghaani _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ tuqu kau te mnneng _ Christ-ami _ , _ iteme te kau ukut _ qaatke te yaghqaa lleg mnneng _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ enkaam _ qepghaatngwaaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvalleghraghagh mteggun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ nakaan _ unguvallegh lug mteggun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
Samengʼngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ liilightuusagh at _ seghleghqe llegh u aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ liite stekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ sa u ta i _ . _ liite nayagh nghite aqa _ qiliiqetu iqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ liilightuusagh _ whaten _ qelegh i mangite yagh kan _ , _ " _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ "
iwernga _ atuqe luku _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ qiliigh ketagh ngllagh kaqe aanga _ . _ liilightuusagh ngunateng _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tuqu u aat _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghtengnguyaghtunga _ liilightuusagh ngunaan _ ; _ iwernga _ liisagh kegka _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh _ unguvagh luni _ enkaam _ tuqu unga _ .
qelegh sagh _ unguva ste i yaghqaa yagh lghii _ whanga mnun _ , _ yeghlegi _ tuqu ste aanga _ .
taaggun _ qelegh sagh kun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ puughsaqlegughtaanga _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe luku _ qelegh sagh _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ .
iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ agleghnagh lghii u ut _ , _ qelegh sagh llu _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ , _ elqughute nga uq llu _ , _ pinigh uq llu _ .
Taam _ qelegh sagh m _ pinigh lghii m _ , _ tuqu ta nge a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ atuqe luku _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ legh igh iitagh ut _ qelegh sagh kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ maghyaghqugh u nghite aanga _ taghneghagh m _ . _ Maghyaghquungwaanga _ yugusigh ma _ piyuke llegh an _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaaghuunga _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
liigike igate aqa _ sa aqe tke a _ qayughllak _ atuqe igate aqa _ sa u a _ atuqe yu kaqe a _ . _ itupill _ atuqe aqe aqa _ sa u a _ ugumi ke kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ atuqe gkumki _ ugumi kekagh nka _ atuqe yu nghite ghngaamki _ , _ taawa _ itagnagh kaqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ta i _ .
enkaam _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ .
liisimake aqa _ avangite unga _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilu mni _ , _ yugusigh mni _ . _ pinitun _ piyug aqe yagh ghngaaghma _ , _ pipagningite aqa _ .
pi igate aqa _ pinigh lghii _ piyuke kaqe a _ , _ yeghlegi _ seghlegh _ pi aqe aqa _ piyukenghitkaqa _ .
enkaam _ piyukenghitkaqa _ pinegh mkun _ , _ taawa _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ . _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh u aqe uq _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ liite aqa _ taana _ : _ pinitun _ pinaqeghngaghma _ , _ paninang _ seghlegh _ tawantaquq _ .
Qaamkerugllak _ pinighyuugusiqanka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
iwernga _ liite aqa _ taawa _ ila a _ liilightuusagh _ yugusigh mnite uq _ . _ Pilluwaqangi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh ma _ itagnaqegkii _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ yugusimnilnguum _ seghleghqe ste aqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe unga _ tea- mete te _ liilightuusagh mun _ .
Seghleghwaaghuunga _ ! _ kitum ngam _ iteme te lleqe anga _ whaken _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu ste i yaghqagh meng _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itemuskanganga _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ atanegh mteggun _ ! _ Enkaangam _ qaatke anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh mkun _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh mkun _ qaatke aqa _ liilightuusagh _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ whanga mneng _ .
Enkaangam _ kinku t _ alngunak _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ ilate kau kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ .
qayughllak _ liilightuusagh an _ taghneghagh m _ unguvallelitilghiim _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ iteme te kaqe aanga _ liilightuusagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh m llu _ tuqu llegh m llu _ .
Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i _ tawaten _ pipagningite ut _ qayughllak _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llghite a _ kayaaleghqegkaqii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ liilightuusagh t _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ seghleghqe ma lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe luku _ . _ tuune kaqe a _ ighnegh ni _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ . _ tawaten _ nanqigtekaqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ yugusigh mete luku _ ,
whangkunnun _ qaatkesaqlegughtesqelluki _ liilightuusagh t _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ Whangkunguut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luta _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh itnun _ .
tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit _ piyuke lleg teng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ .
umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ iwernga _ umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvallelilleqiinkutlu _ nekeggmellelilleqiinkutlu _ .
umyugagh put _ malighqutaqenghata _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ anguyagwaaqukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke igate ke put _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ ipa _ qaatkepagningite aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh anun _ efqughtepagningitaat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ igleqataqngunghitiisi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh an _ . _ Igleqataqngwiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ , _ qayughllak _ ipa _ kiyaghtengngulghii _ ilu gpesini _ . _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghtengngunghilkayek _ ilu ani _ yug m _ , _ pike nghite a _ Christ-am _ .
yugusigh si _ tuqu naqngu ut _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ kiyaghtengngukan _ ilu gpesini _ , _ taawa _ taghneghagh m _ unguvallelilleqiisi _ , _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ nallghusagh stekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ unguvaghtikak _ Jesus-meng _ , _ kiyaghtengnguuk _ ilu gpesini _ . _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh ste llegh atun _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ unguvagh ste lleqe ai _ yugusigh si _ taghneghagh gmikun _ kiyaghlleghhiignekun _ ilu gpesini _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
Kiyaghtengngukufsi _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe usi _ . _ iwernga _ Taghneghagnekun _ tuqute kufsiki _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqengʼngalghiit _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ .
qayughllak _ tamaakut _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ai _ .
taghneghagh m _ allgeghtekaghpesi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qepghaghtelaaghughtesneqiggnaanghitiisi _ alinge llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ taghneghagh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ste aisi _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ tuqlughaghaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ Abba _ ! _ Ataay _ ! _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ ellmegneng _ ilate kau uk _ taghneghagh mnnun _ ungipaate na luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ni luta _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pagitistekiinkut _ , _ Christ-amllu _ pagite i ste lgutke ainkut _ . _ Nighughqellengellequkut _ Christ-atun _ ikfiqe gkumta _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh atun _ .
sume mni _ ikfiqe lleg put _ unguvallegh mnni _ inglutepagningite ut _ nighughqelleghmun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliighte yaghqagh anun _ whangkunnun _ .
ulima uq _ qamagte luni _ utaqa i u uq _ qelanegh lleg ligh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aliightesqelluki _ kinku u ta i _ avaquti a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ ulima uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luku _ enkaam _ atugh u nanigh ste a _ . _ ulima uq _ nanqigtesunghitkaaguq _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ naqamllu _ paninang _ sighima lleg lgu uq
qayughllak _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te lleqe a _ ulima uq _ aghu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ ulima uq _ ila lleqe uq _ iteme nga llegh ghllag itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ iingunagh mi _ ulima uq _ ngillegtengnguuq _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu lghii m _ .
iwernga _ ulimaagh ghhagh u i naanghite uq _ ngillegte lghii _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ngillegtengnguukut _ . _ Whangkunguukut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi leg ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusaqsugwhaagha _ whangkunnun _ . _ Ngillegtengnguukutlu _ ilu mteggun _ utaqa i ma luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ allughqisqelluta _ avaqutagh u luta _ ellnga nun _ , _ itemutesqellukillu _ yugusigh put _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ .
taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ yugulikaagukut _ . _ iwernga _ allgeghsimakumteggu _ sighimakekagh ut _ , _ taawa _ sighima llegh u nghite uq _ . _ yug t _ sighima igate ut _ sa meng _ allgeghtengngwaaqameggneng _ .
iwernga _ sighima ma kumta _ sa meng _ allgeghtekaqenghilkemnneng _ , _ utaqalleqaghput _ qelanegh gpenaamta _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ taghneghagh m _ kayusigh aqe ainkut _ kayaate lleg mnni _ , _ qayughllak _ nalluke lghiikut _ naten _ yughagh lleghqagh ke yagh ke mtestun _ . _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yughagh te aqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ngillegte llegh ghllag kun _ akuzite u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ai _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ . _ liisimake ai llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh m _ yughagh te kaqe ai _ yug i _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luki _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qepghagh ste aqe ai _ qerngagh ita _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun _ piniqistemi _ . _ Ellnginguut _ tuqlugh qu ai _ uspeqe llegh mitun _ .
Tamaakunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kestaghkagh i _ . _ aaftekaqe ai llu _ ighnegh mitun _ lliighesqelluki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ighnegh ni _ allgegh yuwhaagh ma sqellug qu _ anglegutelghutanganeng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh ni _ tuqlugh kaqe ai _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tuqlughkagh ni _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ nallghusaghkagh ni _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ quulvaqaqii _ .
Samengʼngam _ pi naqe steggu _ una _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ whangkunnun _ ayuqe u kan _ , _ kitum ngam _ tengvimun _ pi lleqe inkut _ ?
ighleke mangite a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ ; _ itupill _ tuune kaqe a _ aghqe te u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kanginkut _ ighnegh mineng _ , _ taawa _ ellnga kun _ ighleg gpenani _ tuune lleqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
kitum ngam _ anaggute ni lleqe aki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ anaggute llghite ni kaqe ai _ !
kina ngam _ pi lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni luki _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ? _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi lleqe agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ tuquma tke ikagh _ whangkunnun _ , _ unguvaghtekaaguqlu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ maaten _ yughagh te kaqe ainkut _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
Saamngam _ iqite ste lleqe inkut _ piniqe llegh aneng _ Christ-am _ ? _ Seghleliillghaam _ , _ piyaqliillghaam _ , _ amyuqetaatkellghaam _ , _ paneghniqellghaam _ , _ aklumallghaam _ , _ yakughnaam _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqutellghaam _ ?
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ yug t _ tuqute yug aqe ainkut _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh meggni _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe na iqe ainkut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ kayaalqengngwaaqaqaput _ Christ-akun _ piniqistemteggun _ .
Liisimakngwaaghaqa _ saam _ alngunak _ iqite snaanghite ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ : _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ unguvallegh m _ , _ yaquleg t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh- t _ . _ talwa _ sa u a _ sa ghngaan _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ sivu mi _ agani _ , _ nalighmeng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghet _ .
