talwa _ sa u aat _ qule mnni _ nalighmeng _ asi mnni _ . _ ulimaagh mi _ iqitestiyaghqaqraggiituq _ whangkunneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ pi ke aanga _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m llu _ igleghte te u ak _ umyugagh gka _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ whaten _ : _ qivghu ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ qaamggurugllak _ ilu mkun _ naange igate ngugh meng _ aqnighqutkeghllagwaanka
yug lgute nka _ , _ Jews-et _ . _ piyaqleg u yagh kan _ , _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m tuq _ nanqigtegkanganga _ aghyuugh na lunga _ , _ iqite stegkanganga llu _ Christ-ameng _ .
yug lgute nka _ Israel-em _ kingunegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ allughqi kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ aliightekaqe a _ nighughqelleni _ ellngit nun _ . _ Akequuqaqii _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ellngit nun _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh mineng _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ elqughute luki _ . _ Akequuqaqiillu _ quya ste lleqe ni luki _ qaatkegkangatni _ .
kingunegh ke ait _ sivuneqsuwhaamta _ , _ taakutgun _ kinguneghteggun _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugu luni _ . _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ usuqe lleg nge i _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
Kiyaghneghaam _ akequsagh ni _ pi mangite agu _ Israel-eghmiinun _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ akequsagh ni _ pika qaa _ ellngit nun _ , _ iwernga _ ila inagh ghhagh i _ kingunghi _ Israel-em _ Israel-eghmiipiguut _ .
ila inagh ghhagh i llu _ Abraham-em _ kingunghi _ ellnga n _ avaqutapiikii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ abraham _ whaten _ , _ " _ Kingunghet _ elpenun _ akequsagh nka _ Isaac-ekun _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ ila i _ avaqutagh t _ allgeghkagh t _ Abraham-emun _ avaqutagh ke nghite ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ allgeghkagh ghhagh inagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh akun _ Abraham-emun _ kingunepiikii _ Abraham-em _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ Abraham-emun _ whatete uq _ , _ " _ ayumiqun _ uteghnigh kuma _ whaten _ lliigh kan _ sarah _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ "
taana _ Sarah-m _ ighnegh a _ Isaac-nguuq _ , _ sivunegh ut _ . _ nulightugh luni _ Rebecca-meng _ , _ ata ke ak _ malghi k _ ighnegh gkenka _ Rebecca-m _ .
talwa _ salin _ allgegh llghite lukek _ , _ salin llu _ pi igate lukek _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ rebecca _ , _ " _ Nuyekliim _ qepghagh u lleqe a _ uyuqligh _ . _ " _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liigike sqellug qu _ ellnginagh mi _ nakmiightenguniluni _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ taana _ ighnegh _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh yukagh a _ . _ nakmike kaqe nghite a _ qayughllak _ taam _ ighnegh m _ sa u a _ pi kaqe ta aneng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ piniqe kaqe aqa _ Jacob _ , _ naqam _ ugumi ke kaqe aqa _ Esau _ . _ "
Samengʼngam _ pi naqe steggu _ taana _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
qayughllak _ moses _ whaten _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ nangllegtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nanglleqsaghqamnun _ ; _ nafughtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nafuqe yaghqagh mnun _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ yug t _ allgeghtepagningitaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ piyuke luku _ nalighmeng _ sa llegh megteggun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ nanglleg ke yaghqagh minun _ .
akuzite ni _ Igakegkani _ igaqe nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ pharaoh _ whaten _ , _ " _ umiileg ughte stekaqe amken _ kelgute na luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghilqa _ elpegun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ungipagh ke lleqe aat _ ategh ka _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kayugu a _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ , _ pineghlluugtestaqaallu _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ .
enkaam _ aapleqaghpenga _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ tawatete u kan _ , _ sanganʼngam _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ aygugh ii nagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ "
iwernga _ kina u ziin _ , _ yug mi _ , _ veghusnaasken _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ qiku meng _ ulimaagh m _ sagnegh m _ aapte igate a _ ulimasteni _ whaten _ , _ " _ sangama _ whatete lunga _ ulima zinga _ ? _ "
yug m _ qiku meng _ sagnengllaghtem _ piyuke llegh mitun _ atuqe yaghqaqe a _ qiku _ . _ ulima yu kumikek _ maalghug _ ataasigh meng _ qiku meng _ pi yaghqaqe ak _ , _ aag llegh a _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ atugh u luku _ , _ ila a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ atugh u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute yu kaqe a _ ugumi yug llegh ghllag ni _ , _ liisimake sug aa llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleni _ . _ iwernga _ nuqetunneghpakaqii _ nanqigtekagh ni _ naafqennaluki _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liisimake sqellug qu _ nighughqelleghllani _ nanglleg kekagh minun _ . _ yataaghqe kestagh kaqe ai _ ellngit nun _ allgeghtesqelluku _ nighughqelleni _ .
talwa _ whangkuta llu _ tuqlugh kaqe ainkut _ , _ nakaan _ Jew-nginaghneng _ iwernga _ Gentile-enengllu _ .
Hosea-m _ uuknaliqe llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ Gentile-eneng _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ yug ke nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ yug nka _ ' _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piniqe nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ piniqekagh nka _ ' _ .
tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate vig itni _ , _ ' _ yug ke nghite amsi _ ' _ , _ tawani llu _ atigh lleqe ait _ , _ ' _ avaquti a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
Isaiah-m _ akilghuu tke kaqe a _ israel _ whaten _ , _ " _ qaywa _ Israel-eghmiit _ esne m _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ uglagh tatekagh ligh nga a ta _ , _ tawalliima _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ Atanghem _ kimaawillngunani _ nanqigtengngwaaghlleqii _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ Isaiah-m _ pi naqe ni llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ siipte te mangite yagh kanginkut _ kingunegh meng _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluta _ naafqe lleg nge nayagh ukut _ Sodom-enkuk _ Gomorrah-nkuk _ ne ghllag gketun _ . _ "
Samengʼngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ Gentile-et _ , _ ellmeggneng _ nallghusagh naqutke mangite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ .
Israel-eghmiit _ malighqutagh ke naqutke kau ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ elqughute nga na luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ pilaataqu mangite ut _ .
sangameng _ pilaataqu nghite aat _ ? _ qayughllak _ nallghusagh naqutke lghiit _ ellmeggneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sa llegh megteggun _ , _ neghyuke gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghusiisqelluteng _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ naagte aqe ut _ " _ naagte sigh kun _ uyghag kun _ . _ "
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ ii-i _ , _ Zion-mi _ nekegte aqa _ uyghag _ yug t _ naagtesqelluki _ , _ taam _ uyghag m _ iquslegh ke ai _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpegh kuni _ ellnga kun _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ piyuke pigte aqe anka _ whanga _ katam _ yug nka _ Jews-et _ yugulillengesqelluki _ ! _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ !
whaten _ piighhe naqe anka _ yug nka _ : _ qepghagh te yu pigte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ liigike igate aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghagh te sug aqe te ni _ ellngit nun _ .
liigike llghite aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ elqughutngagh ngllagh naqutke aqe ut _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ tugukligh igate aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh a _ .
Christ-a _ kenle ke aat _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
moses _ igagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nallghusagh i lghii meng _ yug neng _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ , _ " _ yug m _ qaatke ma kaki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ taakutgun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallghusaghkagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ qelegh kau uq _ , _ " _ aapte gpenang _ , _ ' _ kina _ mayugh lleqe a _ qilag mun _ ? _ ' _ " _ ( _ ukiggnaluku _ Christ-a _ nuna mun _ ) _ .
nalighmeng _ aapte gpenang _ , _ " _ kina _ ukig lleqe a _ Abyss-mun _ ? _ " _ ( _ mayugh te na luku _ Christ-a _ tuqumeng _ . _ )
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ qantaghante uq _ elpenun _ . _ akuzi tke lleqe an _ qanegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe lleqe an llu _ ilu gpegun _ . _ " _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ taananguuq _ ungipaqegkefut _ . _ )
apegh kuvgu _ qanegh gpeneng _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Atanghuniluku _ , _ " _ ilu gpeneng llu _ ugpeqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvaghtesimaniluku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ .
yuug _ ugpegh uq _ ilu mikun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aa _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ apegh aa llu _ qanegh mikun _ ugpeqekagh ni _ , _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ellnga _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
allangughte te ite ut _ Jews-etlu _ Greek-etlu _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ quya ste ghllag aqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ Tamaghaghmi _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ naten _ yug t _ tuqlugh lleqe atgu _ ugpegh nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten _ ugpegh lleqe aat _ , _ nagaqugh te nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten llu _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ ungipaqistengunateng _ ?
naten _ yug t _ ungipagh qite lleqe aat _ ellnga neng _ wetku _ kayagte lleg nge gkumeng _ ? _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ pinighnagh ghhagh meng _ itegagh it _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ! _ "
iwernga _ ila inagh ita _ qaatke kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ Isaiah _ aaptekau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kitum _ ugpeqe kaqe agu _ ungipagh ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu naanghite uq _ nagate gpenani _ ungipagh meng _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
iwernga _ pi aqe zinga _ Israel-eghmiit _ nagaqugh te nghite ni luki _ ungipagh meng _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ nagaqugh pestaagh kau ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ me it _ aghulaqe ma ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ ; _ akuzi ta it llu _ kenle itnun _ nuna m _ . _ "
alla _ aapqughaallelguunga _ : _ Israel-eghmiit _ liigikenghitatkii-i _ Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut _ ellngit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yukatkii _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ liigike ma ait _ . _ sivuke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ moses _ whaten _ pi sta _ : _ " _ elpesi nun _ aqinake ste naqe anka _ Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut _ . _ Israel-eghmiingunghilngughteggun _ liigike igate ngugh tgun _ ugumi yug ste naqe amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ Isaiah _ tetug gpenani _ apegh i kau uq _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pillghaneng _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ ivagh i ma ite ngugh t _ whanga mneng _ , _ naalke kaqe aatnga _ . _ Tamaakunun _ aapte i nghite ngugh nun _ whanga mneng _ , _ liite stekau unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ israel- meng _ kiyaghnegh _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Aghnelqusighllak _ nengug te anka _ iigge nka _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ , _ kipullginaalghiinunllu _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ " _ Kiyaghneghaam _ Israel-eghmiit _ yuksugnanightakii _ ? _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ whanga _ katam _ Israel-eghmiinguunga _ , _ Abraham-em _ kingungha _ , _ Benjamin-em _ ramke aneng _ pi u unga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yuksugnanillghitii _ yug ni _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe ai _ salin _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ Liisimakenghistegguu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ Elijah-m _ qikeghqutkegkaqegkangi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Israel-eghmiit _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ uuknaliqisteten _ , _ ullegh qugh kaqe ait _ aghqefig ten _ ; _ whanga inagh ghhagh u unga _ siipnegh _ , _ tuqute naqutke aqe aatnga llu _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ paninang _ 7,000-meng _ yug lgu unga _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Baal-mun _ . _ "
maaten llu _ tawatete ut _ . _ siipnegh lgu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nakmiigh ma kuni _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ pinitun _ pillghitgun _ . _ tawaten _ nakmike ma kumiki _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ .
whaten _ pi aqe unga _ : _ Israel-eghmiit _ naalke llghite aat _ ivaghkagh eng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ghhagh inagh ita _ naalke kaqe aat _ . _ ila i _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pineghlluugtestekaqii _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh it _ liigike yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ Whavemun _ kenlanga _ aghnegh mun _ iye it _ esghagh yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ , _ sigute it llu _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ "
David-llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neqenghaghqe llegh it _ negaghagh ughte lit _ , _ naapte llegh ughte lit _ , _ naagte sigh ughte lit _ , _ aghyuugh i sigh ughte lit _ ellngit nun _ .
iye it _ ayaa lleg nge lit _ esghaghnaniisqelluki _ , _ qukagh it llu _ pakegnenglit _ uqig itneng _ seghleliigh llghite a _ quunperugllag _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ Israel-eghmiit _ naagte aqngameng _ , _ alla _ nekevepagningite aqe aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ Israel-eghmiit _ seghleghqe llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ Gentile-et _ yuguligh lleg nge ut _ . _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge llghite a _ Israel-eghmiit _ aqina ste ait _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ Israel-eghmiit _ tagite na luku _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ Israel-eghmiit _ iflii llghite a _ tagite aat _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ Gentile-enun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ nakmikegkagh t _ Israel-eghmiit _ , _ ilate kumeng _ yugulikanun _ , _ quya ste llegh t _ naten mi _ uglaghtatkalleqat _ !
maaten _ aleghqugh yug amsi _ elpek si _ Gentile-eni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ apostle-ngulunga _ Gentile-enun _ . _ enkaam _ piraamsi pigte lunga _ pi aqe aqa _ una _ megnu nagh lghii _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ .
apeghtugh i lleg mkun _ elpesi nun _ aqina ste na luki _ pi anka _ Jews-elgutenka _ , _ ila i _ yugulillengesqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighsa kaqe yaki _ Jews-et _ , _ nuna m _ yug i _ Jew-ngunghilnguut _ ilaliigh stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ Jews-et _ tugukligh nqigtekumiki _ , _ unguvaghlleghhiistun _ tuqukagh t _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ .
neqekrangllagh m _ ikelleqsuwhaagha _ tuunekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh u u kan _ , _ taawa _ iingunagh mi _ neqekrangllagh k _ agleghnagh uq _ . _ Akghwi _ uqfig m _ agleghnagh kata _ , _ avayagh i llu _ agleghnagh ut _ .
Jews-et _ piitesighaghkagh stun _ olive-em _ uqfigagh tun _ ayuqe ut _ ila i _ avayagh an _ ayemtekagh t _ . _ elpek si _ Gentile-eni _ avayagh stun _ ayuqe usi _ ayemtekagh t _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ olive-em _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taameng _ uqfig meng _ , _ kitum _ tugu luku _ avayagh _ nekegtekunigu _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ olive-em _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ akugh m _ mesugh aneng _ piite na pigte lghii meng _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ avayagh neng _ ayemtekagh neng _ . _ Qukaayugtegpenasi _ , _ qayughllak _ avayagh raaghinagh u usi _ . _ akugh t _ iknaqughtesigatasi _ , _ akugh u ut _ iknaqughsaghilghiit _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ avayagh t _ ayemtekau ut _ nekegte na luta _ uqfig mun _ . _ "
taana _ ipa u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemte aqe ai _ avayagh t _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ ellnga _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nekegte stekaqe aisi _ uqfig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ qukaayugtegpenasi _ , _ yeghlegi _ alinge tek _ .
Jews-et _ avayaghpigaagut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemtekaqe ta aneng _ avayaghpigaat _ , _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ ayemte lleqe aisi _ uqfig meng _ nagnegh te nghite kufsigu _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ aghyuutagh pigte uq llu _ . _ aghyuugh aqe ai _ seghleghqekagh t _ , _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ neghyuke manginagh nghpesigu _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ neghyuke nanigh ma kufsigu _ elpek si llu _ kepe te lleqe aisi _ .
Jews-et _ ugpeqe nqigtekumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nekeggneqigte lleqe ai _ uqfig mun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ne ke yagh ka itgun _ .
elpek si _ Gentile-eni _ avayagh pig ke nghite aisi _ piitesighaghkagh m _ olive-em _ uqfig an _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kepe kaqe aisi _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ olive-em _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taagken _ nekegtekaqe aisi _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ olive-em _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ nekegte i igate yagh nga a ta _ uqfig mun _ tawatelngughmeng _ avayagh meng _ . _ Jews-et _ piitesighaghkagh meng _ olive-em _ uqfigagh neng _ pi u te meggneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ellngit a _ katam _ uqfig itnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liigike sug amsi _ sa meng _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ Apeluugusiqa _ elpesi nun _ unanguuq _ : _ peghqinghuyugneghufqaafsi _ pisqellusi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ ila ita _ Israel-eghmiit _ ugpeqe yug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tawatete lleqe ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ Gentile-et _ qamagte luteng _ tagi laghate te llegh itnun _ ellmi nun _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ Israel-eghmiit _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ yuguligh i sta _ tagi lleqe uq _ Zion-meng _ ; _ iqite lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ kingunghaneng _ Jacob-em _ .
taana _ akequsagh ke aqa _ ellngit nun _ iqite kumki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
Jews-et _ ighsake kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke ai _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Gentile-eni _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ ighsake i llegh at _ quya ste na lusi _ . _ iwernga _ Jews-et _ paninang _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ yug t _ . _ piniqe manginagh u ai _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ sivunghitnun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh gni _ allangughte qaghte naanghite ak _ . _ veghte naanghite ai _ tunusagh ni _ , _ pegge naanghite ai llu _ nakmikegkagh ni _ ellmi nun _ yugu luki _ .
sivugh nghaani _ elpek si _ Gentile-eni _ qaatkellghitaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ allgeghtaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ qayughllak _ Jews-et _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ .
maaten _ Jews-et _ qaatke te igate ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ Gentile-eni _ . _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ellngit a llu _ allgegh lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ yug t _ qaatke igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ qaatke te nghite llegh at _ anusimingllaghvig tun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawavek _ kanaghte aqe kangi _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanglleg ke na luki _ qamagte luki _ .
kaay _ , _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aklungi i _ , _ peghqinellegh a _ , _ liisima llegh a llu _ ! _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ? _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ igleghneghi _ ?
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kitum _ liisima kakek _ umyugagh kek _ Atanghem _ ? _ kitum ngam _ aleghqugh lleqe agu _ apaqu tete na luku _ ?
kitum _ alngunak _ salisigataguu- u _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh mun _ llivike sqellug qu _ uteghmun _ ? _ "
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga kun _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga nun llu _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh pigtu ta aneng _ , _ elngaatall _ kayeme amsi _ tuunesqelluki _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguva lghii u luki _ aghqe te t _ . _ pelungite lit _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lit llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Taananguuq _ maniguute lleg pig i _ .
Uum _ nuna m _ yug atun _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ allangughte stek _ nutaghte ste luki _ umyugagh si _ . _ taagken _ liigikelleqaghsi _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ , _ qamagtiingwaaghngalghiillu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ta aneng _ tunute yameng _ apostle-ngulunga _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi unga _ : _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ elpesi neng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ ayuqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ yeghlegi _ ipapighqellusi _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe tek _ ugpeqilleghtulegpesigun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ elpesi nun _ .
yugusigh put _ nalighneghtu pigte ut _ , _ tamaghaghmi _ nalighnegh _ alla tun _ sa yaghqaa uq _ .
uglagh yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasigukut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ nalighnegh ni _ whangkunneng _ pikutukut _ .
qamagte luta _ allake te lghii neng _ tunusagh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ . _ tunusagh ut _ ungipagh ke i u kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ ungipagh ke i lta _ ugpeqe i lleghtu ta leg mtestun _ .
tunusagh ut _ qepghagh te i u kan _ , _ qepghagh te i lta _ , _ apeghtugh i u kan _ , _ apeghtugh i lta _ ;
kayeme i u kan _ ila meng _ , _ kayeme i lta _ ; _ tuune i u kan _ , _ ighleg gpenaamta _ tuune i lta _ ; _ igleghte te i u kan _ , _ sagiqe luta _ igleghte te i lta _ ; _ nanglleg ke i u kan _ , _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nanglleg ke i lta _ .
piniqe tek _ ipapighqellusi _ . _ ugumi ke luku _ seghlegh _ , _ piyuke manginagh teggu _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ .
piniqe te utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ . _ Quulvaatutaqitek _ pakiggulluku _ quulviisqesulleghpesineng _ .
Taakunginaghhaagneng _ qepghagh tek _ , _ ighsani fqaafsi _ . _ sagiqe te luku _ qepghagh ta qite ggu _ atanegh _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ .
quya nga tek _ qayughllak _ sighima lleg lgu usi _ , _ nuqete aqe tek _ nekeggmellusi _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ , _ yughagh aqe tek llu _ iiwleng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutegpesinun _ aklu lghii nun _ tuune i aqe tek _ , _ upugha ta iqe tek _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ .
yughagh te kaqe teki _ amyuqetaatkistesi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quyastesqelluki _ , _ nakaan _ aqnightesqelluki _ .
quya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ quya lghiit _ , _ qiya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ qiya lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ nekeggmetullusi _ . _ Qukaayugtegpenasi _ yeghlegi _ ila ke teki _ ukavantalghiit _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ peghqinghunilusi _ ila gpesineng _ .
kitum _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ , _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ . _ pi aqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ tugukligh yugnagh lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh i _ kiyaghtesqellusi _ nekeggmellusi _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ akiniigh naqe gpenaki _ seghletun _ pistesi _ , _ itupill _ pegte ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh anun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ whanga u uq _ akiniigh yaghqagh _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ . _ "
igaqe nga uq llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ anguyag n _ iyatagh u u kan _ neghe ste naken _ , _ meqsug u kan _ meghsi naken _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ naasqwakun _ may- ughte vike lleqe an _ kumangalghiimeng _ coal-meng _ . _ "
kayaalqe ste gpenasi _ seghlegh mun _ , _ itupill _ kayaalqe teggu _ seghlegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh kun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ qaatke te yaghqaa uq _ aangwaaghughtekanun _ igleghutistenun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u naanghite uq _ wetku qun _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stekunigu _ . _ igleghte te i ste u ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ai _ igleghutisqelluki _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ igleghutistet _ , _ qaatke igate ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ aghyuugh ste lleqe uq _ .
pinitun _ pikayug t _ alike igate ait _ igleghutistet _ , _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pikayug t _ alike yaghqaqe ait _ . _ alike yu nghite kufsiki _ igleghutistet _ , _ pinitun _ pi tek _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe lleqe aisi _ .
Igleghutistet _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghtekii _ aneghneghqelleghqaghpesinun _ . _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pi kufsi _ , _ alike nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh ma ai _ aghyuughesqelluki _ seghletun _ pikagh t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghtekii _ , _ aghyuugh i stekagh i llu _ seghletun _ pi lghii nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke teki _ igleghutistet _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuughtesunghilnguusi _ . _ iwernga _ taananginaq _ apallugh u nghite uq _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ qaatke te llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ .
taake uk llu _ apallugh ke lukek _ llivike aqe asi _ tax-esi _ , _ qayughllak _ igleghutistet _ qepghagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh katen _ pi nghmegteki _ .
Enkaangam _ tax-et _ asengesi _ qamagte luki _ llivike teki _ igleghutestegpesinun _ . _ sii vag qite ki llu _ quulvaghtekillu _ qamagte luki _ .
asenge gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ iwerngaqun _ piniqe llegh i _ asengeknginaghteggu _ ila gpesinun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkumiki _ yug lgute ni _ qaatkengngwii _ iingunagh ita _ liilightuusagh t _ .
igaqe nga ut _ liilightuusagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ " _ qaatke lleqe aten _ taakut _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ alngunak llu _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ qaatke gkuvgu _ una _ qelegh sagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ . _ "
kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i kuni _ yug lgute mineng _ , _ seghletun _ pi naanghite ai _ . _ piniqe i llegh mikun _ qaatke te u uq _ ii- u nigh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ .
tamaakut _ pi teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ma uq _ . _ qavagh lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ iwernga _ maaten _ taghtugh yaghqaaghte usi _ . _ yuguligh llegh ut _ tughaaghtuq _ ugpegh yuggaagh lleg mnneng _ .
unuk _ alpag yaghtugh uq _ , _ whaa _ aghte yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ . _ taaqe lteki ngam _ atuqe nghmeng _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ mamleg mi _ . _ enkaam _ tugu lteki _ pilluwaasighqat _ nighug mi _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte lta _ katam _ yug stun _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ seghletun _ teghigniqe fqaamta _ , _ suume fqaamta _ , _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe fqaamta _ , _ pilluwutefqaamta _ , _ aqina te fqaamta _ .
itupill _ akulghaaghestun _ aate ggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqiita llu _ atuqe na luki _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh it _ .
upugha teggu _ yuug _ ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaq _ akule gpesinite ngughk _ . _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ke gpenaan _ sa u a _ upeqegkaa _ elqughute nga ta a _ nalighmeng _ anaggute nga ta a _ .
ataasigh m _ yug m _ ugpeqe a _ negh yaghqaa ni luni _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ ugpelleghqestaaghhaq _ negh aqe uq _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
yug m _ neghe kayug m _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ siivakligu _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ . _ yug m _ neghe kayug m _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ , _ nanqigte nghite ligu _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma a _ .
kina u ni luten _ pi aqe ziin _ nanqigte i lghii _ kitum _ qepghaghtenganeng _ ? _ Qepghaghtem _ pi liite i ste inagh te _ nanqigte lleqe a _ pinitun _ pi ma ta a _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ pi ma ta a _ . _ Atanghem _ qepghaghtenga _ pinitun _ pi lleqe uq _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ kayusighyaqlegukanga _ pinitun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yug m _ ugpeqe a _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luku _ ila itneng _ aghnegh neng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ ugpeqe ai _ qamagte luteng _ aghnegh t _ tawatelkunniluki _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ umyugagh gni _ ataasiightengngwaaghlikek _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ megnu nagh luku _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulvaghnaluku _ atanegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghe gkunigu _ alngunak _ neqe _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulvaghnaluku _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ neqe meng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghyu nghite kumiki _ ila i _ neqe t _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulvaghnaluku _ atanegh _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
unguva igate ukut _ whangkunnun _ , _ tuqu igate ukut llu _ whangkunnun _ .
unguva kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ unguva u ukut _ . _ tuquma kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaamta _ Atanghem _ pi ke ainkut _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu luni _ , _ unguvaghtekaaguq _ Atanghunaluni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
elpek si _ , _ sangan _ nanqigte aqe steki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ ? _ sangan llu _ siivakigasteki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ ? _ neqamike luku _ , _ qamagte luta _ nekeve yaghqaa ukut _ sivungagh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ellnga nun _ nanqigtesqelluta _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ unguva lghiinga _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ segesqughte uute lleqe uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ yug m _ usuqe lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apeghyaghqaqaghput _ sa llegh ut _ , _ sangan llu _ tawaten _ pimatfut _ .
Enkaangam _ taaqe lta _ nanqigtunneghmeng _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ umyugagh put _ ataasiighte lteki _ ugpeqaalgutfut _ naagte ste fqaan _ nalighmeng _ seghleghqe ste gpenaan _ pi steggu _ .
atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ liisimakngwaaghaqa _ avangite uq _ iinghutekagh meng _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug m _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ sa u a _ iinghute kau luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga ni _ iinghute kau uq _ .
ugpeqagh u lguten _ uniigh miqe ma kan _ sa meng _ neghekagh gpeneng _ , _ taawa _ piniqe nanigh magh an _ . _ neghekagh gpenun _ naafqe ste gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ Christ-am _ tuquma tkekagh a _ .
ugpeqe gkan _ pinigh uq _ ; _ akuzi tke ste gpenaan _ seghleghu luku _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ sa u aat _ neghekagh put llu _ meghekagh put llu _ megnu nagh nghite ut _ . _ ukut _ megnu nagh ut _ : _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ quya llegh llu _ ; _ taakut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ .
taakut _ atuqe luki _ qepghagh te i lghii m _ Christ-amun _ , _ efqughlleqaa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ itagnagh kete lleqe aat llu _ yug t _ .
enkaam _ atugh lteggu _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghqagh _ , _ kayemughtu te lta llu _ ugpelleghtughtaghaghnaluta _ .
naafqe gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ neqe _ . _ qamagte luni _ neqe _ negh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute nga uq _ neghe lleghqagh _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh _ kitumeng _ .
itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ kemekragtu nghite llegh _ , _ wine-etunghitelleq _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ naagte ste i yaghqagh _ ugpeqaalgutegpesinun _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh llu _ liisimake yaghqaqe atek _ tamaakut _ ugpeqekagh ten _ . _ quya nga aqe uq _ yuug _ atuqe nghminiki _ ugpeqekagh ni _ elqughute nga ni luki _ seghleghni tke gpenaki _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ neghekagh ni _ , _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ anaggute nga ni luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe a _ qayughllak _ pi nghite kanga _ sa u a _ ugpeqekagh ni _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ugpeqekagh ni _ anaggute nga ni luku _ atuqe ma kunigu _ seghleghqe lleqe uq _ .
whangkuta _ ugpeqe i lleghtuqagh ni _ kayusiite yaghqaqe aput _ ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaat _ seghleliigh nghata _ . _ Efqughsaghqaanghitukut _ whangkunneng _ .
itupill _ , _ tamaghhagh emta _ efqughhnaqelteggu _ ugpeqaalgutfut _ ellnga n _ katam _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ , _ ugpeqilleghtughtesqelluku _ .
talwa _ Christ-a _ efqughsimangituq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ yeghlegi _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ yug t _ seghlequulghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ seghlequullghit _ tekite aqe ut _ whanga mkun _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ apeghtugh na luta _ . _ nuqete neghtu ste ainkut _ , _ kayeme ainkut llu _ sighima lleg nge na yukagh mta _ .
nuqete neghtu llegh nkuk _ , _ kayeme llegh nkuk _ kiyaghneghtagh u uk _ . _ ellnga n _ kiyaghteslisi _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ katam _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pillghatun _ .
taagken _ qamagte lusi _ qerngagh gpesi _ ataasigh stun _ usuqelleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ katam _ Christ-am _ tugukligh kayugu kangisi _ elpek si _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
amenqun _ Christ-a _ qepghaghtengughtekaalghii _ Jews-enun _ liigikesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh _ iiwleng _ ipapiiquq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jews-et _ liisimakngwaaghaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ sivunghitnun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi kau lghii llu _ Gentile-enun _ usuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ Enkaangam _ usuqe lleqe amken _ akule itni _ Gentile-et _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ usuqe i llegh meng _ ategh gpenun _ . _ "
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ Gentile-eni _ , _ quya tek _ maligte te lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ ! _ "
alla _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ atanegh _ , _ qamagte lusi _ Gentile-eni _ ; _ usuqe teggu _ , _ qamagte lusi _ yug ni _ ! _ "
Isaiah _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Kingungha _ Jesse-m _ tagi lleqe uq _ igleghte te na luki _ Gentile-et _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ sighima ste i lghii _ . _ imigh lisi _ quya llegh ghllag meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ ellnga _ . _ taagken _ sighima lleg nge aghagh lleqe usi _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimakngwaaghamsi _ pi niigh pigte usi _ yug ni _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ liigikngwaaghluki _ ayuqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghtuusaqlegwaasi _ ila itnun _ .
iwernga _ tetullngunanga _ lata kaqe amsi _ sa meng _ ila itneng _ negh ka ughte na lusi _ tamaaken _ . _ tawaten _ lata unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusug ightugh aanga
qepghaghtengulunga _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ Gentile-enun _ . _ Priest-etun _ ayuqe aqe unga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ Gentile-enun _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh kau iqe unga _ ellngit _ tunusagh tun _ ayuqesqelluki _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ agleghnagh ste a _ tunusagh _ .
enkaam _ qukaayug taqu nga _ qepghaqagh mneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
akuzite kete yaghqaqe anka _ Christ-am _ apeghiighkagh ghhagh inagh i _ whanga mkun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ Gentile-eneng _ qaatke te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mkun llu _ qepghaqagh mkun llu _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghet _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ ungipagh ke u aqe aqe anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ Jerusalem-emeng _ taagaverugllak _ Illyricum-emun _ .
iiwleng _ piyuke llegh kesagh aqa _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna ni _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh ni _ Christ-ameng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qayughllak _ nekefte i yug u nghite ngugh u nga _ tunemagh kun _ ila yan _ yug m _ piinlighkagh akun _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ salin _ ungipaate igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ salin llu _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ liigike lleqe aat _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh ghngaan _ elpesi nun _ pipagningite aqe unga _ qayughllak _ ila itni _ nuna ni _ ungipagh kau iqe lghiinga _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ apeghiigh aqa _ qepghaqagh ka _ maani _ . _ uglagh lghii ni _ ayumiqullegh ni _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigte aqe yagh unga _ ,
enkaam _ sunanguq _ maaten _ laalighfike lamsi _ Spain-mun _ pi tkellug qu _ . _ laalighte te aghte lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ sunanguq _ kayusigh tengnga _ aghulaqe naqe gkuma _ Spain-mun _ .
iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ , _ Jerusalem-mennaqaqunga _ kayusiite na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ tamaanlenguut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Macedonia-melnguutlu _ , _ Achaia-melnguutlu _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i kau ut _ mani meng _ kayusiite na luki _ akluma lghiit _ akulngitnilnguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
quyake sigh ke luku _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ taakut _ Gentile-et _ asengemiit _ Jews-et _ qayughllak _ allgegh te kau lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste i llegh aneng _ ellngitgun _ . _ enkaam _ Gentile-et _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ait _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe ait _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ tuyugh luki _ mani meng _ .
whaa _ kelqennaqaqa _ Gentile-et _ mani at _ Jews-enun _ . _ apeghiigh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ tuune luku _ mat- ni _ ellngit nun _ , _ laalighfike yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ , _ taagken _ Spain-ellequnga _ .
liisimake aqa _ kaate kuma _ elpesi nun _ , _ pi lgu lleqe unga _ Christ-am _ iingunagh an _ quya ste llegh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ maligte te lusi _ whanga mnun _ yughagh tke ghllag qaghte ngnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiitesqellunga _ .
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ paqniighsiisqellunga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ Judea-mi _ . _ yughagh tke teggu llu _ qepghaqagh ka _ Jerusalem-emi _ tugukligh yugnigh sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ quya lleg ligh ghllag lunga _ , _ enkaam _ pinighyuuggneqigllequnga _ laalighfike ma lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nekeggmellelitilghii _ tamaghaghpesinilli _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ ugpeqaalgutemnneng _ , _ Phoebe-meng _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ deaconess-a _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ Cenchreae-m _ .
upugha tete nakesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ piiqellghistun _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ . _ Kayutkesunghisi _ kayusigh aqe luku _ qayughllak _ kayute ghllag u uq _ uglagh lghii nun _ yug nun _ , _ whanga mnun llu _ talwa _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Priscilla-nkuk _ Aquila-nkuk _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ qepghagh lgutke agka _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ .
talwa _ tuqute lleghqagh ek _ pi tke gpenaan _ paqniighsaghqaqaagnenga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu unga _ elkegkeneng _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ Gentile-et _ yughaghvigitnilnguut _ iyamsiqa yug u ut _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ mangteghagh gkeni _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ piniqe kaqe a _ Epaenetus _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ Asia-mi _ ellnga _ ugpegh yuggaagh kau uq _ Christ-akun _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ mary _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevuute luni _ qepghagh te kaqe aisi _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Andronicus-enkuk _ Junias-enkuk _ Jew-lgutegka _ , _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke kaqe agka llu _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ Apostle-nguuk _ yug t _ liisimake u aqe ke t _ ; _ sivu mni _ ugpeqagh ughtekau uk _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Ampliatus _ , _ piniqe kaqe a _ atanegh kun _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ .
Unipaataghhnakesi _ Urbanus _ , _ qepghalgutfut _ Christ-amun _ , _ piniqe kaqe a llu _ Stachys _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Apelles _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge aqngami _ ipapighqegkaqaa _ ataasighmitelleni _ Christ-amun _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ nengllugutangi _ Aristobulus-em _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Herodion _ , _ Jew-elgutka _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nengllugutanganilnguut _ Narcissus-em _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Tryphaena-nkuk _ Tryphosa-nkuk _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ qepghaghtenguuk _ atanegh mun _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ piniqe kaqe a _ Persis _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevute luni _ qepghaqagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Rufus-enkuk _ naa ke te lghiik _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ rufus _ Atanghem _ nakmike kaqe a _ , _ naa an llu _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aanga _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Asyncritus-enkut _ , _ Phlegon-enkut _ , _ Hermes-enkut _ , _ Patrobas-enkut _ , _ Hermas-enkut _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ ugpeqaalgutet _ ellngitnilnguut _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Philologus-enkuk _ , _ Julia-nkuk _ , _ Nereus-enkuk _ nayag ke te lghiik _ , _ Olympas-llu _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellngitnilnguut _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh te meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ-am _ yughaghviganilnguut _ , _ liisimake sug aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qelegh amsi _ kelengasqellusi _ tamaakuneng _ aafqugh te ste i kayug neng _ , _ tunute ste i lghii neng _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llegh itneng _ , _ kipullginaalghiineng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ liitekagh gpesineng _ . _ iqite nga tek _ tamaakuneng _ .
yug t _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ qepghagh te u nghite aat _ Christ-a _ atanegh ut _ . _ Taawanginaghhaq _ ellmeng _ katam _ efqugh kekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ apeghtugh i negh meggni _ akuziteghlluwhaat _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ usuquughtaqiitlu _ yug t _ puughhe na luki _ puughte yuguma lghiit _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ atanegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quyake ghllagu amsi _ . _ Peghqinghusugamsi _ sa mun _ pinigh lghii mun _ , _ iwernga _ anaggutellngunasi _ seghlegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellelitilghiim _ qantaghaqun _ kagimte lleqe a _ tughneghagh _ itegagh gpesi _ asi ani _ . _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
Qepghalgutma _ Timothy-m _ , _ Jew-lgutmallu _ Lucius-enkut _ , _ Jason-enkut _ , _ Sosipater-enkut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
Tertius-nguunga _ , _ igagh te aqe aqa _ Paul _ lata aneng _ . _ whanga llu _ suumqagh ke amsi _ atanegh kun _ .
whanga _ Paul _ , _ Gaius-metaqunga _ . _ mangteghagh ani _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayugu ut _ . _ ellnga n llu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ne ghllag mta _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste yan _ , _ Erastus-em _ , _ ugpeqaalgutemtallu _ Quartus-em _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ ellnga n _ ayepsugighsaghyaqlegwii _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ ungipagh qu manginagh aqe ke mkun _ yug nun _ . _ Taananguuq _ aksaqekagh _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma nge i tke a _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ , _ piinlegh ite ngugh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ igaqugh llegh itgun _ uuknaliqistet _ . _ qelegh te ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ liitesqelluki _ yug nun _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ ugpeqesqellunillu _ qaatkesqellunillu _ .
Ellnginaaguq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ peghqinegh lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ yug t _ usuqe litgu _ quunperugllag _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ apostle-nguluku _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutfut _ Sosthenes _ whanga mnite uq _ .
lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ugpeghtengitnun _ Corinth-melngughnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh anun _ yuknalusi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ pelungitesqellusi _ maligte te lusi _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ tamanganilngughnun _ , _ yughagh kayug nun _ atanegh mnnun _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluta _ Atanqaghput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmellelguslilsillu _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nanglleg ke kaqe aisi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
enkaam _ ellnga kun _ aklungi igh i kau usi _ liigike llegh meng llu _ akuzillegh meng llu _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ liigikataghaghlleqaghsi _ Christ-a _ , _ akuzitkataghaghlleqaghsillu _ atanegh _ .
allangughtekagh m llu _ kiyaghtaalleghpesi _ ipapighqaa _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ Christ-a _ .
agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ tunusagh lgu usi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ utaqa i u lusi _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpegh lleg si _ iknaqughsaamanginaghnaaghii _ kenlanga _ kingulighpigagh mete te _ aghnegh mun _ . _ inqun _ anaggutellghitesqellusi _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nanqigte i kan _ yug neng _ .
Ataasiighmelnguum _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ilatesqellusi _ ighnegh minun _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ atanegh mnnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ategh akun _ pi amsi _ taaqesqellusi _ aaghtiiraagh te nghmeng _ . _ aafqugh te gpenasi _ . _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si llu _ sa naqe lleg si llu _ ataasiighte naqe luki _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ila ita _ Chloe-em _ nengllugutangan _ ungipaate kaqe aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe ni lusi _ .
ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ Paul-em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ " _ ila si _ , _ " _ whanga _ Apollos-em _ . _ " _ ila si _ " _ whanga _ Peter-em _ . _ " _ paninang _ ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ Christ-am _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ qafsinaghqaghsi _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ Paul-em _ qaquraatkegkaqisii _ ? _ paaptaayekagh u tsi _ Paul-em _ ategh akun _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ paaptaayemangilkegka _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ iwerngaqun _ Crispus-enkuk _ Gaius-enkuk _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi naanghite uq _ paaptaayemaniluni _ ategh mkun _ .
( _ atwhay _ paaptaayekagh ke anka llu _ Stephanas-enkut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ neqamike nghite aqa _ kina _ alla _ alngunak _ paaptaayematka _ ) _ .
Christ-am _ paaptaaye ligh sqe mangite aanga _ , _ iwernga _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ ungipaqisqellunga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ atuqe luki _ yug m _ peghqinellegh i _ , _ luuraq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghiite ste na yukagh mkun _ qaquuragh a _ Christ-am _ .
ungipagh _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ temngingu uq _ ifla naqe lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge lghii ni _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilqaa _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Peghqinghet _ peghqinellegh at _ atugh u nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ liitekagh ghllag t llu _ liite llegh at _ sasii nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ "
enkaam _ sanaqanʼngam _ nuna m _ peghqinegh lghii i _ ? _ Sanaqanʼngam _ apeghtughiste i _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ Sanaqanʼngam _ aaghtiiraaghtet _ ? _ Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ liitelleghllallghat _ sasii nghite uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha ngllagh kaqe a _ peghqinellegh a _ nuna m _ .
peghqinellegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ nuna m _ yug anun _ nalluke lleqe ni luni _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike ai _ yugulinaluki _ qamagte luki _ ugpegh lghiit _ Christ-ameng _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ . _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ taana _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ temngingu ni luku _ .
Jews-et _ esghaate yug aqe ut _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleghneng _ ugpeqe na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ; _ Gentile-et _ peghqinellegh nge yug aqe ut _ ugpeqe na luku _ ungipagh _ ipa u ta a _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ungipaqnaqngwaaghput _ Christ-amun _ tuqu tke kaqe ni luki _ qaquuragh kun _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ Jews-eni _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ ugpeqe yaghqaa luni _ , _ Gentile-eni _ teme igh u u uq _ .
iwernga _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ Jews-ngughngaamta _ , _ Gentile-ngughngaamta _ tawatete nghite uq _ . _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh an _ qaquuragh kun _ liite stekaqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu _ peghqinellegh aneng llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha llegh a _ peghqinghataghgaghtuq _ yug m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaate llegh a _ iknaqe aghagh uq _ yug m _ iknaqe llegh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luku _ natete yagh u tsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlughaqngisi _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ peghqinghuyaghtusi _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh itni _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ aghtugh igate yagh usi _ igleghutistet _ , _ nalighmeng _ aklungilngughneng _ nengllugute neng _ pi u yagh usi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ nalluuqat _ nuna mi _ kayngusaaknaluki _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ kayaalnguut _ nuna mi _ kayngusaaknaluki _ tamaakut _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ ukavanlenguutlu _ asitnginaaqiitlu _ nuna mi _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ , _ yug nun _ liigikesqelluki _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh it _ aangwaagh u luki _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte naanghite uq _ nekeve gkuni _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuunistesi _ unguvallegh meng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ tuune ste ainkut _ peghqinellegh meng _ , _ elqughute ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ agleghnaghtestiinkutu _ , _ iteme te ste ainkut llu _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
Enkaangam _ atuqe lteggu _ , _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte yu kuni _ , _ aangaayugte te kete liki _ Atanghem _ apeghiighkagh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh aqngama _ elpesi nun _ , _ atuqe mangite anka _ akuzite t _ liigikepagningilkesi _ . _ peghqigh llegh ghllag mkun _ ungipagh ke i yu nghite unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
pakig kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i yu lghiinga _ Jesus _ Christ-anginaghhaghmeng _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ qaquuragh kun _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ tetug aatagh kau unga _ , _ alingruugh kau unga _ , _ ungelegtekau unga llu _ .
Kukragnalghiimeng _ akuzi tke mangite unga _ peghqinegh ghllag m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghan _ ipapighqegkaqii _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ ipa u ta i _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpegh usi _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ nakaan _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ peghqinellegh a _ .
Angtaniitkanun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtuusagh ke aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ nuna meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ igleghutistenganeng _ . _ qantaghaqun _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ .
peghqinellegh _ apeghtuusagh ka _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh ke a _ , _ nalluke aat _ yug t _ . _ yug t _ nallukngwaagh yagh kangat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste llegh anun _ . _ talwa _ nuna ngllagh mangite luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe yaghqaa luta _ pi kaqe ainkut _ peghqinellegh mikun _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ nuna m _ igleghutistengita _ liigike mangite aat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ . _ liigike kaqsagh kumegteggu _ , _ qaquuragh nayagh nghite aat _ Atangha _ nighughqellghem _ .
igaqegkagh ni _ akuzite ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ iye m _ esghamangilkangi _ , _ tamaakut _ sigute m _ nagaqugh ma ite kangi _ , _ tamaakut _ umyugagh m _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma ite kangi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe kaqe ai _ piniqisteminun _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike stekaqe ai _ whangkunnun _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ . _ taghneghagh m _ yuvghiigh aqe a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaamnarugllaganilnguut _ .
yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ .
nuna m _ taghneghagh aneng _ allgegh te mangite ukut _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ allgeghtekaqagput _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi k _ , _ liigike na luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ whangkunnun _ .
enkaam _ akuzi igate ukut _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe aqe aput _ akuzite t _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ apeghtuusaqnemteki _ taghneghagh m _ ipapillghi _ tamaakunun _ allgegh tekagh nun _ Agleghnaliigneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ allgegh te ma ite ngughk _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ tugukligh i igate uq _ tunusagh neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi neng _ . _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ temngitwha u ut _ ellnga ni _ . _ liigikepagningite ai _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayusillegh igh inagh u kete te _ liigike yaghqaa uq _ .
yug m _ allgegh tekagh m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ nanqigte aqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite a _ ellnga _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pillghistun _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ Atanghem _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liilightugh naanghite a _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ sumeghtaghagh llegh atun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nite aqngama _ aleghqughpagningite kaqe amsi _ aleghqughwaqellemtun _ ugpeqagh ghllag t _ . _ yeghlegi _ aleghqugh kaqe amsi _ ugpegh lleg si _ anglillghilngughestun _ ayuqe luki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ Christ-akun _ taghnughhaghhaghestun _ ayuqe ut _ .
Kukragnangunaan _ apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ . _ katam _ tawaten _ mamagh ghhagh meng _ meghe ste lghii stun _ pi kaqe amsi _ . _ neqe pig meng _ neghe stepag nigh nge i te kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ neqepigtughpagningilnguusi _ salin _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ neqe pigtughpagningite aqe usi _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ ayuqe usi _ salin _ . _ Liigikestengngwaaghsi _ ugpegh llegh gpesi _ angli nghite llegh a _ aqina llegh gpesigun llu _ aghiva te llegh gpesigun llu _ . _ Ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ kiyaghtengnguusi _ .
naligh i _ pi nghmini _ , _ " _ whanga _ Paul-em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ila si llu _ pinegh meggni _ , _ " _ whanga _ Apollos-em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ pi aqe usi _ .
kinangaawa _ apollos _ ? _ kina u zinga _ whanga _ ? _ Qepghaghtekiinkung _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayusiite kaqe amsi _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ qepghaqagh leg staghhiinagh u ukung _ Ataneghem _ qelegh tekagh aneng _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighagh vike aisi _ . _ piitesighagh aqe unga _ , _ Apollos-em _ meghqe aqe a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu sta qaa _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ piitesigh u aghagh lghii llu _ meghqe i lghii llu _ ukavantuq _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh _ aange ghllag uq _ nagu ste i kayugu uq _ .
piitesigh u aghagh a llu _ meghqe i sta llu _ tawatelkutuk _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ak _ qepghagh llegh gkenkun _ .
qepghagh lgutke te ukung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ; _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesigh u aghagh vike aisi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ke aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh _ tagivagh qagh a _ atuqe luku _ piinligh kaqe aqa _ qepghaqagh _ elpesi ni _ . _ peghqinegh lghii stun _ tunemagh iqe aqe aqa _ mangteghagh _ ulima yaghqagh _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-anginaaguq _ tunemagh _ , _ alla _ saaghw akun _ tunemaghqagh ite uq _ . _ ila ita _ ulima vike u aat _ qaye akun _ . _ qamagte luni _ piraamsi luni _ ulima li _ .
ila ita _ atugh lleqe aat _ gold-a _ , _ silver- a _ , _ jewel-a _ , _ ila ita _ unaghsigh _ , _ paligh iqe aq _ vegaagh _ , _ ungagagh llu _ tunemagh kun _ taaggun _ .
sa u a _ atuqekagh ut _ esghaghyaghqaqaghput _ ataasikaghtaamta _ qamagtengngwaaghluta _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ Christ-am _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ani _ . _ Kenghem _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke a _ qepghaqagh ut _ nateghtu langa _ .
sa u a _ yug m _ atuqekagh a _ kumagh nghite kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ ila yan _ yug m _ qepghaqagh a _ ifla yaghqaa uq _ kumagh kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge naanghite uq llu _ . _ Naqamenraq _ ellnga _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ kenegh meng _ aane lghii stun _ .
Liisimakngwaaghaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke aisi _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghtengnguuk _ ilu gpesini _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ naafqe gkagu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke a _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ . _ elpek si _ temple- ke aisi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ puughte te qugh a mi _ ellmi neng _ pi li _ . _ naligh i _ sumeghtaghagh u u kuni _ liite pagllag kau ni luni _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ , _ yeqay _ maligte ligu _ Christ-a _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ temngingunighngaatgu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuni _ elngaatall _ peghqinghughtepiiglleqaa _ .
kiyaghnegh mi _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh a _ temngingu uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Peghqinghet _ yug t _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pipagningite te ste aqe ai _ ellngit a _ katam _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ "
igaqe kau uq llu _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ liisimake a _ peghqinghem _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ sasii nghite uq _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qukaayug te kete yaghqaqe nghite ai _ sa u aat _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sighqagh ughte stekaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ,
talwa _ Paul _ , _ apollos _ , _ peter- llu _ . _ nuna llu _ una _ , _ unguvallegh llu _ , _ tuqu llegh llu _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kiyaghtaalleghmelnguq _ maaten _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kaate yaghqagh _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ elpek si _ pi kasi _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ Christ-am _ pi ke aisi _ , _ Christ-a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke tekut _ qepghaghtekniluta _ Christ-amun _ . _ Qepghaghtenguukut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ whangkunnun _ .
Christ-am _ qepghaghtengi _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut _ .
whanga _ , _ ataasiighmete ni lunga _ qepghagh a _ pi kufsinga _ , _ nalighmeng _ ataasiighmete nghite ni lunga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kanganga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete naanghite aqa _ . _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ nanqigte igate unga _ .
nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ anaggute mate ka _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute llghite ni lunga _ pi nghite unga _ . _ Atanghhiinaam _ nanqigte yaghqaqe aanga _ .
Enkaangam _ wiin _ nanqigte gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ sallghaneng _ . _ Atanghem _ tagi nqigtekuni _ kukegte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ ilu it _ aliighqelluki _ sa u aat _ iigh nga yagh lghiit _ tesqamani _ . _ Aliighqesaghqaqii _ sangameng _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ taagken _ usuqe yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ usuqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Apollos-lu _ whangkutung _ uspute aqe u ukung _ . _ usputagh u ukung _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ una _ igaqe na lghii _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ " _ qaatke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ igaqe nga lghiit _ akuzite ni _ igaqekagh ni _ . _ " _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesi _ aangaayugte te kete yaqunaan _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ aag llegh a _ ugumi ke luku _ .
kitum _ pinigh aghagh ste isi _ ugpeqaalgutegpesineng _ ? _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pikagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kangisi _ , _ aangaayugte gpenasi _ . _ ungipagh gpenasi _ whaten _ , _ " _ Sangwa _ qamagte luku _ whanga mneng _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ "
Allgeghtengngwaaghumaaghsi _ aklukegkaghsi _ qamagte luku _ ! _ Aklungighingwaaghlusi _ ayuqe usi _ ! _ Whangkungunasi _ umiileg ughte ma usi _ ! _ umiileg u lghiisi tuq _ , _ enkaam _ umiileg u te i lgusigh nayagh amsi _ !
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ainkut _ apostle-eni _ ukalighpigaaluta _ yug neng _ . _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh stun _ . _ yug t _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ .
whangkuta _ nallungughtekau ukut _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigu usi _ ugpeqagh ni _ . _ yug t _ waakigate ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ sumegh gpesini _ elpek si _ nagate aqe aisi llu _ quulvaghaqiisillu _ , _ whangkuta _ pi igate ainkut _ .
Whavemun _ kenlanga _ neqangisag aqe ukut _ , _ meghyaghqagh isag aqe ukut _ , _ aatkagh isag aqe ukut _ . _ yug t _ qevute kaqe ainkut _ . _ ne ite ukut _ , _ igleghtaagukut _ quunpeng _ .
qepghagh aqe ukut llu _ qevuute luta _ mani nge na luta _ kiyaghtaaghusighqameng _ . _ Seghlequulghiit _ whangkunneng _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ . _ ugpeqagh u te mnneng _ amyuutkenghinkut _ akuzilgiigatukutlu _ akite igate aput llu _ .
Iqlengiqutkenghinkut _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ tawaten _ pi fqiita _ pisqelluki _ . _ Whavemun _ kenlanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ainkut _ sakwaagh stun llu _ sasiinghilngughestunllu _ .
lata u nghite unga _ kaynguyuggnalusi _ . _ iwernga _ piniqe pigte lusi _ whanga _ katam _ taghnughhaqelghistun _ liilightugh yug aqe amsi _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh gpesineng _ .
qaywa _ apeghtughistetupigsaghngaaghpesi _ Christ-ameng _ , _ atatu ghllag nghite usi _ . _ Ugpeqsuwhaghaqngafsigu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nagaqugh luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ tawani ta _ ata stun _ lliigh kanga _ elpesi nun _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghte sug pigte amsi _ whanga mtun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Timothy _ kayagtengngwaaqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe aqa _ atanegh kun _ . _ Ataasiighmelnguq _ ugpeqe aq _ piniqe pigte aqa _ . _ negh ka ughte naagh aisi _ naten _ whanga _ kiyaghte aqe lleg mneng _ Christ-amun _ . _ Tawatelnguq _ kiyaghtaalleq _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ ugpeqagh nun _ tamanganilngughnun _ .
ila si _ aangaayugneghughtaqut _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ laalighte naanghite ni lunga _ pi kaqe aatnga _ Corinth-mun _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ . _ taagken _ liigike lleqe anka _ aangaayugneghet _ aangaayugte llegh megestun _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ akuzite tgun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaate kuma _ sasqesugestengnga _ ? _ Anagutalighlungaa _ aghyuughlamsii _ , _ nalighmeng _ piniqe lusi _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ pilamsii _ ?
nagaqugh aqe aqa _ naligh gpesi nguq _ a ta mi _ nulighh a _ nulighqelghiistun _ ayuqe a _ . _ seghlegh pigte lghii meng _ seghleghqengnguuq _ talwa _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ atuqe ste nayagh nghite aat _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ .
paninang _ yuuke te kaqe tsi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ? _ Qivghughllagyaqlegestun _ ! _ elpek si _ iqisaqlegestun _ yuug _ taana _ akule gpesineng _ .
Uyavanteghllagyaghngaaghma _ sumeghtaghagh tke ghllagu aqa _ . _ Tawanlengughestun _ elpesi ni _ agghi tke kaqe aqa _ naten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ taana _ yuug _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ . _ ugpeqagh ni _ , _ allameng _ qerngughuskufsi _ , _ tawanlengughestun _ umyugagh mig ke lunga _ , _ aghtughyaghqanghillegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ yuug _ taana _ elpesinite ste gpenaan _ allameng llu _ pi nakesi _ . _ tuune teggu _ tughneghagh- mun _ , _ piyuke llegh mitun _ yugusigh a _ naafqelligu _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh kek _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug kek _ atanegh _ tagi nqigtekan _ .
Piniiyugtelleghsi _ seghleghu uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ " _ Yeast-am _ ghhuughtesteghllakayuwaa _ akuute aq _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallug ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh t _ akulegpesinilnguut _ iqite ki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pelungite lleqe usi _ akuutagh stun _ yeast-angilngughestun _ . _ ipa _ pelungite usi _ qayughllak _ Christ-a _ Passover-em _ pennagh ii aghagh aqe a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
katam _ Jews-et _ iqitellghistun _ yeast-at _ mangteghagh meggneng _ yataaghqe te vagilgamegteggu _ Passover-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ seghleghqe lleg put _ iqite lleqe aput _ . _ Enkaangam _ pelungite lleqe ukut _ , _ ipapighqengngallequkutlu _ .
ila itgun _ lata ma _ ilate nga snanigh amsi _ ugpeqagh nun _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghii nun _ .
Akuzitkengngunghitanka _ uum _ nuna m _ yug i _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh t _ , _ wayaghniightet _ , _ nalighmeng _ tamaakut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ iqite yu kufsi _ tawatelngughneng _ yug neng _ nuna _ unisaghqaqaghsi _ .
iwernga _ lata mkun _ ilate snanigh kaqe amsi _ tamaakunun _ ugpeqagh u lgute u ni luteng _ pi lghii nun _ sex-kun _ seghleghqengngukata _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u kata _ , _ maniguute kayugu kata _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ seghlequughutngukata _ yug lgute meng _ , _ meghe ste u kata _ , _ wayagh nigh ughte u kata llu _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh gpenaki _ tawatelnguut _ .
whanga _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite anka _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nanqigte yaghqaqe yagh asi _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe sta _ iqite ggu _ akule gpesineng _ . _ "
naligh i _ aaghtiiraagh nghmini _ ugpeqaalgutmineng _ , _ sangan _ aglagh te aqe agu _ nanqigtivig mun _ ? _ Kaynguyugigatsii _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigte ste negh gpesini _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ ? _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqaalgutmeggnun _ taklaghte tesaghqagh u yagh ut _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh meggneng _ .
Liisimakenghistegguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ nanqigte yaghqagh i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ? _ nanqigte yaghqaqe u kufsiki _ , _ naten _ piyaqnaghtutka lleqe aat _ elpesi nun _ nanqigte lleghqagh i _ piyaqniilnguut _ ?
Liisimakenghistekii _ nanqigsaghqaqekeput _ yaquleg t _ ? _ enkaam _ taklaghte qugh llegh t _ aaghte i ragh u aghte te llegh neng _ whani _ unguvallegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa yagh ut _ .
aaghtiiraagh te negh gpesini _ sangafsi ngam _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ pi aqe tsi _ nanqigtesqellusi _ ?
kayngu nagh ghhagh meng _ elpek si _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ akule gpesini _ liisima lghii meng _ taklaghte te i stekaghqagh lgu ut _ ugpeqaalgutet _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ .
yeghlegi _ ugpeqagh m _ ugpeqaalgutni _ aglagh te aqe a _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigtistenun _ , _ agghitkesqelluki _ aaghtiiraagh te lleg tek _ .
tawatete llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ kiyaghtaaghuusi _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutesi _ aglagh te gpenaki _ nanqigtivig mun _ . _ nepiigh ta qite ki _ anagte ghngaisi _ , _ puughte ghngaisi _ .
itupill _ elpek si _ katam _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ anagte aqe asi llu _ puughte aqe asi llu _ .
ipapestaaq _ liisimaksaghqaqsaghaghsi _ seghletun _ pistet _ nekaghqagh ite ngugh t _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ puughte ste gpenasi _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ : _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe kayug t _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ gelgaghniightet _ , _ aghnaasigh t _ , _ yug t _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ , _ aghnagh t _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ .
tamaakut llu _ teglenga lghiit _ , _ pakignegh t _ , _ meghestet _ , _ seghlequughtet _ yug neng _ , _ wayaghniightet _ , _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ila si _ tawatete yagh lghiit _ salin _ ugpeqe i llghite luteng _ Christ-ameng _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ ughvughqe kaqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ , _ aaftekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghleghqumangilngughestunllu _ lli aghtekau usi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ atanegh kun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ . _ aa _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiinga _ seghlegh mun _ ayghigh pagllag na yukagh ma _ pi naanghite unga _ .
kina llu _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ neqe _ ulimaagh u uq _ aqsaqugh mun _ , _ aqsaqugh _ neqe mun _ . _ " _ aa _ , _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke ak _ qamagte lukek _ aqsaqugh llu _ neqallu _ . _ yugusigh _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe sighqagh u nghite yagh uq _ qayughllak _ yugusigh _ atanegh mun _ pi u uq _ , _ atanegh _ yugusigh mnnun _ pi u uq _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete yaghqaqe ai _ yugusigh put _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ makete llegh mitun _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Liisimakenghistegguu _ yugusigh si _ nalighnegh ke kangi _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ ? _ yugusigh ka _ Christ-am _ pi ligh tke a _ atuqnaaghsikuun _ aghnagh mun _ akike i kayug meng _ yugusigh mineng _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ pi naanghite aqa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ yug m _ atuqe gkunigu _ aghnagh _ akike i lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ ataasiightekayug k _ yugusigh ak _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ maalghug _ yugusigh k _ ataasighte yaghqaa uk _ . _ "
iwernga _ atanegh mun _ lliigh kuvek _ , _ ataasigh u utek _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Liisimakenghistegguu _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke kangi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghfig i _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ Taghneghaghmineng _ , _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite kaqe aisi _ . _ elpesi neng _ pike nghite usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ Sex-kun _ seghleghqe gkufsi _ , _ nukeggnaghqe lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ pilleqaghsi _ . _ ila i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tawatete nghite ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ akitu pigte luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quulvaghteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ yugusigh gpesigun _ .
Aaptekaqaghpesinga _ nengughte te llegh meng _ lata gpesigun _ . _ Ukusta _ kiimsigh te nka _ . _ pinigh uq _ yuug _ nuliigh ngunani _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tamaghhagh mi _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ aghnagh _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ nanghiiqullengnayukafsi _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yug m _ efqughsaghqaqaa _ nuliigh ni _ . _ Tawategghpigaq _ aghnagh m _ efqusaghqaqaa _ ugi ni _ atuqe te llegh megteni _ .
aghnagh m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ ugi an llu _ pi ke aa _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ yug m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ nulighh an llu _ pi ke aa _ .
nengughte ma kufsi _ ighsake te gpenasi _ . _ wetku qun _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ atuqe te yaghqaa fqaafsi _ qafsina t _ unuget _ yughagh aghagh na lusi _ . _ taagken _ atuqunneqiglleghhaasi _ nanghiiqullengnayukafsi _ tughneghagh- meng _ qayughllak _ nuqete yaghqaa nanigh kau lghiisi _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ nulightiisqellusi _ nalighmeng _ ugiighesqellusi _ . _ iwernga _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ .
whanga mtun tuq _ nulightugh fqaafsi _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh fqaafsi _ . _ iwernga _ allake te ukut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuliigh lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ugi lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ aghnagh t _ . _ iwernga _ itagnagh stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ nula i u na ki _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugi u na ki _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ allake te lghii _ tunusagh _ tuunegkayuwaa _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
una ta _ pi kegka _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh nun _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh nun llu _ , _ ugingighagh nun llu _ : _ pinigh nayagh usi _ nulightugh nghite yagh kufsi _ whanga mtun _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh nghite yagh kufsi _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ nulightugh luni _ nuqetepagningilnguq _ aghnagh yug llegh mineng _ . _ aghnagh llu _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ ugiigh luni _ nuqetepagnengilnguq _ yug yug llegh mineng _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh usi _ nengughte lusi _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ sex-kun _ .
ukut _ akuzite t _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ qelegh sagh u ut _ atanegh meng _ nengughtekagh nun _ . _ aghnagh _ iqite yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi mineng _ .
iwernga _ iqite kuni _ , _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ ugi minun _ lliigh nqigte li _ . _ yug m llu _ iqitesaghqagh ke nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ ila itnun _ . _ ( _ Atanghem _ sa meng _ pi aghte mangite a _ . _ ) _ yuug _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ nuliigh lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite ste nghite ligu _ .
aghnagh llu _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ ugi lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite nghite li _ .
inqun _ yuug _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aaftengngwaaqaaguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ nulighh a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ aghnagh llu _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ aaftengngwaaqaaguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ ugi a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taghnughhagh it _ pelungite ut llu _ aaftengngwaaqaagutlu _ .
iwernga _ naligh _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ iqite yu kuni _ , _ iqite li _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ nalighmeng _ aghnagh _ iteme li _ tawatelngughmeng _ nengughte llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellusi _ kiyaghte sqe sug aqe aisi _ .
ugpeqagh mi _ aghnagh mi _ , _ ugi gpenite kuvek _ kayusiitaqsaaghan _ yuguligh llegh mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh mi _ yug mi _ , _ nuliigh gpenite kuvek _ kayusiitaqsaaghan _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataasikaghtaghpesi _ ugpeqistaqngisi _ Christ-ameng _ , _ nengughtekau tsi _ nalighmeng _ nengughte ma nge i tsi _ ? _ Circumcise-ekaatsii _ nalighmeng _ pi ma nge i tsi _ ? _ Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghetsii _ nalighmeng _ qepghaghtelaaghunghitetsii _ ? _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ nagnegh tek _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ tawatete stekaqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ taagken _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ .
yuug _ circumcise-ekaq _ ugpegh aqngami _ , _ allangughte te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ Circumcise-emangilnguqlu _ ugpeqe aq _ , _ circumcise-enaqefqaami _ pi lghaaq _ .
Circumcise-elleqlu _ circumcise-enghitelleqlu _ pitngunghituk _ . _ Pitnguyaghqaqta _ taana _ qaute kete luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
Ataasikaghtaghpesi _ ugpeqe i aqngafsi _ , _ natete llegh gpesistun _ almesiqe teggu _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghsiin _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh aqe yaten _ ? _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ . _ iwernga _ qepghaghtelaaghunanighnaqngukuvek _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ legan _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
Qepghaghtelaaq _ nakmikegkagh a _ Atanghem _ , _ ellnga n _ iteme nga lghii ke a _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguq _ yuug _ nakmikegkagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ ellnga n _ qepghaghtelaaqaa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tukfighpag kaqe aisi _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaaghughtegpenasi _ yug nun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ aghula igh te yaghqaa usi _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ tuqlugh llegh atun _ .
Aaptaqaghpesinga _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh t llu _ . _ Atanghem _ ungipaate mangite aanga _ liilightuusagh meng _ tamaakunun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ apostle-ngughtekaagunga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ neghyuke nakefsinga _ .
Seghleliighllagughtuq _ nuna _ maaten _ . _ sume mni _ whanga _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yuug _ almesiqe luni _ .
nulightugh ma ziin _ ? _ iqite ste gpenaan _ nulighh n _ . _ nulightugh ma ite kuvek _ , _ nulightugh naqe gpenang _ .
iwernga _ nulightugh kuvek _ seghleghqengngunghituten _ . _ ugiigh ma ite ngughk _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ seghleghqengngunghituq _ . _ iwernga _ nulightugh kufsi _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugiigh kumeng _ piyaqleg iigh aghagh yaghqaa usi _ whani _ kiyaghtaalleghmi _ . _ piyaqleg iigh sug nghite pigte amsi _ tawaten _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una ta _ pi kegka _ : _ atanegh ut _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ nengughtekagh t _ qepghagh te litgu _ atanegh _ nengughsimangilngughestun _ .
qivghu lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ qivghunghilngughestun _ . _ quya nga lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ quyanghilngughestun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tukfightugh ghllag kayug t _ qepghagh te litgu _ avangilngughestun _ .
Kiyaghtengngulusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ megnu ke aghagh gpenaan _ nuna m _ sanqutanga _ . _ qayughllak _ nuna _ almesiqe luni _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ .
Kiyaghtaalleghmengtuq _ whaken _ sumeghtaghaatkegkiilnguusi _ . _ nulightugh ma ite ngughk _ qepghalleghqaghtaaghatuq _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqughsugaqegkanga _ .
nuliigh leg _ qepghagh aghagh qagh yu qu uq _ kiyaghtaallghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqughsugaqegkanga _ nuliigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ malghughqengngaaquq _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aghnagh t llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghnagh t _ ugi igh tke aat _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ qepghalleghqaghtaaghatut _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh teng llu _ taghneghagh teng llu _ tuune yug aqe ait _ iingunagh ita _ atanegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ ugi leg _ qepghagh aghagh kayugu uq _ kiyaghtaallghem _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ efqughsugaqegkanga _ ugi ni _ . _ ellnga n llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ malghughqengngaaq _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ nengughte snanigh nghite amsi _ . _ iwernga _ nakmike sug aqa _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ atanegh _ uglafqe sigh ngunasi _ .
nuliighqagh leg m _ atuqe yug yagute kunigu _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ nengughte lik _ . _ enkaam _ nengughtekumek _ seghleghqengngunaanghituk _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ liisimakngwaaqumigu _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ nuqetutngukumigullu _ atuqe yu llegh mineng _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nulightiisqughaanghilkumigu _ , _ nulightugh yug nghite kuni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ .
nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte luni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ , _ iwernga _ nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte nghite kuni _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ pi u uq _ .
aghnagh _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi ni _ kiyaghte luku _ . _ iwernga _ ugi ni _ tuqu kan _ , _ piyuke llegh mineng _ ugiigh yagh ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpeqagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
iwernga _ quyangaaghataghaghyaghqaaguq _ ugiigh nqigte nghite kuni _ . _ Taakusta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh nka _ . _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ whanga mnite uk _ .
kiimsigh yug anka _ aapqughaallesi _ negh ke neng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ ipa u uq _ whaten _ pi llegh i _ , _ " _ liisima lleg lgu ukut _ qamagte luta _ . _ " _ Tawatelnguq _ liisima llegh _ aangaayugte ste i kayugu uq _ , _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh m _ iknaqughtengngwaa _ ugpegh llegh ut _ .
yuug _ pillguyugneq _ , _ esghaghhu ta _ taana _ paninang _ liite yaghqaghtuqagh _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqisteni _ whaten _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ pi ke anka _ . _ "
enkaam _ neghe lleqe sta _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ? _ liisimake aput _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ut _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ kiyaghnegh ite uq _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ kiyaghneghtu ni luku _ , _ ataneghtu ni luku _ qilag llu _ nuna llu _ .
