iwernga _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellnga _ Atanghuuq _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ kiyaghtengnguukut _ ellnga nun _ . _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-anguuq _ . _ ellnga kun _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ulima kau uq _ , _ unguva u ukut llu _ ellnga kun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ nalluke ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite u langi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe aqe ait _ neqe t _ aghqe te kaqe ni luki _ kiyaghnegh pig nun _ . _ enkaam _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ neqe _ pitngunghituq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe aghagh naanghite aisi _ neghe llegh gpesigun _ neqe meng _ . _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ neghenghite kumta _ sa u a _ alngunak _ iflanaanghitaghput _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ talwa _ neghe ghngaamta _ allgegh te na nghite ukut _ ellnga neng _ .
ugpeqagh ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi yaghqaa lghiisi _ , _ liigike nga te gpesineng _ taana _ ipapighqelleq _ apeghtuusagh ke kaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kelenga lusi _ kayaalnguut _ ugpegh llegh it _ ayuqniighqegpenaki _ ellngit a _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ .
naligh ita _ esghagh kuniten _ negh ma luten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ temple- nge i te ni _ , _ ellnga llu _ negh yug yaaghte uq _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mini _ anaggute nga yagh ghngaan _ .
enkaam _ liisima llegh gpek _ seghleghqe stesagh u aghagh a _ kayaalnguq _ ugpegh llegh a _ ifla ste luku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute kan _ Christ-am _ tuqu tkekagh a _ .
Enkaangam _ ayuqniighqegkufsiki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ , _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ ellngit nun llu _ Christ-amunllu _ .
enkaam _ neghe lleg mkun _ aghqutqegkameng _ seghleghqe ste na yukagh mkun _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ , _ allameng llu _ negh naanghite unga _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ .
iteme nga unga _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa unga _ . _ Apostle-nguunga _ esghagh tke aq _ Jesus-meng _ atanegh mnneng _ . _ qepghagh te lleg mkun _ ellnga _ ugpeqagh u usi _ elpek si _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ apostle-epigunghinnighngaatnga _ elpek si _ liisimakaghpesinga _ apostle-epiiguunga _ atanegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghtaalleghpesi _ Christ-amun _ kelgute kanga _ .
Taakusta _ apegh aqe kenka _ seghleqistemnun _ .
Barnabas-lu _ whangkutung _ tungsighnaanghistuung _ neghyaghqagh meng llu _ meghyaghqagh meng llu _ elpesi neng _ apeghtuqagh mtegneng _ ?
navek _ pinegh mtung _ kelqepagningitestegnekii _ ugpeqagh t _ nuliigh pung _ ilangistun _ apostle-et _ , _ Atanghem _ anglegutangistunllu _ , _ Peter-etunllu _ ?
Barnabas-lu _ whangkutuung _ ellnginaghhaamtung _ qepghaasimanginaghyaghqaqestegneguu _ neqekaghqagh ung _ ?
Pilluwaghtem _ tukfigh yaghqaqe nghite ai _ saghya ni _ pilluwaghtenilluni _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ grapes- meng _ piitesiighaghtem _ neghe kayugu ai _ ila i _ piite stekagh ni _ . _ Penniighniightemllu _ penniigh mi _ mamagh an _ ila a _ pikayug u a _ .
taakut _ usputagh t _ yug m _ apeghtuusagh ke ai _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Liilightusaanillu _ apeghtuusagh t _ tawatete ut _ .
igaqe kau uq _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ Moses-mun _ : _ " _ Sugrugiitalighpenan _ ox-a _ wheat-et _ tutmagh ste nghpesiki _ qantagh it _ sigiqesqelluki _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghmike nghite agu _ ox-a _ ?
sangami _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ Ox-nginaghhaaq _ sumegh ke agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ whangkuta llu _ suumqagh ke ainkut _ . _ ipapestaaq _ whangkunnunllu _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ piitesighaghvig meng _ yataaghqistenunllu _ saghnastenunllu _ neghyuke kayugu aput _ nengighqe aput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ piite yaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ whangkutung _ piitesighagh vike kaqe amsi _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh si _ quya stekau ut _ . _ tungsighpag lleqe stuung _ tungsigh vike gkumsi _ aklukegkamtegneng _ ?
apeghtughiste m _ ila i _ elpesi neng _ allgegh te u kata _ aklukegkameggneng _ , _ whangkutung _ wataqaaghaq _ piyaghqaghpigaayaghtukung _ . _ yeghlegi _ qepghagh yug kau ukung _ maningeregaghnalutung _ aklukegkamtegneng _ allgegh te na lutung _ . _ ilangani _ mani pagite aqe ukung _ . _ talwa _ tamaani _ aapte yug igate amsi _ akileghtiisqellutung _ . _ una ta _ apallugh ka _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi sug nghite ukung _ , _ " _ Paul _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
liisima kasi _ Temple-em _ qepghaghtengi _ neghe kayug t _ neqe meng _ temple- mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ aghqefig m llu _ qepghaghtengi _ nengigh kayugu ut _ aghqe te kaghqagh meng _ .
tawatete uq _ Atanghem _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ Ungipaghtetlu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ aklukegkateng _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ait _ tamaakuneng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
elpesi neng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te igate unga _ pi kaghqagh ke yagh ke mneng _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh ni lunga _ maaten _ . _ quya aqe unga _ akileghtigh sqe igate ngugh u nga _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i naqngu unga _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ talwa _ panegh yagh ghngaaghma _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi naanghite aanga _ , _ " _ Paul _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
iwernga _ aangaayugusighqiitunga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ ungipaqisqellunga _ . _ Seghleghwaaghunayaghtunga _ qaatke nghite yagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ .
nakmike kaqsagh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ whanga mneng _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh lgu ni lunga _ pi nayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ta aneng _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ . _ alla _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ite unga _ .
sangaawa _ akileghtuusagh ka _ ? _ akileghtuusagh ke aqa _ una _ , _ quya pigte aqe unga _ akileghtuusagh ngunanga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qaywa _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe yagh ghngaaghpesinga _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghunghisaghngaaghma _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagunga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ , _ yug mun _ uglagh lghii mun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ .
Jews-eninnemni _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ ellngistun _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ kiyaghte negh mni _ Gentile-eni _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyaghtaaghni _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ liisimake ghngaamkun _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ .
Gentile-eninnemni _ nalluke i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ nalluke lghii stun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ Qaatkengngunghinniluki _ pi u nghite anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ iwernga _ qaatkengngwaanka _ Christ-am _ liilightuusagh i _ .
Kayaalngughni _ kiyaghte negh mni _ ellngistun _ lliigh aqe unga _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ Enkaangam _ kinku stun _ alngunak _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ natete yagh nga a ta _ , _ naten _ alngunak _ yugulillengesqelluki _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ nagaqiisqeqeghlluki _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ quya ste lleg nge aqe lghiinga llu _ ugpeqenghatgu _ Christ-a _ .
qamagte luteng _ ketanqustet _ sivulii yu kayugu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ataasigh ghhagh _ kayaalqe i i kayugu uq _ . _ Kiyaghtaalleghpesini _ Christ-amun _ , _ ketanqustestun _ kayaalqe i i naqe aqe tek _ .
Ketanqustet _ ulape aqe ut _ yugusigh teng _ iknaqughhnaluki _ qayughllak _ qaghpa nge yug aqe lghiit _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ . _ tamaakut _ paligh yaghqaa ut _ . _ iwernga _ qaghpa _ ugpeqagh t _ allgeghsaghqagh at _ quunpekaghqaaguq _ .
Ketanqustestun _ taklaghruketun _ ketanqu aqe unga _ kaate na lunga _ kenle mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ tenglugtestun _ , _ tenglug agaatagh aqe unga _ kayaalqe i i na lunga _ .
ungipagh kau iqe unga _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ Christ-amun _ . _ whanga llu _ kiyaghtengnguunga _ ellnga nun _ enkaam _ yugusigh mnun _ qaatke ste aqe unga _ , _ luuraq _ pi nghite kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite na yu kanganga _ ellmi neng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke sqe sug anka _ Jews-et _ , _ maligsaagh ikagh t _ Moses-meng _ . _ Egypt-meng _ aghulaqe aqngameng _ qamagte luteng _ maligtekaqe aat _ qilag u aq _ , _ maghyaghqugh i lghii _ tume kaghqagh itgun _ . _ kaa sa ta _ kavilngugh mun _ kellii mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pelleghtekaqegkanga _ megh _ aghviisqelluki _ yaywaaseng _ .
qamagte luteng _ paaptaayekagh u lghiit _ qilawaagh kun llu _ kavilngugh kun llu _ kellii kun _ maligte yaaghte u luteng _ Moses-mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe kau ut _ manna- meng _ ,
meghe kau ut _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ megh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ meghe kaqe aat _ megh _ maaqekagh _ uyghag meng _ . _ Taam _ uyghag m _ maligsaagh kaqe kangi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ . _ uyghag _ taana _ Christ-anguuq _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kaqe ghngaisteng _ , _ paninang _ allute luteng _ efqughsimangilkangat _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ tumangani _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu ste aqe luki _ yugusighkwaagh it _ mingite kau lghiit _ kilgaa ni _ .
tamaa na _ qamagte luni _ pillghat _ whangkunnun _ usputagh u uq _ , _ kelengasaaghiinkut _ ellngistun _ piyuke fqaan _ seghlegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
manig ughte ngughte gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ilangistun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ negh aqe ut _ , _ megh aqe ut _ taagken _ aghula aqe ut _ . _ " _ tawaten _ maniguute kau ut _ gold-meng _ ulimaagh mun _ kaawaghaghmun _ .
seghleghqe fqaamta _ sex-kun _ ilangistun _ . _ Allgeghnegha _ seghleghqe llghite a _ 23,000 _ yuug _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ .
Nanghiiqunaqefqaamteggu _ Atanghem _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ pi lteggu _ , _ ilangistun _ . _ nemeghyagh t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ nanghiiqu kaqe kangat _ atanegh _ .
Akuzilgaghpenasi _ ilangistun _ . _ yaquleg m _ tuqu ste i kayug m _ tuqu qugh kaqe ai _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ akuzilgaatkaqegkangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ sivunegh mta _ atuqekagh it _ , _ usputaghqagh u kau ut _ whangkunnun _ . _ igaqe kau ut _ kelenga sagh u te u luteng _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ pi fqaamta _ pisqelluta _ .
enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ pikumi _ ugpegh lleg ni _ aghula igh te ni luku _ , _ kelenga li _ luuraq _ seghleghqesagh u aghte uq _ .
qamagte luteng _ nanghiiqu lleg si _ allakaayagunghitut _ yug nun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ata siigh mete uq _ , _ nanghiiqu llegh mun _ qaasghutesaghqagh ke nghite ai _ iknaqe lleg si _ , _ iknaqellelitaqnaaghiisi _ nuqete sighqagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ iqite aqe lleqe usi _ taagken _ nanghiiqu llegh meng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ maniguute gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
aleghqugh amsi _ sumeghnegh lgu lusi _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nakesi _ sa meng _ pilqa _ .
Iyamsiqayagunnemteggu _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ wine- a _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ aaw aneng _ . _ iigge mnneng _ aavgugh luku _ neqekrangllagh _ nenemteggu _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh aneng _ .
neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh kau ghngaaghmi _ ataasigh u uq _ . _ uglagh ghllag yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ negh aqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ kelgute aqe a _ nalighnequghniluta _ ataasigh mun _ yugusigh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun _ Israel-eghmiit _ ; _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ , _ ilate aqe ut _ maniguute lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqefig gni _ .
Sumeghpesinii _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu aat _ ? _ neqe t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ manigugh sigh pigu aqe aat _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aghqerraaghaqut _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ nakan _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ilate nga ste sug nghite amsi _ tughneghagh nun _ .
Christ-amun _ pi liite stekau kufsi _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naanghite asi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Atanghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ meghe gkufsi _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ qayuusigh itneng _ megh naanghite usi _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ neghe kayugu kufsi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ Atanghem _ tipele gkeni _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ tipele itni _ negh naanghite usi _ neqe meng _ .
whangkuta _ Christ-am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naqe gkumteki _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qungyaghtesleqaghput _ . _ neqamike luku _ ellnga _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ whangkunneng _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila i _ salleg si _ pinigh nghite ut _ . _ aa-a _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ , _ " _ iwernga _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellnginaayugtefqaami _ pi uq lli _ , _ yeghlegi _ ila ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe luki _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kemeg qragh k _ tukfighkagh i _ estugagh meng _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
qayughllak _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ nuna _ , _ sa u aat llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ tawanlenguut _ Atanghem _ pi ke ai _ . _ "
ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh m _ negh yaghtigh sqe kangisi _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ketfaghtuqagh at _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ pi kangisi _ , _ " _ taana _ aghqe tke kau uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ " _ neghe gpenaan _ , _ ungipaatistegpesi _ ugpegh llegh a _ kayaalisnayukafsigu _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga ni _ anaggute nga lghii u uq _ . _ entaqun _ sumeghtaghagh na yalghiisi _ , _ " _ sangama tuq _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa nghite zinga _ ? _ sangama tuq _ kitum _ ineghqughaghaqanga _ alla tun _ sumeghtaghagh kayug m _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike gkumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ neghyaghqagh mneng _ , _ sanganʼngam _ kitum _ seghlequughlleqanga _ neghe gkuma _ iyamsiqa yug tkekagh mneng _ ? _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luku _ sa llegh i _ quulvaasiqaqiteggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ talwa _ neghe lleg si llu _ meghe lleg si llu _ .
sa gpenasi _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh meng _ Jews-enun _ , _ Gentile-enun _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ .
Efqughhnaqutkaqanka _ yug lgute nka _ salleg mkun _ alngunak _ . _ whanga inagh mnun _ pinigh lleghqagh _ pi igate aqa _ , _ iwernga _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun llu _ yug lgute ma _ pi aqe unga _ , _ uglagh lghii _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ whanga mtun _ pi aqe tek _ , _ katam _ whanga _ maligte lleg mtun _ Christ-a _ .
usuqe amsi _ neqamike kefsinga _ , _ atuqe kesi llu _ apeghtuusagh nka _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ Christ-a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ yugu uq llu _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ .
nasqughiitagh igh luni _ yuug _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ yughaghvig mi _ , _ quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa _ naasquutilghi _ .
enkaam _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh gpenani _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ . _ tawaten _ pikumi _ qigughwaaqastun _ meqe ste luni _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yug nghite kuni _ , _ kepugh li _ nuyiigh te luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh ni _ kayngu nagh lghii u uq _ qigugh llegh llu _ nuyiigh te luni llu _ kepugh llegh _ , _ enkaam _ nasqughiitagh igh nga li _ .
yuug _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa nghite uq _ maniguute kuni _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaaghuq _ yug m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ .
liisimake kesi _ yuug _ aghnagh meng _ ulimaagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u lghii _ .
yuug _ ulimaagh u nghite uq llu _ aghnagh mun _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaagh u uq _ yug mun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ yaquleg t _ liigike litgu _ yuug _ aghnagh mun _ naasqugh u te i u ta a _ .
iwernga _ neqamike teggu _ Atanghem _ uspeqe llegh a _ , _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ aklu kete te nga uk _ .
aghnaqe yug ggaaq _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u ghngaan _ , _ taagken _ kenlanga _ yuug _ qamagte luni _ allgegh kau uq _ aghnagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh t llu _ yug t llu _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ : _ ipa _ anaggute nga a _ aghnagh m _ nasqughiitagh ngunani _ yughagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ?
yug t _ quunpeng _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ nuyiightekaghnguq _ yuug _ ukavaghtaquq _ ellmi neng _ ,
iwernga _ aghnagh m _ nuyagh ghllag ni _ quulvaasiqaa _ . _ nasqughiitaghqagh u luni _ ellnga nun _ pi kau uq _ .
paninang _ kina _ aaghtiiraagh yug u kuni _ nasqughiitagh meng _ , _ ungipaanneqigtaghllakun _ taana ta _ apostle-eni _ apeghtuusaqaqegkefut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ atuqe aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ naansaghngaaghmeng _ .
whaken _ apeghtugh yug amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesineng _ maniguute llegh mun _ . _ usuqepagningite amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesinun _ qayughllak _ aqnighquutaghaghaqusi _ pinighqe te gpenasi _ .
ungipaate aqe aatnga _ qerngughte te negh gpesini nguq _ ila si _ aafqemeraaghutaqut _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi gpenateng _ . _ ugpeqe kestagh luku _ lliigh aqa _ .
entaqun _ aafqugh te llegh gpesigun _ liigike yaghqaqe asi _ naligh si _ ipa _ qaatke te nga ta i _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ Atanghem _ neghesta igh llegh anun _ , _ neghyaghtuunghitaqaghsi _ .
neghe uute negh gpesini _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ negh ragkiigh aqe usi _ neqe gpesineng _ , _ ila si _ utaqa gpenaki _ . _ enkaam _ ila si _ iyatagh aqe ut _ , _ ila si _ suume aqe ut _ .
Neghigatsii-i _ , _ meghigatsii-i _ ne gpesini _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke stekagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ? _ kayngusaghagh te ste naqutke aqe stekagh i _ ava ite ngugh t _ ? _ sa meng _ pi lamsi _ ? _ Usuqlamsii _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ usuqe naanghite amsi _ !
sa u a _ liite kaqe a _ atanegh meng _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ ighivgaghmi _ tawani _ uvegh ghpagte te lleghqagh mini _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ elpesi nun _ pi u uq _ . _ negh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine-eghraghaghmeng _ imaleg _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ qayuusigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghagh u uq _ akequsagh a _ aaw mkun _ . _ awen _ megh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nenegh gpesini _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ menegh gpesini llu _ taagken _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ kelgutngwaaqaghsi _ Atanghem _ tuqu llegh a _ kenlanga _ alla _ tagi lleghqagh anun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ temngi _ neghe gkuni _ Atanghem _ neqekrangllagh aneng _ , _ meghe gkuni llu _ Atanghem _ qayuusigh aneng _ , _ quulvaghnaanghitaa _ Atanghem _ yugusigh a llu _ aawallu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sivuke luni _ yug m _ avuteghqe te kete liki _ seghleghqe lleg ni _ alla _ pi yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lghaaq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghaaq llu _ qayuusigh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ neghe lghii _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghii llu _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ Atanghem _ yugusigh a _ liigike naqe gpenaan _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ nanqigtellengyaghqaaquq _ atanegh meng _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh usi _ kayaalngughnillu _ qinuyug nga lghii ni llu _ enkaam _ qafsina t _ tuqu laghate te kau ut _ .
iwernga _ ipapighqelluta _ nanqigtekumta _ whangkunneng _ katam _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tke gkumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ Atanghem _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh yug nghminikut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ , _ nanqigte aqe ainkut _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaa fqaamta _ pi na luta _ nanqigte i kuni _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh neng _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ negh na lusi _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ neghe kestagh gpenasi _ , _ utaqatu te aqe lusi _ .
iyatagh lghiit _ tamaakut _ ne meggni _ negh lit _ enkaangam _ Atanghem _ nanqigte nghite liki _ . _ aglagh kuma _ elpesi nun _ ila i _ aaptekasi _ kiimsigh naagh anka _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ .
Neqamikaghsi _ salin _ ugpegh llghite lusi _ maniguute ste aatagh kaqe kangisi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ akuzi igate ngugh nun _ . _ aaghqute aqe stekau lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liigike sug amsi _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ seghleghu uq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzistengngunghitaa _ tawaten _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Atanghuuq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzistengngwaa _ tawaten _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ alla ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ iwernga _ tunusagh t _ qamagte luki _ taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh ke ai _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qepghagh te i lleghqagh _ ila mun _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ atanegh _ qepghagh te lleg nge aqe uq _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ allake te lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh a _ , _ iwernga _ taam _ ataasigh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ste aqe ai _ whangkunnun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liite stekayugu a _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleni _ ugpeqagh tgun _ tunusalitkamikun _ . _ tunusagh t _ kitumun _ alngunak _ pinighqe sighqagh u ut _ .
Taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ ila i _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ peghqinellegh mikun _ , _ ila i _ liisima llegh mikun _ .
Taam _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ ugpeqillelitaghaqaqii _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ila i _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaqii _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ aqnighnegh neng _ .
taghneghagh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleghqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ liigike i lleghqagh _ agleghnagh lghii m _ Taghegham _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh t _ igleghte te u ta a _ kina _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ulu kun _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ mumegh igh qugh ste aqe ai _ akuzillegh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ ataasikaghtaghhaghmeng _ taagken _ ataasigh gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ . _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
katam _ yugusigh _ ataasigh _ nalighneghtu ghllag _ , _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ yugusigh m _ pike kangi _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh ghngaaghmeng _ ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ Christ-allu _ tawatete uq _ .
qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ nalighnequghii _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ . _ ila put _ Jews-nguut _ , _ ila i _ Gentile-et _ , _ ila i _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ , _ ila i _ qepghaghtelaaghunghitut _ . _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ paaptaayekagh u ukut _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ Christ-amun _ yugusiliitesqelluta _ . _ qamagte luta _ tugukligh kaqe agput _ ataasigh k _ taghneghagh k _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u nghite uq _ nalighnegh _ , _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
itegagh t _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmeng _ , _ " _ Iiggengunghilnguunga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte ut _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
sigute _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ iye u nghite unga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte uq _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
yugusigh _ iye raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ natenʼngam _ nagaqugh nayagh a _ ? _ nalighmeng _ sigute raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ natenʼngam _ naagh te nayagh a _ sapag nigh meng _ ?
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima mangite ai _ yugusigh put _ tawatete luki _ . _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ nalighnegh lightuqagh ke ai _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u yagh kuni _ nalighnegh _ yugusigh u nayagh nghite uq _ .
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
tea- ma ken _ apallugh ke luku _ iye m _ pinagh nghite ai _ iigge t _ , _ " _ Aklukenghitamsi _ . _ " _ Tawateghpigaq _ naasqugh m _ pinagh nghite i _ itegagh t _ , _ " _ Aklukenghitamsi _ . _ "
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh mta _ natangi _ kayaate tesugnite ngugh t _ megnu nagh pigte ut _ .
yugusigh mta _ natangi _ sume mnni _ megnunapagilnguut _ , _ elngaatall _ aflenga kaqe aput _ . _ yugusigh mta _ natangi _ esghagh sug igate ke put _ pilugug nga aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ tamaakut _ esghagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe lghiit _ pilugug igate aput _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe yamigu _ yugusigh _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh stekaqe ai _ megnu naghpag i tesugnite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ yugusigh _ qepghagh kayugu uq _ qerngagh mi _ . _ nalighnegh m _ qamagte luteng _ aflenga kaqe ait _ ila teng _ tawatengwaaq _ .
ataasigh _ aqnigh nghaani _ qamagte luteng _ aqnigh kayugu ut _ . _ ataasigh _ usuqellengenghani _ qamagte luteng _ quya kayugu ut _ .
qamagte lusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ke aisi _ , _ nalighnequghiisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpeqagh nun _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivuke luki _ Apostle-et _ aange lleghpigagh u luki _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh i _ uuknaliqistet _ ( _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ ) _ pingayut igh a _ apeghtughiste t _ , _ taagken _ allaaghlluwhaghtistet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkat _ naallghutimun _ , _ kayusigh i yaghqagh t _ ila meggneng _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ igleghutistet _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayug t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
qamagte lusi _ Apostle-ngutsii _ , _ uuknaliqe ste u tsi _ , _ apeghtughiste u tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaatsii _ allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng _ ,
naallghute i kayugu tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayugu tsi llu _ mumegh igh qugh kayugu tsi llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ akuzillegh neng _ ? _ nakaa _ !
iwernga _ piyuke teki _ aange aghagh lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ . _ whaa _ maaten _ apegh naqe aqa _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ taakuneng _ .
akuzi kayugu yagh ghngaaghma _ yug t llu _ yaquleg t llu _ akuzillghistun _ , _ temngi _ tengngaagtagh lleqe unga _ nalighmeng _ lengaaghtagh lleqe unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
uuknaliqe kayugu ghngaaghma _ , _ liigike kayugu ghngaamki _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ qamagte luki _ , _ liisima llegh _ qamagtekaqsagh ghngaamkun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ghngaaghma _ naayghagh nun _ nuugte i sighqagh meng _ , _ pitngunaanghitunga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
tuune yagh ghngaamki _ qamagte luki _ sa nka _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ paneghtesagh ghngaaghma _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
piniqe llegh _ nuqete neghtu uq llu _ , _ nangllegtagh uq llu _ ; _ piniqe llegh _ aqinangituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ yamrrangituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ aangaayugneghituq _ .
piniqe llegh _ seghleghyug te ite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ ellnginaayugneghituq _ . _ piniqe llegh _ sagiqe igate uq _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi na luni _ , _ qikeghqungigatuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ neqamike i igate uq _ anaggute llegh meng _ .
piniqe llegh m _ quya sigh ke igate a _ seghlegh _ , _ yeghlegi _ quya sigh ka qaa _ ipapilleq _ .
piniqe llegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ sangwa _ sa yagh ghngaan _ . _ iiwleng _ ugpeqe i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ neghyuke i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ nuqete neghtu uq _ .
piniqe llegh _ kenle ite ngughk _ . _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ kenletghuusaghqaagut _ ; _ alla stun _ akuzillegh t _ taaqe yaghqaa ut _ ; _ liisima llegh _ kenletghuusaghqaaguq _ .
qayughllak _ tunusagh gput _ liisima llegh llu _ uuknaliqe llegh llu _ iighwite nghite ngugh k _ .
iwernga _ iighwilngugh _ kaate kan _ , _ qamagte luteng _ iighwite nghite ngugh t _ aviighughsaghqaagut _ .
taghnughhagh u lunga _ akuzi kayugu yagh unga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh kayugu yagh unga _ , _ liigike kayugu yagh unga _ taghnughhaghestun _ , _ iwernga _ yugughte yalghiinga _ taghnughhaghestun _ pi nanigh unga _ .
liigike llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iighwite nghite uq _ , _ katam _ tawatete uq _ esghagh lghii stun _ taghneghaghqugh te lug kun _ . _ Qakuqaaqun _ liigikngwaaghyaghqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ esghaghlleqaghput _ gginasaghqugh luku _ . _ maaten _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwite nghite uq _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimakngwaaqanganga _ iighwighma _ .
Enkaangam _ ukut _ pi nga yu t _ kenletghuunnaanghitut _ : _ ugpegh llegh _ , _ sighima llegh _ , _ piniqe llegh _ ; _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ .
piniqe lleg nge yug aghagh yaghqaa usi _ pakiggulluku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ iwernga _ piyuke teki llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ , _ wata _ piyuksaghqaqaghsi _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
yuug _ akuzi nghmini _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ aleghqugh aqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ yug t _ aleghqagh igh igate ai _ qayughllak _ liigike naagh i te aat _ . _ akuzi aqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ nallukekagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tunusagh leg _ ungipagh ke i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi kayugu uq _ yug nun _ . _ akuzi ta i _ kayusigh i kayugu ut _ , _ kayeme i kayugu ut _ , _ ilutughsagh i kayugu ut _ yug nun _ .
yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ kayusiite kayugu uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ ungipagh ke i kayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ kayusigh i kayugu uq _ ugpeqagh neng _ .
qamagte lusi _ piyug kaqsagh amsi _ akuzisqellusi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ iwernga _ wataqaaghaq tuq _ tunusagh lgu lghiisi _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ aange aghagh ut _ akuzi kayug neng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ . _ akuzi kayug t _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ mumighqughtelguyaghqaagut _ kayusiitesqelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lunga _ aleghqugh yagh kumsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesigun _ natenʼngam _ kayusiinnayaghestemsi _ ? _ iwernga _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgutekagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ , _ nalighmeng _ ungipaate yagh kumsi _ sa meng _ liitekagh mneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uuknaliqe tkesagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa lleghqagh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ elngaatall _ kayusiite nayagh amsi _ .
flute- a llu _ harp- a llu _ seghletun _ qalghightekayek _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigiknaangitaa _ sa u a _ ilagaate _ atugh aqe ta a _ .
Pilluwaghtem _ bugle-a _ qalghightekagu _ seghletun _ ila ita _ pilluwaghtet _ nalluke lleqe aat _ pilluwalleghqaghteng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ akuzi kufsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigike naanghite aisi _ sa meng _ pi i qu tsi _ . _ Akuzinghilngughestun _ pi yaghqaa usi _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ allaghhiinaq _ akuzillegh _ , _ atuqistengita _ liigike aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ liigike nghite kumkun _ yuug _ akuzi lghii _ alla kun _ akuzillegh kun _ nakumiinguuq _ whanga mni _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ nakumiingunga _ ellnga ni _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek si _ , _ tunusagh nge yu pigtekufsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ , _ tungsigh tek _ kayute kaghqagh meng _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ yughagh li _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqaa luku _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ .
yughagh yagh kuma _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ yughagh lleqe uk _ , _ iwernga _ umyugagh gma _ liigike naanghite ak _ .
sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ yughagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ yughagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ilagagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ .
qayughllak _ taghneghagh gpegun _ usuqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ natenʼngam _ liigike igate ngugh m _ usuqe i lgusigh lleqe aten _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug llegh gpeneng _ ? _ nalluke a _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ .
yughagh llegh n _ pi niigh pigte yagh ghngaan _ ila a _ yug m _ kayusillegh nge naanghite uq _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqe lghiinga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh aghagh luku _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ yughaghvig mete negh mni _ apeghtugh i yug aqe unga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ akuzite t _ atuqe luki _ liigike yaghqagh si _ , _ akuzi naanghite unga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh pigte luku _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesineng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ taghnughhaghhaghestun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ anglikagh stun _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe sug llegh i _ taghnughhaghhaghestun _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ : _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ kayagte lleqe anka _ yug t _ alla neng _ nuna neng _ aleghqughyaghtiisqellusi _ ellngit a _ katam _ ulungistun _ . _ aleghqugh lleqe amsi _ qaanghitgun _ iwernga _ paninang _ nagannaanghitaghpesinga _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ tunusagh a _ akuzillegh m _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ipapighqusiiguq _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i kayug nun _ . _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ .
Enkaangam _ yughaghvig gpesini _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ akuzite yagh kumeng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ itegh kumeng _ nallungughte ni lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ nalighmeng _ liigike igate ngughk _ yughaghvig gpesinun _ itegh luni _ nagate kunisi _ ungipagh lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ nagate luni _ nanqigtengngwaaghllequq _ seghleghqe ste u ni luni _ .
qamanlliqekagh i _ aksaqe nga lghiit _ qayvighqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qungughte luni _ manigugh lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ whaten _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ whaante uq _ elpesi ni _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una ta _ apeghtuusagh ke naqutke aqe kegka _ . _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maniguute na lusi _ ila si _ ilagagh aqe naagh ut _ , _ kina _ apeghtugh i aqe lleqe uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ ungipagh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh ke sqekagh aneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ akuzi lleqe uq _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ naligh gpesi _ mumegh igh qugh lleqe ai _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh itnun _ iknaqughusiilit _ qamagte luteng _ .
yughaghvig mi _ kina _ akuzi naqngu kuni _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ pi lghaat _ , _ utaqa luki _ ila teng _ taaqe lleghqagh it _ . _ kitum llu _ mumegh igh qugh nakangi _ sa meng _ pillghit _ .
iwernga _ mumighqughtengiskan _ akuzi lghii mun _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ akuzi te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ akuzi yu kuni _ kavyuguute gpenani _ akuzi lghaaq _ ellmi nun llu _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ .
uuknaliqe istek _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ ungipange lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ akuzi lit _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nagate lit _ , _ liigike litgu _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ kina _ ungipange gkan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ akuzi lghii _ nepiigh li _ , _ ungipange lghii _ akuzi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh ke i yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi aqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ nagate lghii _ , _ liite li _ , _ taagavenginaallenglillu _ .
neqamike luki _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaagut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ , _ taaqe sighqagh meng llu _ . _ iiwleng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ taaqe sighqagh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ alngunak _ pi sug igate ainkut _ . _ qerngughte te lleg put _ nekegmete sug aqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ qerngughte te nghata _ ,
aghnagh t _ akuzi ste u yaghqaa nghite ut _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ akuzi yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ igleghutistenguyaghqaanghitutlu _ qerngughte te nga lghii ni _ , _ qayughllak _ liilightugh sag ni llu _ igaqe nga uq _ tawaten _ .
Aapqughaghyukumeng _ , _ ugi teng _ ne meggni _ aapte litki _ . _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ akuzi lleghqagh at _ anaggute nga uq _ .
elpek si _ Corinth-eghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ aangaayugneghuusi _ . _ Sumeghpesinii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ elpesi neng _ pi u aat _ ? _ Ellnginaghhaghpesinun _ apeghtugh te kau aat _ ?
kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luni _ pikumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpegh ghllag ma ni luni _ , _ liigike liki _ lata tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ Ataneghem _ qelegh sagh ke ai _ .
tugukligh nghite kagu _ una _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ tugukligh gpenaan _ ellnga _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipaghte u yug aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe ste gpenaki _ akuzi lghiit _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ .
yughaghvig ni _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinitungwaaq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pi aqe teggu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh kekagh mneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ tugukligh kaqe asi _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg si _ taaggun _ nekegnga ut _ ayugite luteng _ .
yuguligh lleg nge kau usi _ ugpeqe aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe manginagh teki _ apeghkagh nka _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe nanigh kufsiki _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii naanghite ut _ .
apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ apeghtuusagh kekagh meng _ whanga mnun _ . _ taakut _ ugpeqe yaghqaqe asi _ : _ Christ-am _ tuqu tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaqnillghistun _ .
taagken _ llivegh kaqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ pinaqnillghistun _ .
Peter-em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ taagken _ kingu aneng _ qamagte luteng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kingu itneng _ 500-neng _ uglagh lghii m _ maligsaaghtengita _ qerngaghllagmeng _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ kiyang _ taakut _ unguva ut _ , _ ila i _ tuqu kau ghngaaghmeng _ .
taagken _ James-em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ enkaam _ kinguvaqun _ qamagte luteng _ apostle-et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kinguligh u lunga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ ugpeghyaghqaghpagningitkaaghngaaghma _ kitum i _ alngunak _ .
Ukalighpigaagunga _ apostle-eni _ , _ talwa _ atigh yaghqaa nghite yagh unga _ apostle-meng _ , _ qayughllak _ amyuqetaatqegkaqanka _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ apostle-nguunga _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ avangite nghite uq _ . _ qepghagh aghagh unga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ apostle-et _ , _ iwernga _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ pi aqe unga _ .
qepghagh aghagh llegh ut _ ila mnneng _ megnu nagh ite uq _ . _ megnu nagh lghii ta _ taana _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke kaqe aput _ elpesi nun _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe kaqe asi _ .
ugpeqe u kesi _ ungipagh _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ : _ Christ-am _ unguvaghtellgha _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Sangamengam _ ila si _ pi aqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh naanghite ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ unguvaghtesimangilkan _ , _ Christ-a _ paninang _ tuqu nga nayagh uq _ .
paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ungipaghqe i uute ukut _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe yaghqagh ite usi _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvaghtesimangilkata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtesimangitaa _ Christ-a _ . _ Enkaangam _ whangkuta _ apostle-eni _ qamagte luta _ iqlengiqe ste u ukut _ qayughllak _ pi kau ukut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ-a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
tuqukagh t _ unguvaghtesimangilkata _ , _ Christ-allu _ unguvaghtesimangituq _ .
Christ-a _ paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii nghite ut _ enkaam _ aghyugh lleg nge lleqe usi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesinun _ .
Ugpeqistet _ Christ-akun _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ ifla nayagh ut _ .
neghyuke i llegh ut _ Christ-akun _ whaninginaghhaq _ kiyaghtaallemnni _ atugh u kan _ , _ nanglleg nagh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ukut _ yug ni _ kitumeng _ alngunak _ .
ipa u uq _ Christ-a _ unguvagh kau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liisimakngwaaghaghput _ whangkuta llu _ unguvaghtesaghqaagukut _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ .
tuqu llegh _ allgegh kau uq _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ Adam-kun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ unguvagh ste llegh _ tuqu llegh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ ilangakun _ yug kun _ , _ Christ-akun _ .
Adam-kun _ qamagte luni _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ Christ-amelnguut _ unguvaghtesaghqaagut _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ pi lleghqagh teng _ kaate nghata _ unguvagh aqe naagh ut _ : _ Christ-a _ sivulighpigaaluni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ taagken _ tagi nqigtekan _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi i _ unguvagh yaghqaa ut _ .
Christ-a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe llegh minun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghet _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ igleghutistet _ , _ yug t llu _ igleghutistet _ ilate luki _ . _ Christ-a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe llegh anun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ Christ-am _ anguyag i _ . _ kingulighpigagh _ anguyag _ tuqu llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqesagh qugh a _ . _ Christ-am _ tuune gkagu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mun _ taagken _ kenle a _ kaate lleqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ lli aghtesaghqagh ke a _ . _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke stesaghqagh ke a _ Christ-a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte stekunigu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ Christ-amun _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi kan _ , _ taagken _ ighnegh _ ellmi neng _ katam _ asi ligh u aghte yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ igleghte te lleqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ paaptaaye ste aqe ut _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u nghite kata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ sangamengam _ ila i _ paaptaaye ste aqe aat _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ ?
liisimake aput _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh kau ut _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungipagh ke i u ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tuqute naqe yagh ghngainkut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ipa u uq _ tuqusaqleggiinaq _ ayuqe aatnga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ katam _ liisimake llegh gpesistun _ quyake llegh ka _ ugpegh llegh i _ angli lghii _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghsi _ tuqusaqleggiinaq _ ayuqe kangatnga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yug t _ Ephesus-melnguut _ pilluwaqanka _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ allgegh te na lunga _ whani _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ pilluwaqumki _ , _ sa meng _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ . _ tuqu lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite kumta _ , _ " _ negh lta _ , _ megh lta _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ "
kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ilakumtaagh nge ma kufsi _ seghletun _ pikayug meng _ , _ atuqsagulleqaghsi _ sa u a _ pi aqe kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lusi _ pi nigh itun _ , _ seghleghqennanightek _ , _ ila si _ akulegpesinilnguut _ apeghtugh ma ite ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayngu yug yaghqaa usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi kan _ : _ " _ naten _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh ste aqe aat _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ Natelngughmeng _ yugusigh lgu yaghqau aat _ ? _ "
uyuq _ nalluuqaq _ ! _ piitute _ nuna kun _ peghu kuvgu _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ sivungagh ni _ piite lleghqagh mi _ .
piitute meng _ alla u luni _ angli aqe uq _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh negh gpeni _ , _ piitutesquvegaghhaq _ peghu aqe an _ nuna kun _ , _ wheat-kaghqaq _ nalighmeng _ sa u yaghqagh _ .
Piitutesquvegaghhaq _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ yugusilitaqaa _ . _ allake te lghiit _ piitute t _ allake te lghii meng _ yugusighqagh lgu ut _ .
Tawatelkutngwaaghunghitut _ yugusigh t _ . _ yug t _ , _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ iqallug t _ allake te ut _ yugusigh at _ .
qilag _ yugusightu uq _ , _ nuna _ yugusightu uq _ . _ yugusigh t _ qilagmelnguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ . _ yugusigh t llu _ nunamelnguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ .
siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t llu _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ . _ talwa _ ighaleqetaagh t _ allakaqaghtaghmeng _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ .
tawatete yaghqaa ut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh stekata _ tuqu llegh meng _ : _ nuna mi _ yugusigh put _ tuqu aqe ut _ , _ aghu aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh igh ragh aput _ tuqu naanghite u aghte ut _ .
llivegh kumeng _ nunamelnguut _ yugusigh put _ seghlegh ughte yaghqagh t _ kayaali yaghqagh t _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ pinighnagh yaghqagh llu _ iknaqe yaghqagh llu _ .
llivegh nghmini _ yugusigh _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ . _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ taghneghagh mnnun _ yugusigh u yaghqaa uq _ . _ yugusigh lgu kata _ yug t _ yugusighqagh lgu ut llu _ taghneghagh put _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ Yuksuwhaaq _ adam _ unguva lghii ughtekau uq _ . _ " _ iwernga _ kinguligh _ adam _ unguvallelitikayuguuq _ taghneghagh _ , _ Christ-anguuq _ .
sivuke luta _ yug m _ yugusigh aneng _ yugusigh nge aqe ukut _ , _ taagken _ taakwaningani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugusilitaqii _ taghneghagh put _ .
Yuksuwhaaq _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ , _ pagula aneng _ nuna m _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ yuug _ Christ-a _ , _ qilag meng _ pi u uq _ .
yug t _ kiyaghtekumeng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ yugusigh lgu ut _ Adam-em _ yugusigh itun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ qilag mi _ kiyaghte yaghqagh t _ Christ-atun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ .
Adam-etun _ yugusigh lgu lleg mtestun _ , _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ Christ-atun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ukut _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ yugusigh put _ ukut _ kemekrag meng _ , _ aaw meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ . _ unguva naanghite ut _ quunperugllag _ .
Ungipaataghllamsi _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ : _ qamagte luta _ tuqu naanghite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ allangughte yaghqaa ukut _ ,
sukate pigte luta _ qunqalleg llegh stun _ kingulighpigagh _ qalghightaq _ nagaqugh kumteggu _ . _ tawani _ qalghightagh llegh mi _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh uute yaghqaa ut _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusigh ligh luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ taagken _ whangkuta llu _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusingaghaghtaallequkut _ .
yugusigh put _ pagula meng _ ulimaagh t _ allangughte yaghqagh pestaagh u ut _ naafqesaghqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kayug t _ simigh yaghqaa ut _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqegkagh _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ : _ " _ tuqu llegh _ naafqe uq _ ; _ kayaalqe i i llegh _ iighwigh uq _ ! _ "
" _ tuqu _ , _ kayaalqe i i llegh n _ naagu _ ? _ tuqu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghen _ aqnighqe uute ziin _ whangkunnun _ naagu _ ? _ "
tuqu llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleni _ allgegh a qaa _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ aqnighte na luta _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llegh m _ liilightuusagh t _ aghtughyaghqaanghilqii _ .
Enkaangam _ iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe i i stekaqe ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kayaalqe i i lleghqagh ut _ ipapestaghutanganeng _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ aghula i te ste luki _ , _ nuuggaghtafqaafsi _ , _ quunpeng _ qepghagh teggu _ Atanghem _ qepghaqagh a _ . _ liisimakagh i _ atanegh kun _ qepghagh llegh i _ avangite nghite uq _ .
ukut _ esgha _ elpesi nun _ qelegh sagh nka _ mani meng _ tuune yaghqagh gpesineng _ ugpeqagh nun _ Judea-melngughnun _ . _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ Galatia-ghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellngistun _ pi tek _ .
Sivulighpigaghmi _ santillegh m _ aghnegh ani _ qamagte lusi _ aafte i aqe tek _ mani meng _ allgeghneghpesineng _ . _ tuune yaghqagh gpesi _ angtalanga _ allgeghneghpesi _ angtalanganeng _ iike luku _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ . _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ qerngughte i fqaafsi _ mani meng _ pi lghaasi _ .
kaate kuma _ kayagte lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ nakmike gkasi _ lata tgun _ aglagh te sqellug qu _ tunusagh i _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ whanga llu _ pi lleghqagh ka _ pinigh yaghqaa kan _ , _ maligte nakangatnga _ .
elpesi nun _ laalighte naqe gkuma _ sivuke lunga _ Macedonia-kun _ aag lleqe unga _ .
entaqun _ elpesinite aghagh qagh lleqe unga _ walluumllu _ uksulqusigh _ . _ taagken _ navek _ pi naqe gkuma _ yataaghqe lgusigh qagh nakefsinga _ .
Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ maaten _ pi kuma _ elpesinite aghagh yug aqe unga _ , _ aag vike ghesnagh yug nghite amsi _ .
iwernga _ ephesus- mete lleqe unga _ kenlanga _ Pentecost-em _ aghnegh anun _ ,
qayughllak _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ aange lghii _ qepghagh lleghqagh ka _ atanegh mun _ pi aqe uq _ . _ Maanllequnga _ qaywa _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ anguyag ke yagh ghngaatnga _ .
Timothy _ elpesi nun _ pi kan _ , _ elngaatall _ upugha tete nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ whanga mtun _ .
qamagte lusi _ asitnginaaghpenaan _ , _ enkaam _ quya nga an _ kayagte nakesi _ whanga mnun _ . _ utaqa aqe aqa _ maligte te luku _ ugpeqaalgutnun _ .
Ungipaataghllamsi _ ugpeqaalgutemnneng _ Apollos-meng _ . _ elngaatall _ qelegh kaqsagh aqa _ laalighfikesqellusi _ maligte luki _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgutet _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ piyug nghite uq _ . _ laalighfike naagh aisi _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuni _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesini _ aghula itek _ , _ ilutu tek _ , _ iknaqe tek _ .
piniqe llegh kun _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisima kasi _ Stephanas-enkut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe aqe yuwhaagh u lghiit _ Achaia-mi _ . _ atanegh mun _ tuune kau ut _ ellmeggneng _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ ila i _ kayusiite na luki _ .
qelegh amsi _ qaatkumanginiisqelluki _ liilightugh llegh it _ tawatelnguut _ yug t _ , _ ila i llu _ qepghalgutangit _ .
quya unga _ Stephanas-enkut _ , _ Fortunatus-enkut _ , _ Achaicus-enkut _ kaate lghiit _ qayughllak _ kayusiite u aatnga _ aviillegh gpesini _ .
Quyastengngwaatnga _ quya ste llegh megestun _ elpek si _ . _ kayusiite i llegh itnun _ iyamsiqa yug vike llegh gpesineng _ liisimakestengngwaaghnakesi _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Asia-melnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ Aquila-nkuk _ Priscilla-nkuk _ sumegh ke ghllag aisi nguq _ atanegh kun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ elkegkenka _ mangteghagh itni _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgutet _ whangamnilnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ quyake te aqe tek _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ : _ sumegh ke amsi _ . _ Paul _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ atanegh _ , _ naafqe lleg lgu uq _ . _ " _ Maranatha _ , _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ tea- ai _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ elpesi nite li _ .
piniqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ apostle-nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ , _ Timothy-mengllu _ pi u ut _ ugpeqaalgutemnneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ Corinth-em _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ iingunaghhaani _ Achaia-m _ .
yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tuune lisi _ quya ste llegh meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ nangllegtapiglleghii _ a ta _ , _ kiyaghnegh meng _ tagi aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ kayute kaghqagh _ !
kayusigh aqe ainkut _ qamagte luta _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ , _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ kayusighyaqlegwaaput _ tamaakut _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh lghiit _ , _ atuqe luku _ ataasigh _ taana _ kayusillegh _ allgeghtekaghput _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
katam _ ilate nga lleg mtestun _ Christ-am _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ Christ-akun _ ilate nga lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh ghllag anun _ .
ikfiqe gkumta _ , _ kayusillegh gpesinun llu _ yuguligh llegh gpesinun llu _ pillghuuq _ ; _ kayusillegh nge gkumta _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ kayusillegh nge lleqe usi _ enkaam _ tuune lleg nge lleqe usi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ suflughte yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ ikfiqe llegh t _ suflughtekagh put _ .
enkaam _ sighimake i llegh ut _ elpesi nun _ aghula i tuq _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ taana _ katam _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ ikfiqe lleg mnnun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ kayusillegh mun _ allgeghtekamnnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ nalluke sug nghite amsi _ seghleliigh llegh meng _ nanghiighkagh mnneng _ Asia-mi _ . _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ uqigtu pigtekau uq _ , _ repall _ sighima nanigh kau ukut _ kiyaghte lleghqagh mnneng _ .
ipapestaaq _ tuqu naqe ni luta _ pi yagh ukut _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ aneghte ukut _ whangkunneng _ sighimake fqaamta _ pisqelluta _ , _ taawanginaghhaq _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake sqellug qu _ unguvagh ste i kayug _ tuqukagh neng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh meng _ tuqum _ tevnegh aneng _ yuguliinkut _ , _ yugulilleqiinkutlu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima u ukut _ ellnga n _ yugulilaataghlleqiinkut _ ,
elpek si _ kayusiite ma luta _ yughagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke i llegh ghllag i _ whangkunneng _ kiimsigh lleg nge lleqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ ; _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ iglagtughlluteng _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ whangkunneng _ .
una _ esgha _ qukaayug sigh ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mta _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyaghtaalleghput _ whani _ nuna mi _ ipapighqengngaaqlu _ piniqe i nga uq llu _ , _ kiyang _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii kun _ kayusillegh akun _ , _ nakaan _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ .
qamagte luteng _ lata put _ elpesi nun _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ atightugh yaghqaa luteng llu _ liigike yaghqaa luteng llu _ . _ sighima kaqe amsi _ liigikngwaaghesqelluku
sa u a _ maaten _ liigikekagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ghhagh inagh a _ , _ enkaam _ aghnegh ani _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ elpek si _ qukaayugutkelleqaghpesikut _ katam _ whangkuta _ qukaayug tke lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
qayughllak _ ipapighqutkegkaqaqa _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ , _ sivuke lunga _ elpesi nun _ laalighte na lunga _ pi kaayagh unga _ , _ quyastellengnayukafsi _ malghughqengngaan _ .
laalighfike yu kaqe amsi _ aglagh te kete luku _ Macedonia-mun _ , _ uteghnigh te kete luku llu _ tamaaken _ , _ kayute nge na lunga _ elpesi neng _ iglegha lleghqagh mnun _ Judea-mun _ .
Sumeghpesinii _ tawaten _ qakiqniqe lleg mni _ ataasiighneghisingaa _ ? _ Sumeghpesinii _ qakiqniqe llegh ka _ nuna m _ yug atun _ ayuqe a _ , _ tawaninginaq _ pi yaghqagh _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ " _ " _ nakaa _ ? _ "
ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ , _ akequsagh ka _ elpesi nun _ " _ Aangʼghunghituqlu _ " _ " _ Nakaaghunghituqlu _ " _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ Silas-lu _ Timothy-llu _ whanga llu _ , _ " _ Aangʼghunghituqlu _ " _ " _ Nakaaghunghituqlu _ " _ ; _ iwernga _ ellnga ni _ quunpeng _ " _ Aangʼghuuq _ " _ .
ellnga u uq _ " _ angegh llegh _ " _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkuta _ " _ amen- u aghagh qu kut _ " _ ellnga kun _ usuqnemteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh ainkut _ , _ maligte te luta _ elpesi nun _ Christ-akun _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ aafte ainkut _ ;
nalluniigh ainkut _ ellmi nun _ pi u luta _ , _ tuune ak llu _ taghneghagh gni _ ilu mnnun _ nallangigh sagh u lukek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ whangukunnun _ .
tuqlugh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i ste u luku _ qayughllak _ liisimake kanga _ qaamna _ ilu ka _ ! _ Corinth-esugunghitunga _ seghleliighqesnayukamsi _ .
Igleghunnaqutkengngunghitaghput _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ ; _ qepghagh lgusigh yug amsi _ quyamasqellusi _ , _ qayughllak _ aghula i te usi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
taawa _ umyugagh gka _ ataasiighte ma agka _ alla _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ quya nghitesaghqagh u fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ .
qayughllak _ quya nghite stekumsi _ kitum ngam _ whanga _ qaqayugtesleqanga _ ? _ alla _ kitum _ pi naanghite anga _ iwerngaqun _ elpek si _ quya nghite stekagh ma _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ piyug nghite ngugh u nga _ quyanghitesnayukafsinga _ , _ elpek si _ quyanghitesnayukafsinga _ , _ elpek si _ quyastistemni _ . _ Ipapighqutkengngwaaqa _ una _ , _ whanga _ quya nga negh mni _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ quya nga aqe usi _ .
lata kau unga _ elpesi nun _ elngaatall _ aange luku _ qivghu lleg ligh lunga _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ , _ qiya magh ma _ alla _ quya nghite ste fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ taawanginaq _ liigike sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghllag ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ yuug _ seghleghqe lghii _ tawani _ , _ seghleghqe nghite uq _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi _ elpesi nun _ seghleghqengnguuq _ iwernga _ nakaan _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ . _ Uniighmighsunghitaqa _ sa meng _ pilleg mkun _ .
Tawatenginaq _ aghyuugh i llegh i _ itagnagh uq _ .
maaten _ seghevullukungʼngam _ kayeme teggu _ wata _ iilqennayukan _ repall _ iilqayug ghllag na yu kan _ .
manigugh utu te aqa _ elpesi nun _ liigike ste sqellug qu _ ipapestaaq _ piniqe ni luku _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ : _ liisimake na luku _ qaatkutngwaaqutsi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kina _ seghevunneghpisigu _ sa meng _ elpesi nun _ pillghaneng _ whanga llu _ seghevute aqe aqa _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghevute yaghqagh _ seghevute yug aqe aqa _ elpek si _ apaghllug lusi _ Christ-a _ tawantepiglleghhiistun _ ,
tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqe na yu kanginkut _ qayughllak _ liisimakegkefut _ sa u ta a _ yataaghqekagh a _ .
kaate yalghiinga _ Troas-mun _ ungipagh ke na luku _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ Atanghem _ pilleghqangestengngwaaghumakanganga _ .
iwernga _ pengeg ghllag kau unga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ titus _ aviilnguq _ tamaani _ . _ enkaam _ unite luki _ aghulaqe unga _ Macedonia-mun _ .
iwernga _ iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ iiwleng _ igleghte te u ainkut _ kayallqiingalleghqun _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkutgun _ mingitestengngwaa _ liisima lleg ni _ nani _ alngunak _ katam _ neqnigh lghii m _ tepe ngllagh sigh m _ tepagh nge an _ mingite llegh atun _ .
qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tepkegtagh stun _ neqnighsaasigh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ Christ-am _ aghqe tkekagh atun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tepe ut _ me ite u uq _ yugulikanunllu _ iflakagh nun llu _ .
Tamaakunun _ iflakagh nun _ tepe ke ainkut _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute i kayug m _ ; _ iwernga _ yugulikanun _ tepe ke a _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug m _ . _ kina ngam _ qepghagh yaghqau a _ tawatelngughmeng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ?
uglagh pigte lghii stun _ kinku stun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ salin _ qepghaghyaghqaanghilngughestun _ tamaaken _ qepghaqagh meng _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ pi aqe ait _ ilangistun _ qepghaqagh stun _ ayuqe ni luki _ allgegh te sighqagh t _ kiyaghtaaghusighqamun _ . _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ataasiighmete luta _ ipapighqelluta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ ; _ apegh aqe aput _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ kayagte llegh atun _ ungipaghte u luta llu _ qepghaghtengulutallu _ Christ-amun _ .
whangkuta _ usuqesaayuggnaqlaataghestaa _ whangkunneng _ katam _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ilangistun _ aklukingustaa _ lata meng _ aapghesqelluta _ elpesi nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ elpesi neng _ ?
elpek si _ , _ elpek si _ katam _ whangkuta _ lata ke amsi _ , _ igaqe nga usi _ ilu mteggun _ tea- ma anun _ liisimakesqellusillu _ atightiisqellusi _ .
Whateghlluwaaq _ lata u usi _ Christ-ameng _ pi t _ whangkunnun _ tuyugh qu ai _ . _ lata tke kau nghite usi _ ink- akun _ nalighmeng _ lliivneqegtagh tgun _ uyghag tgun _ . _ lata tke kau usi _ yug t _ ilu itgun _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyu lleg lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Christ-akun _ .
Whangkunneng _ pikninaanghitaghput _ qepghaghyaqleguniluku _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyaqleg ughte ste aqe ainkut _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
ellnga n _ qepghaghyaqlegughtestiinkut _ nutaghagh mun _ akequsagh mun _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh _ akequsagh _ igaqe nga lghii u nghite uq _ liilightuusagh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh gneng _ ayuqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga lghii m _ liilightuusagh m _ tagite a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ tuune a _ unguvallegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ uyghag tgun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqellgha _ aliigh kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune aqngata _ . _ Moses-em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute kau uq _ taagken _ nighughqelleghmeng _ , _ qaywa _ gheve ghngaan _ Israel-eghmiit _ esghaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ gginagh a _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ tuqu ste i yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qaatke nghite kangit _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ nighughqestighllagumakata _ ,
naten mi _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ nighughqestiighataghaghlleqa _ !
liilightuusagh _ nanqigte i yaghqaa kan _ yug meng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ nighughqengngayaghtuq _ ; _ anaggute llghite ni luteng _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ naten mi _ angka an _ nighughqengngalleghtulleqat _ !
tawaten _ pi u ukut _ qayughllak _ nighugataghalghiingughtuq _ nighughqelleq _ maaten _ , _ taana _ nighughqengngayalghii _ sivugh nghaani _ aviighute ma uq _ .
Nighughqellelguyaqan _ tawaten _ mulu ghraagkagh meng _ , _ naten mi _ angka an _ nighughqellegulleqa _ mulu ghllag yaghqagh meng _ quunperugllag _ !
taana _ sighimake te mnneng _ tetug igate u aghte ukut _ .
Moses-etun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ gginagh ni _ saaputagh iqe a _ enkaam _ Israel-eghmiit _ esghagh mangite aat _ nighug ghllag _ aviighute lghii _ .
umyugagh it _ liigikepagningite te kau ut _ , _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ umyugagh it _ saape nga ut _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ saaputagh meng _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ neghigh aat _ akequsagh t _ . _ taana _ saape te aq _ iqite yaghqaa uq _ Christ-anginaghhaghqun _ .
talwa _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses-mun _ tuunekagh t _ , _ umyugagh it _ saaputagh meng _ saape nga aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ qiive nghmini _ atanegh mun _ saaputagh a _ iqite aqe uq _ .
maaten _ atanegh _ taghneghagh u lghii _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi lgu kuni _ , _ iteme nga lleg lgu uq _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluta _ saape ta u na ki _ gginagh put _ esghaghlleqaghput _ nighughqellgha _ Atanghem _ . _ taana _ ataasigh _ nighughqelleq _ tagi lghii _ atanegh meng _ taghneghagh u uq _ , _ allangughte ainkut _ ellngasugnightesqelluta _ aange aghagh luku _ nighughqelleghmeng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut _ whaken _ qepghagh yaghqagh meng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iilqayugigate ukut _ .
ighsayagute kaqe aput _ aksaqekagh t llu _ kayngu nagh lghiit llu _ . _ puughte igate aput _ yug t _ , _ allangughte igate aput llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ Whateghlluwaaqlu _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapillghi _ , _ enkaangam _ yug t _ liite lleqe ainkut _ natelnguutfut _ esghagh ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh kekagh put _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ saape nga kata _ , _ saape nga ut _ ifla yaghqagh ghhagh inagh nun _ .
ellngit a _ ugpeqe igate aat _ ungipagh ut _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ , _ uum _ nuna m _ kiyaghnegh an _ , _ ayaa stekaqe ai _ umyugagh it _ . _ esghagh nghite sta qaa _ nighug a _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ nighughqellghaneng _ Christ-am _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ Christ-a _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Whangkunneng _ katam _ ungipagh ke u nghite ukut _ , _ itupill _ ungipaqngwaaghput _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ Atanghuniluku _ . _ Qepghaghtekaghpesikut _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ nighug _ kuukgute li _ mamleg llegh meng _ ! _ " _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ kiyaghnegh _ kuukgute ste i lghii _ nighug meng _ ilu mnnun _ . _ taaggun _ nighug kun _ legh igh iitagh ut _ nighughqellgha _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ gginagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kanaghtekaqe a _ taana _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu mnni _ . _ whangkuta _ qiku stun _ qantaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tea- ma yan _ liigike lleqe aat _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ kiyaghneghtagh u ni luku _ , _ whangkunneng _ pi u nghite ni luku _ .
seghleliigh lleg nge aqe ukut _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iwernga _ kayaalqe igate ainkut _ . _ ilangakun _ kukrag yug lleg nge aqe ukut _ iwernga _ sighima llghite te igate ukut _ .
amyuqetagh tke lleg nge aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unite igate ainkut _ ; _ aqnighqwaallengaqukut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ukut _ .
iiwleng _ tuqu llegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnnite uq _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvallegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnni _ .
unguva u luta _ iiwleng _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ unguvallegh a _ yugusigh mnni _ tuqu kayug ni _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ qayughllak _ qepghaatngukefut _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ qepghagh lleg mta _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallengestengngwiisi _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzite kaqe aqa _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ tawatete uq _ igaqe stetu te _ . _ whangkuta llu _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzitkaqaghput _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaqaa _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ whangkuta llu _ unguvagh lleqe ainkut _ Jesus-kun _ . _ taagken _ aglagh u lleqe ainkut _ qerngagh emta _ elpek si llu _ tawantelleghminun _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ apeghiighkagh t _ whangkunnun _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh an _ nula ste lleqe ai _ yug t _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ-akun _ . _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nula lleqe uq _ , _ quulvallengeghllagllequqlu _ .
enkaam _ iilqayugigate ukut _ . _ qaywa _ yugusigh put _ kayaali kestagh yagh nga a ta _ , _ taghneghagh put _ nutaghtengnguut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
seghleliigh lleg put _ sa squghhagh u ut _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ut _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe te u ainkut _ allgeghtesqelluku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ kenle ite ngughk _ quya llegh ghllag _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg put _ avangilngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke manginagh igate aput _ seghleliigh lleg put _ . _ itupill _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aput _ esghaghpagningilkeput _ . _ qantaghaqun _ seghleliigh lleg put _ kenletghuullequt _ , _ iwernga _ quya llegh ut _ esghiigalkefut _ quunpekaghqaaguq _ .
whani _ nuna mi _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ kiyaghfig put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh lgu uq _ qilag mi _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghfigkagh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ mangteghagh _ , _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite a _ . _ taana _ mangteghagh _ quunpekaghqaaguq _ .
ipa _ ngillegte ukut _ nuna mete u luta _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yu pigte lghiikut _ yugusighraghagh mnni _ qilag mi _ .
aatkagh stun _ aate lleqe aput _ tamaakut _ yugusigh igh ragh aat _ amsikaghmete nghite na luta _ .
yugusigh put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tiinta mete luta _ ngillegte aqe ukut llu _ , _ seghleliigh ukut llu _ qayughllak _ mat- aghte yug igate ke put _ . _ itupill _ simigh yug aqe aput _ yugusigh nun _ tuqu igate ngugh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ainkut _ whavek _ allangughte llegh mun _ . _ Whangkunnunllu _ tuune kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ liisimake sqellug qu _ allangughte lleghqagh ut _ ipapestaaq _ apeghiigh lleqe ni luku _ .
enkaam _ iiwleng _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ ne mete u luta _ yugusigh mnni _ , _ atanegh mete igate ukut _ .
Kiyaghtengnguukut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ esghaqagh yu mteggun _ .
enkaam _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ unite yug aqe aput _ yugusigh put _ ne mete na luta _ atanegh mi _ .
ne mete yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ ne mete nghite ghngaamta _ , _ efqughsugaqaghput _ atanegh _ .
qamagte luta _ nekeve pestaagh yaghqaa ukut _ Christ-am _ sivungagh kun _ nanqigtesqelluta _ . _ Ataasikaghtaamta _ allgegh u lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ apeghiigh te lleg mtestun _ yugusigh mteggun _ .
Enkaangam _ alikaqaghput _ atanegh _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpegh ste naqutke aqe aput _ yug t _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ainkut _ natelnguutfut _ yug ni _ , _ sunanguq _ elpek si llu _ liisimake tekut _ tawatete luta _ .
elpesi nun _ tuguklightesnaqutkengngunghitukut _ allameng _ . _ itupill _ ungipaate aqe amsi _ whangkunneng _ elpesi nun _ qukaayugutkesqelluta _ . _ taagken _ apeghyaqlegughlleqaghpesikut _ qukaayug tke i lghii nun _ yug m _ qaastulnginaghhaaneng _ . _ waakigate aat _ sa u ta a _ yug m _ ilumikekagh a _ .
Nallutuyiqngukumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nallutuyiqngunghilkumta _ , _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Christ-am _ igleghte te u ainkut _ piniqe llegh mikun _ . _ Liisimakngwaaghaghput _ yug m _ ataasigh m _ tuquma tke kaqe a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ yuug _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ .
Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lghiit _ kiyaghsaqlegullequt _ ellnga nun _ , _ nakaan _ ellmeggnun _ katam _ . _ tuqu luni _ unguvaghtekaaguq _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh atun _ . _ qaywa _ ataasigh meng _ sumeghtaghaatkegkaqaghput _ Christ-a _ nuna m _ yug an _ pillghatun _ , _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ-am _ pi liite nghminigu _ nutaghaghllug ughte aqe uq _ . _ Kiyaghtaalleluga _ aviighute aqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nutaghaghllug _ kiyaghtaallgha _ piinligh aqe uq _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ . _ ellnga n _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ Christ-akun _ . _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut llu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ ilaliighutesqelluki _ ellmi nun _ .
Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliigh u ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ , _ umyugagh mig ke gpenaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungipaghqalitkaqiinkut _ aapghesqelluki _ naten _ ellmi nun _ ilaliigh ta i _ ellngit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipaghte u luta _ Christ-amun _ , _ enkaam _ whangkutgun _ tagisqellusi _ ellmi nun _ . _ akuzi ste u ukut _ Christ-amun _ kayeme i lghiit _ ilaliighutesqellusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ seghleghqe mangite u aghte uq _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ seghleghqe kau luku _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ .
Qepghalgutkututemnneng _ kiyaghnegh llu _ , _ taawa _ kayeme amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ tugukligh gpenaan _ temngitwha u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi _ nagaqugh kaqe amken _ , _ aghnegh ani _ yuguligh llegh m _ kayusigh kaqe amken _ . _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maatenguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pilleghqaghlluwaagha _ ; _ nagate tek _ , _ maatenguuq _ aghnegh a _ yuguligh i llegh m _ !
Kiyaghtaallemteggun _ naagte yaghagh ngllagh igate aput _ yug t _ , _ seghlequufqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ atanegh mun _ .
iwernga _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ liigike ste aqe ukut _ yug nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghaghtekniluta _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nuqetutimallemteggun _ suflughtagh aqe aput _ seghleliigh llegh t _ , _ piyaqli i llegh t _ , _ ikfiqe llegh t _ .
Qevutquqaagukut _ , _ anusimingllagh kau ukut _ , _ uglagh te lleg nge kau ukut llu _ . _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ , _ qavagh llegh ke mangite ukut _ , _ iyatagh kau ukut llu _ .
Liigikestengnguukutlu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghaghtekutfut _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaallemteggun _ , _ liisimake i lleg mteggun _ , _ nuqetutillemteggun _ , _ nangllegtagh lleg mteggun _ , _ piniqipillemteggun _ , _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ .
Qepghaatngwaaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ ungipagh ke lleg mteggun _ ipapilleq _ . _ atugh qaghkagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ guutute kellug qu _ aghenqignegh mnnun llu _ saghumignegh mnnun llu _ .
Quulvallengaqukutlu _ ukavaghllengaqukutlu _ ; _ seghlequughsighaqukutlu _ usuqe lleg nge aqe ukut llu _ . _ iqlengagh lghii u na iqe ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ akuzi aqe ukut _ ipa pig meng _ .
yug t _ nalluke nigh ke ainkut _ , _ naqamllu _ liisimake luta _ ; _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ unguva ukut _ . _ aghyuugh yagh ghngainkut _ , _ tuqute igate ainkut _ .
qivghu u ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ quya nga ghllagu aqe ukut _ ; _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ aklungi igh i ste aqe aput _ yug t _ ; _ avaqraggiiteghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ pi lgu aqe ukut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ Corinth-eghmiini _ , _ ipapighqullusi _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ piniqe pigte amsi _ .
nuqnegh te mangite amsi _ piniqe lleg mnneng _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi u ut _ nuqnegh te ikagh t _ piniqe i llegh gpesineng _ whangkunnun _ .
maaten _ aleghqugh amsi _ avaqutagh ke pigte lghii stun _ , _ piniqeqeghtikut _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
inglu ke gpenaki _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ elqughutngagh llegh nkuk _ seghlegh nkuk _ inglu ke tepagningite uk _ . _ nighug nkuk llu _ mamleg nkuk llu _ qerngaghmetepagningituk _ .
Christ-am _ itagnaqsaghqaqenghitngwaaghaa _ tughneghagh _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ piyuke llegh it _ alla u ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ .
kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ manigugh yaghqaa nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga ni _ . _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ temple- ke ainkut _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ ellngitnite lleqe unga llu _ akulngitnillequngallu _ ; _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit llu _ yug ke lleqe anka _ . _ "
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ unite ki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ aafte tek _ ellngit neng _ . _ saafte gpenaki _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ ; _ enkaam _ tugukligh lleqe amsi _ .
Atakelleqaghpesinga _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ ighnegh ke lleqe amsi llu _ panike lleqe amsi llu _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ . _ "
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ tamaakuneng _ akequsagh ngllagh kau ta aneng _ whangkunnun _ , _ ukmangighsagh lteki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ nukeggnagh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ taghneghagh mta llu _ . _ Pelungightengngwaaghelta _ qayughllak _ alikaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ilaliigh qagh kut _ ilu gpesigun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ anagnga lghii meng _ pingigataghput _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ naafqumangitaghput _ , _ talwa _ puughneqguusimangitaghput _ .
ungipaate u nghite amsi _ tamaakuneng _ avutkennalusi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ piniqe pigte ni lusi _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lgusigh lleqe amsi _ nalighmeng _ tuqu lgusigh lleqe amsi _ .
neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qukaayug tke pigte amsi _ . _ Kayemeghllagaqaghpesinga _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag mnni _ paninang _ tevugha aqe unga _ quya llegh meng _ .
kaate aqngamta _ Macedonia-mun _ , _ meghnaalipagningite kau ukut _ . _ seghleliigh kau ukut _ tea- ma ani _ , _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh kaqe ainkut _ , _ teggellghiigh kau ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh aqe ai _ iilqengngalghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ilutughsagh ainkut _ tagi ste llegh mikun _ titus _ whangkunnun _ .
ilutughtekau ukut _ tagi aqngan _ titus _ , _ iwernga _ ilutughllengataghaghtukut _ ungipagh sigh nkut _ elpesi nun _ ilutughsagh ma ni luni _ . _ ungipaate ainkut _ elpesi nun _ esghagh yug pigte ni lunga _ , _ qivghuke ni lunga _ seghleliighqelleghpesineng _ , _ kayusigh yug pigte ni lunga llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ wanlegi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ .
qaywa _ lata mkun _ qivghu ste ghngaamsi _ , _ avuteghqutkengngunghitanka _ lata nka _ . _ sivukun _ avuteghqesagh unga _ qayughllak _ lata ma _ qivghu ste aghtegkangisi _ .
quya u nghite unga _ lata mnun _ qivghu te ma ni lusi _ . _ iwernga _ quya ghllagu unga _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ allangughte stekaqe kangi _ kiyaghtaallesi _ . _ qivghu llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ , _ enkaam _ naten _ alngunak _ whangkuta _ aqnighte llghite amsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe aqe a _ qivghu llegh _ yug nun _ avuteghqelluki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ yugulillengesqelluki _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ avuteghqe te kete naanghite a _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ iwernga _ qivghu llegh _ nuna meng _ pi _ tuqu ta iqe uq _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ sa u ta a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ qivghu llegh gpesigun _ . _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ efqughute sug ghllag aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elngaatall _ ipapighqennaqutkegkaayaghtusi _ anaggute llghite ni lusi _ . _ Ugumiyagutkaqaghsi _ anaggute llegh _ , _ alingruugh kau usi llu _ . _ Esghaghyupigtekaqaghpesinga _ , _ pinitun _ pi kau usi _ , _ aghyuugh qaghkagh i llu _ anaggutekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ipapighqegkaagusi _ apallugh ite ni lusi _ .
enkaam _ qaywa _ tawaten _ lata yagh ghngaamsi _ , _ apallugh ke u nghite aqa _ anaggutekagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawavek _ seghletun _ pikagh anun _ . _ itupill _ lata kaqe amsi _ liigikngwaaghesqellusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma nghaani _ tuunʼngwaaghlusi _ whangkunnun _ ayuqe lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilutughtengngaakut _ . _ Ilutughtengnginaghpenaamta _ , _ iwernga _ quyaaghataghaghtukut _ esghagh luku _ Titus-em _ quya ma llegh a _ . _ qamagte lusi _ sumeghyalingiitesimaaghsi _ .
Qanatkegkaqamsi _ titus- mun _ efqugh ke ni lusi _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi aqngami _ liite kaqe ai _ ipa u ta i _ sa meng _ pillghenka _ elpesi neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ kayngu yagute llghite anka _ qanatkillghenka _ . _ iiwleng _ ipapighqelluta _ aleghqugh aqe amsi _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ipa u ut _ qanatkilleghput _ titus- mun _ .
enkaam _ Titus-em _ wanlegi _ pinigh kau aghte aisi _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghminigu _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ upugha te kaqe kesi llu _ alinge lleg ligh lusi _ , _ up- nge llegte llegh ligh lusi _ .
quya ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ !
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ whangkuta _ liisimakesuwamsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig itni _ Macedonia-m _ .
