liisima llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ nuqetutilleq _ , _ nuqetutilleghpesinun _ ilate ggu _ aghuliilkaamalleq _ , _ aghuliilkaamelleghpesinun _ ilate ggu _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh _ ,
kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ nangllekututelleq _ ugpeqaalgutegpesinun _ , _ nangllekututelleghpesinun _ ilate ggu _ piniqe llegh _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe u kufsiki _ , _ nula stekufsiki llu _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ atughqagh u lusi llu _ kayute kaghqagh u lusi llu _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ , _ amugtagh pigte uq _ enkaam _ esghaatepagningite uq _ . _ puygu kaqe a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe kanga _ seghleghqe lleqe yagh ka aneng _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nalluneqniighwaaghteggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ taawa _ iqiteqaghte naanghite usi _ Christ-ameng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyake sigh ke ghllag lusi _ itegh ste lleqe aisi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ atanegh mta llu _ Yugulighistemtallu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
qaywa _ liisimake ghngaaghpesiki _ taakut _ ipapillghet _ , _ sagiqe te u ghngaaghpesiki llu _ qaute kete na luki _ , _ iiwleng _ neqangugh lleqe amsi _ taakuneng _ ipapilleghneng _ elpesi nun _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ .
sume mni _ itagnagh uq _ negh ka ughte aatagh kumsi _ tamaakuneng _ unguva u lunga _ .
liisimake aqa _ tuqu yaghtugh unga _ qayughllak _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe aanga _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ apeghtugh amsi _ tamaaken _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh ma _ kingu aneng _ neqagh te aqe lleqe asi _ .
atuqe mangite aput _ peghqiniqutngwaaghluki _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ apegh aqe yamtekek _ elpesi nun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghallu _ tagi llegh a llu _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ whangkuta _ katam _ iyeghlluwaamnneng _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ellnga n _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
Jesus-em _ allgeghtaqngagu _ quulvalleqlu _ nighughqelleqlu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe a _ me a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ Qulighpigaalghii _ Nighughqengngaghllak _ . _ ata m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ Unanguuq _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigtegkegka _ . _ "
whangkuta _ whangkunneng _ katam _ nagatkaqaghput _ me _ qilag meng _ Jesus-metaqngamta _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ naayghagh mi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkunni _ nalluneqnaqraggiitut _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ipa u ta i _ . _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lleqe ut _ sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaqufsiki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ kenegh lghutagh m _ kuukgute llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ mamleg mun _ . _ tawatete kestagh tek _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ tagi lleghqagh an _ aghnegh anun _ . _ taagken _ nighug a _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ unaangum _ ighaleqetaagh atun _ ayuqe luni _ .
Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi _ una _ : _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ liigikepagningite ai _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ Akuzitnilnguut _ igaqegkagh ni _ .
Uuknaliqistet _ nakmike mangite ait _ uuknaliqe te kete yaghqagh teng _ . _ itupill _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzitelitkaqii _ akuzisqelluki _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ uuknaliqistesiighwaaghet _ akulngitnisaghtut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ katam _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ akulegpesinillequt _ . _ nallu negh gpesini _ apeghtugh lleqe aisi _ iqlengameng _ naafqennaluki _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ . _ qaywa _ Christ-am _ Piliitestengita _ tukfigh kaqe ghngaisteng _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ piknanighlleqaat _ . _ enkaam _ nuuskagan _ ellmeggneng _ naafqe ste lleqe ut _ .
yug lghute t _ maligte te lleqe ut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghnun _ kayngunalghinun _ kiyaghtaallghitnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ seghlequughlleqiit _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ atugh put _ .
Pakigtelleghmegteggun _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ aklungi igh i yug lleqe ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ enkaam _ apegh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ mani nge na luteng _ elpesi neng _ . _ ima _ neghighhaaneng _ kiyaghnegh _ Nanqigtistengatlu _ Naafqiistengatlu _ qavagh igate uq _ aghyuughyaqlegughllukillu _ ayuqe ai _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yaquleg t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ iwernga _ miluute kaqe ai _ hell- mun _ . _ tawani _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ qiipraghusighngaat _ , _ utaqa i lghiit _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyaghtengnguluku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yug t _ avelghasingwaaghikat _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ uleve stekaqe a _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ yugulikaqaa _ noah _ , _ ila i llu _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ . _ ( _ noah _ ungipaghte u kau uq _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ kiyaghtaalleghmun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe ak llu _ ne ghllag k _ Sodom-enkuk _ Gomorrah-nkuk _ . _ naafqe kaqe ak _ kenegh kun _ kenlanga _ ashes- ngughte llegh gkenun _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh ughtekaqe ak _ sa yaghqaa ta i _ yug t _ avelghagh sighwaagh ikagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
Lot _ elqughutngagh lghii u yagh uq _ yuug _ kiyaghtekagh _ akule itni _ tamaakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ seghleliigh tke ghllag kaqe ai _ unguva sigh gmikun _ esghapag luki _ , _ nagate luki _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaallghit _ , _ nuqete gpenateng llu _ sex-ellghit _ . _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ yugulikaqaa _ .
taawa _ legh igh iitagh ut _ , _ atanegh _ liisimake uq _ naten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ nanghiighsaghallengenghata _ . _ kelengake u ai llu _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ aghyuullengelleghmelnguut _ , _ utaqa i ma luki _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
taana _ aghyuugh llegh _ kiyang _ tamaakunun _ ayuqe uq _ maligte te lghii nun _ yugusigh meng _ seghletun _ piyuke llegh ghllag itnun _ , _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh nun llu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ tetug igate ut llu _ ellminguyugneghuutlu _ . _ alinge gpenateng _ seghlequughaqiit _ nighugrakegtat _ .
yaquleg t _ iknaqe aghagh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte ut _ taakuneng _ nighugrakegtaneng _ , _ paninang _ sivungagh ni _ Atanghem _ anaggute ma ni naanghite ait _ nighugrakegtat _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ seghlequughaqiit _ sa u aat _ liigike gpenaki _ . _ teghig ke sagh stun _ sumeghtaghaghpagningilnguugut _ . _ tuqute lleg nge lleqe ut _ teghig ke sagh stun _ allgegh luteng _ teghigtughluki _ tuqu tke aat _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ikfiqe ste aqe ait _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ai _ . _ talwa _ aghnegh raaghinagh mi _ meghe uute ghllag aqe ut _ , _ yugusigh meng llu _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ atuqe aqe ait _ . _ kayngusaghagh te ghllag aqe ut _ neqenghaghqe lgusigh ma lusi _ , _ enkaam _ akule gpesini _ nukeggnaghqekagh stun llu _ ellmiigutkastunllu _ ayuqe ut _ .
esghagh nghmegteki _ aghnagh t _ qiliigh ke aqe ait _ . _ seghleghqe sug neghtu ut _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lghutagh nge i ta _ kepsughsigatngwaaghiit _ . _ manu igh aqe ait _ yug t _ puughhe negh kegtagh t _ seghleghqesugesqelluki _ , _ pakignegh pigte ut llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ !
tamaakut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ ugpeqe nanigh kaqe ait _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ . _ enkaam _ aghulaqe kau ut _ Balaam-em _ pillghatun _ pi na luteng _ . _ ( _ ighnegh ke yagh kanga _ Beor-em _ . _ ) _ quya aqe uq _ yug t _ akileghtugh nghatni _ seghletun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ donkey-m _ akuzipagningilnguum _ , _ yug m _ me akun _ ineghtekaqe a _ Balaam _ . _ enkaam _ aghula i aghtekaqe a _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sumeghnegh igh ulliqe llegh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ pateghkagh stun _ sengngugh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qilagwaaghestunllu _ ayuqe ut _ anuqe ghllag m _ tengtekangi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te kaqe ai _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ .
Aghsaaghmikameng _ aangaayugte aqe ut _ temngitwhameng _ akuzite kete luteng _ . _ pi aqe ut _ itagnagh ni luku _ malighqutagh ke lleghqagh _ seghlegh nun _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh meggneng _ , _ manu igh aqe ait _ tawaten _ pinqigtesqelluki _ .
Apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ tamaakut _ yug t _ iteme nga ni luki _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ iteme nga u nghite ghngaaghmeng _ . _ Qepghaghtelaaghuut _ seghleghqe llegh meggnun _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llghite a _ naafqesaqlegwii _ . _ yuug _ qepghaghtelaaghuuq _ alngunak _ sa mun _ igleqataqilghiimeng _ ellmi nun _ .
yug t _ liite aqe yamegteggu _ atanegh ut llu _ Yugulighistevutlu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ anag yaghqaqe aat _ nukeggnagh a _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ uteghnigh nqigtekumeng _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun _ uaf- ghqutagh kesi ma kumeng llu _ tamaakunun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghtaallghit _ seghleghataghaayaghqaagut _ pi yuwhaagh llegh meggneng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ liitngwaaghluku _ agleghnagh lghii _ qelegh sagh _ allgeghtekaghteng _ , _ tunute kaqe aat _ . _ Itaghnaghataghaghnayaghtut _ liite mangite yagh kumegteggu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ kiyaghtaalleq _ .
tawaten _ aneghte llghite a _ ipa ughte ste aat _ yug t _ pillghat _ , _ " _ qikmigh m _ uteghte vike aqe a _ mighyaghkagh ni _ , _ kurugagh llu _ ughvughqekagh _ aglagh nqigte luni _ ugharramun _ mingughunneqigtaquq _ . _ "
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ ukut _ alghigh tke ai _ lata llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ tea- ma ghhagh gkenkun _ lata llegh ma _ neqangugh ste naqutke amsi _ liisimakekagh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghtaghigh sqe sug amsi _ tamaakuneng _ ipapighqellusi _ .
elpesi nun _ neqamike sug anka _ agleghnagh lghiit _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ . _ neqamike sug aqa llu _ qelegh sagh _ atanegh mta _ Yugulighistem _ aapte qugh a _ apostle-egpesigun _ .
Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi _ una _ : _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ legasiighwaghtelguyaghqaaguq _ ; _ tamaakunguut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ seghlegh nun _ piyukekagh meggnun _ . _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ ,
whaten _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ Jesus _ akeqe i kau uq _ tagi nqigte lleqe ni luni _ . _ naagu _ ? _ ima _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate te llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ almesiqe aqe a _ nuna m _ piinlillegh aneng _ . _ "
nakmiigh kau ut _ avelghasingwaaghnaluku _ una _ ipapilleq _ : _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite mikun _ ulima kaqe a _ qilag a _ , _ ulima kaqe a llu _ nuna _ megh meng _ , _ megh kun llu _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh meng _ uleve ste luku _ nuna _ naafqe kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ taaggun _ akuzite kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflenga kaqe ai _ qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ naafqesaghqagh u luki _ kenegh kun _ . _ aflengake u ut _ kenlanga _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ . _ tawani llu _ aghneghmi _ naafqe lleqe ai _ yug t _ avelghasingwaaghikat _ ellmi neng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puygu gpenaan _ una _ ! _ atanegh mi _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh tun _ aghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
atanegh _ egnaangite nghite uq _ akequsagh ni _ pi yaghqaa luku _ , _ ila ita _ yug t _ sumeghtaghallghistun _ . _ yeghlegi _ nekeggmetutaqiisi _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ifla yug u nghite kanga _ . _ itupill _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ avuteghqe sqe sug aa _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
iwernga _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ tagi lleqe uq _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ qilag a _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ eftughuute te ghllag meng _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luteng _ qilagamelnguut _ kenghem _ ughug lleqe ai _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ nunamelnguut _ panegh lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ ughug yaghqaa ta itneng _ , _ elpek si _ yug ni _ natelnguunaqetsi _ ? _ Kiyaghtaallesi _ pelungite lit _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ ayuqligh t _ ,
utaqa i ma lusi _ aghnegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Pinaqellghaghsi _ qamagte luku _ pinitun _ pi tek _ aghneq _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ kenghem _ naafqe lleqe a _ qilag a _ , _ maatnegh m llu _ ughug lleqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qilagamelnguut _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ utaqa i u ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ . _ pi kau uq _ nutaghagh meng _ qilaga ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ nutaghagh meng llu _ nuna ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ . _ tawani _ elqughutngagh lghii inagh t _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ .
Enkaangam _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ pinaqellghaghsi _ qamagte luku _ pelungi tek llu _ afkuyagh ii tek llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ . _ Nekeggmeteklu _ ellnga ni _ .
sumeghmike teggu _ atanegh mta _ nuqetutillgha _ elpesi neng _ yuguligh lleg nge sqe qaghte lusi _ . _ piniqekagh mta _ ugpeqaalgutemta _ Paul-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata aqe yamisi _ peghqinellegh ligh luni _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
lata tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ lata mikun _ . _ nalighnegh i _ Paul-em _ lata yan _ liigike neghllug u ut _ . _ yug t _ liigikellepagilnguut _ , _ ugpeqillepagilnguut _ allangughte aqe ait _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ latanganilnguut _ . _ tawaten llu _ pi aqe ait _ ila i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ enkaam _ naafqengnguut _ ellmeggneng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ liisimake te gpesineng _ sa aqe ta i _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ kelenga tek _ . _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga lghii nun _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ malghukli naanghite usi _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nagnegh tek _ wataqaaghaq _ liisimake luku _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ Yugulighistevut _ , _ nagnegh tek llu _ wataqaaghaq _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-a _ usuqe lteggu _ , _ quulvaalteggu _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ ! _ amen _ .
taana _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ : _ nagaqughkagh ut _ , _ esghaghkagh ut _ whangkuta _ katam _ iye mnneng _ , _ esghapagkagh ut _ , _ saaftekagh ut _ iigge mnneng _ , _ taananguuq _ akuzite _ unguvallegh _ .
taana _ unguvallegh _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste aqngan _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ; _ enkaam _ whaa _ aapghaghputlu _ ungipaghkagh ut llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ata mete yagh lghii _ , _ esghagh stekagh _ whangkunnun _ .
Aapghaghput _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ut llu _ nagatekagh ut llu _ ilatesqellusi _ whangkunnun _ , _ ilate nga lleg mnnun llu _ ata mun _ , _ ighneghagh nun llu _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ .
lata tke aput _ tamaakut _ quya llegh ut _ iighwigh sqellug qu _ .
una _ ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh ut _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh naqagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ Kiyaghneghnguq _ nighug u uq _ , _ mamlelleqraggiituq _ .
iwernga _ ilate nga ni kumta _ ellnga nun _ naqam _ paninang _ mamleg mi _ kiyaghtengnguluta _ , _ iqlengiqe u ukut _ , _ atuqigataghputlu _ ipapighqelleq _ .
iwernga _ nighug mi _ kiyaghtekumta _ ellnga n _ nighug mete llegh atun _ taawa _ ilate nga ukut _ ila mnnun _ , _ aaw an llu _ Jesus-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh an _ , _ ukmangiiwiinkut _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
seghleghqe llghite ni kumta _ puughtengnguukut _ whangkunneng _ katam _ , _ ipapighqellghitukutlu _ .
iwernga _ apegh kumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute yaghqaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ , _ ukmangigh yaghqaqe ainkut llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ anaggute aghagh lleg mnneng _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq llu _ elqughute luni llu _ ayuqe lghii u uq _ .
seghleghqe igate ni kumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqestengughlleqaghput _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ atuqe u nghite aput _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ whaten _ lata u amsi _ seghleghqe fqaafsi _ pisqellusi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe gkan _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ manigugh utu te aqe ainkut _ ata mun _ .
ellnga u uq _ iqite sigh _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ whangkunginaamta _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tamaghaghllagan _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ayuqe uq _ .
esgha _ whaten _ ipapighqutkesaghqaghput _ liisimake i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun _ qelegh sagh i _ .
kina _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ qaatke gpenaki _ qelegh sagh i _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ , _ nalluke a llu _ ipapighqelleq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piniqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapestaaq _ iighwigh kau uq _ , _ tawaten _ ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghput _ ellnganitulvut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ kiyaghtengnguniluni _ ellnga ni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ pillghatun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ . _ Taananguuq _ neghightagh _ qelegh sagh _ nagate kayug i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ , _ taana _ ungipagh u uq _ nagate kayug i _ .
iwernga _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u uq _ . _ Taam _ ipapighqellgha _ esghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ Christ-akunllu _ elpesigun llu _ qayughllak _ mamleg _ aga _ naghughtengnguuq _ , _ nighug pig _ kuukgute u uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ nighug mete ni luni _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeqaalgutni _ , _ paninang _ mamlegmelnguuguq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgutni _ nighug mi _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ , _ nighugmetutmineng _ naagte sighqagh ite uq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgutni _ , _ mamleg mete uq _ . _ Igleghtengnguuq _ mamleg mi _ , _ talwa _ nalluke uq _ navek _ pi u te ni _ qayughllak _ mamleg m _ ayaa stekaqe a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghevute lleg nge kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi _ tughneghagh _ . _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ a ta _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghiisi _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilugpesinilnguut _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi llu _ tughneghagh _ .
piniqe gpenaan _ nuna _ talwa _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nuna m _ pi a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna _ , _ piniqe llghite uq _ ata mun _ .
ukut _ esgha _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ pi i _ : _ sa u a _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh a _ seghleghqe sigh ke aqe lghii _ , _ iye m _ qiliigh ste llegh a _ , _ sa u aat llu _ yug t _ qukaayug te kaqe kangit _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ taakut _ ata meng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ .
nuna _ aviighute u uq _ , _ tamaakut llu _ seghleghqusiiwaqelghiit _ yug m _ piyuke aqe kangi _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ ! _ ungipaate kau usi _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ-ameng _ tagi lleqe ni luku _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ uglapiglleghiit _ anguyag ke i lghiit _ Christ-ameng _ allgeghtuutngwaaghluteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ .
tamaakut _ whangkunnisaghtut _ iwernga _ unite kaqe ainkut _ qayughllak _ ilatngwaaghumangilnguut _ whangkunnun _ . _ Ilatngwaaqaayaqumeng _ unite nayagh nghite ainkut _ . _ unite llegh megteggun _ liigikestengngwaaghaat _ ilatngwaaghumangitelleghteng _ whangkunnun _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ , _ Christ-am _ kuuve kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ ipapighqelleq _ .
Latangustemsii-i _ ipapighqelleq _ nalluke te gpesineng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ lata u amsi _ liisimake te gpesineng _ . _ liisimake kesi llu _ iqlengiqe llegh _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ pi u nghite ngughk _ .
kina _ iqlengiqe ste u a _ ? _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-angunghituq _ . _ " _ taana nguq _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ-ameng _ qayughllak _ ighsake kek _ ata nkuk _ ighnegh nkuk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ighsake gkunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ ighsake yaghqaqe a _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ .
Enkaangam _ iiwleng _ neqamike luku _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh kekagh _ elpesi nun _ ugpegh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ ima _ . _ atuqe manginagh kufsigu _ nagaqughkagh i _ taawa _ iiwleng _ ighnegh mete lleqe usi llu _ ata mete lleqe usi llu _ .
Unanguuq _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ whangkunnun _ , _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ elpesi nun _ tamaakut _ puughte i naqutke lghiit _ elpesi neng _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ Christ-am _ kuuvikegkaqiisi _ taghneghagh gmineng _ . _ taghneghagh kek _ ilugpesinitutmegneng _ alla _ kina _ alngunak _ Apeghtughisteksugnaanghitaghsi _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh gkenka _ apeghtugh aqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ temngingu nghite ut _ enkaam _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtulghatun _ Christ-ametekestaghtek _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ Christ-ametekestaghtek _ enkaam _ uka _ aliigh kan _ ilutu yaghqaa luta _ , _ iigh naqe fqaamta _ kaynguyugem _ ellnga neng _ pi lghaakut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ tagi llegh ani _ .
liisimake kesi _ Christ-a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ liisimake yaghqaqe asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ elqughute nga an _ pikayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh ke ai _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ ata m _ piniqe i ma llegh ghllag a _ whangkunnun _ , _ avaqutagh ke na iqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ , _ ipa _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ tamaaken _ apate lugh qu luku _ nuna m _ yug an _ nalluke ainkut _ qayughllak _ nalluke kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ taawa _ avaqutagh ke kanginkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ iwernga _ salin _ whateghlluwaaq _ liigikigataghput _ naten _ lliigh lleghqagh ut _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh ut _ , _ Christ-a _ aliigh kan _ ellnga tun _ ayuqe lleqe ukut _ qayughllak _ esghaghlleqaghput _ legan _ tawatete luku _ .
taana _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ sighimake gkunigu _ Christ-akun _ pelungighsagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ Christ-am _ pelungite llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghlleghqegkayuk _ qaatke te igate uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ qaatke te nghite llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
liisimakagh i _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ ellnga _ seghleghqe llghite uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ-ami _ kiyaghte lghii _ seghleghqumanginaghnaangituq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kuni _ , _ liigike mangite a llu _ nallu kaqe a llu _ Christ-a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pikayug _ elqughute nga uq _ katam _ Christ-am _ elqughutngagh llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh lghii _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh _ seghleghqengngulghii _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ . _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ allgegh kau uq _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ naafqennaluku _ tughneghagh m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ taghnughhagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe manginagh igate uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh a _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ; _ qayughllak llu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata ke kanga _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ .
whaten _ liisimake yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ avaquti a _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ avaquti a _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pi igate ngughk _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke i nga lghii _ yug lgute mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke nghite a _ .
ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ unanguuq _ : _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
Cain-etun _ ayuqe yaghqaa nghite ukut _ . _ Cain _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ enkaam _ tuqute kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ anglegute ni _ . _ sangan _ tuqute agu _ ? _ qayughllak _ sallghi _ anaggute nga lghiit _ naqam _ anglegutangan _ sallghi _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ nuna m _ yug an _ ugumi ke kangisi _ .
liisimake ukut _ tuqumeng _ alpag kau ukut _ unguvallegh mun _ qayughllak _ piniqe ke put _ ugpeqaalguteput _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i igate ngughk _ paninang _ tuqumetuq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgutni _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ yugtaghtem _ ilu ani _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ kiyaghtengngunghituq _ .
whaten _ esgha _ liisimakegkefut _ piniqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ : _ Christ-am _ tuune llegh akun _ unguvallegh ni _ whangkunnun _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ tuune lteki _ unguvallegh put _ ugpeqaalgutemnnun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ naamaghmi _ kiyaghtaaghem _ esghagh luku _ ugpeqaalgutni _ akluma lghii _ nanglleg ke nghite kunigu _ , _ natenʼngam _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ ilu nga ni lleqe a _ ?
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ ! _ piniqe i yaghqaa nghite ukut _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun llu _ akuzillegh mteggun llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ piniqe i lta _ ipapighqelluta _ nangaghnegh mteggun _ .
Enkaangam _ liisimake lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapighqelleghmun _ pikutfut _ . _ seghleghni negh mta llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ nalluneqsuknaanghitaghput _ seghevute i nga llegh a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghyug nga lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimake kanga llu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghleghni nghite kumta _ tetugnaanghitaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aapte negh mta llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ ellnga neng _ qayughllak _ qaatke aqe ke put _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ , _ atuqe aqe ke put llu _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ ellnga ni _ .
una _ esgha _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ whangkunnun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ighnegh mi _ ategh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ pinigh qutu tete luta llu _ Christ-am _ qelegh llegh atun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ liisimakegkefut _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkunnitellgha _ : _ Taghneghagnekun _ tuunekagh mikun _ whangkunnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ taghneghagh t _ . _ yeghlegi _ liigike naqe aqe teki _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghet _ mingite ma ut _ nuna mi _ .
esgha _ whaten _ liisimake yaghqagh gsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ taghneghagh ke te kek _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ , _ kiyaghneghtagh u uq _ .
iwernga _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ mesag ii aghagh u uute kagu _ Jesus _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau nghite ni luku _ kiyaghneghtagh u nghite uq _ . _ taake uk _ taghneghagh k _ anguyag ke i lghii meng _ Christ-ameng _ pi u uk _ nagaqughkagh gpesineng _ tagi i yaghqaa ni lukek _ . _ taawa _ maaten _ kaatngwaaghlutek _ nuna mun _ ayuqe uk _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ pikutanganeng _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe asi _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ilu gpesinite ngughk _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte uq _ nunamelngughmeng _ .
tamaakut _ nuna m _ pi ke ai _ , _ apeghtuusagh it _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug an _ nagate aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ liisimake i lghii m _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nagate aqe ainkut _ . _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ kiyaghnegh m _ pike nghite ka an _ nagate igate ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ esgha _ liisimake yaghqagh gput _ taghneghagh kek _ ipapighqellghem _ nalighmeng _ taghneghagh kek _ ipa u nghite ngugh m _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ yeqay _ pinigh qutu te lta _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i nga lghii _ taghnughhagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liisimake a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe i nghite ngugh m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ taananginaghhaq _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ unguvallengesqelluta _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ whangkunnun _ .
piniqe llegh _ akuzi tke kegka _ whangkuta _ piniqelqenghitaghput _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ke a _ whangkunnun _ keleg tke a _ kayagte llegh mikun _ ighnegh ni _ iqitute yu i luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ whangkunnun _ tawatete kan _ whangkuta llu _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ esghiigatngwaaghaa _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ piniquskumta _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ ilu mnni _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ ilu mnni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ ellmi _ katam _ taghneghagh gmineng _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ whankunni _ , _ whangkuta _ ellnga ni _ .
esghaqaghkagh ut _ ighnegh a _ . _ enkaam _ ungipaqngwaaghput _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagtekaqe ni luku _ yuguligh i ste u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ ellnga ni _ , _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ugpeqagh ut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i llegh a _ whangkunnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghte lghii _ piniqe llegh mi _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ .
enkaam _ piniqe llegh _ iighwightekaaguq _ ilu mnni _ ilutusqelluta _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawatete ukut _ qayughllak _ Christ-atun _ ayuqe lghiikut _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
piniqe llegh mi _ alinge llegh _ aviite uq _ qayughllak _ iighwighkagh m _ piniqe llegh m _ ighlleqayuwaa _ alinge llegh _ . _ Enkaangam _ piniqe llegh _ iighwigh mangite uq _ tamaa kuni _ paninang _ alinge kayug ni _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lleg lgu uq _ aghyuugh llegh _ .
piniqe i aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivuke luni _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ .
kina _ pikumi _ , _ " _ piniqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeqaalgutni _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ . _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqaalgutni _ esghaqagh yu ni _ , _ piniqe naanghite a _ kiyaghnegh _ esghagh igate kete ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh ke a _ Christ-am _ whangkunnun _ , _ kitum _ piniqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ ugpeqaalgutnillu _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe u kunigu _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-angutanga _ , _ avaqutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ a ta _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai _ avaquti a _ .
whaten _ liisimaksaghqaqaghput _ piniqe i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ : _ piniqe lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun llu _ qelegh sagh i _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ : _ qaatke te llegh ut _ qelegh sagh anun _ . _ qelegh sagh i _ piyaqnagh ghllagu nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaghhagh mi _ avaqutagh liitekagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe kaqe a _ nuna _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ kayaalqesaghqagh ut _ nuna _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ .
kinangaawa _ kayaalqe i i sta _ nuna meng _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana ta _ kayaalqe i i sta _ .
Jesus _ Christ-anguuq _ tagikagh _ . _ tagi kau uq _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ meghhagh inagh kun _ iwernga _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ tagi kau uq _ .
taghneghagh m _ apegh aa _ taana _ ipa u ni luku _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh k _ ipapighqellghulghiik _ .
taawa _ pi nga yug u ut _ aapghistet _ , _ taghneghagh k _ , _ megh _ , _ aakwh _ ; _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ itagnagh kete te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ugpeqe u kumteki _ yug t _ apeghkagh it _ whangkunnun _ , _ ipapestaaq _ ugpeqe aghagh yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ ighnegh mun _ ipa u uq _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qama _ ilu anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe nghite kunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe ste ngllagh lleqe a _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ ighnegh mineng _ ugpeqe nghite kanga _ .
una _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ighneghagh nite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ unguvallegh lgu uq _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh ma ite kunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvallegh nge llghite uq _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ategh aneng _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh i _ .
Nalluneqsukigataghput _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ nagate aqe ainkut _ aapnemteggu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh akun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
liisimake gkumteggu _ nagate llegh a _ sa meng _ alngunak _ aapte lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ tungsighkagh mnneng _ ellnga neng _ .
kitum _ esghagh kunigu _ ugpeqaalgutni _ seghleghqe lghii _ tuqumun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ yughagh te kete ligu _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ligu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ Akuzitkengngwaanka _ yug t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ tuqumun _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ka itneng _ . _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqumun _ ayuqe lghii mun _ . _ iwernga _ yughaatkesqengngunghitaqa _ tawaten _ seghleghqe lghii _ .
qamagte luni _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ . _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqumun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh a _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake u kanga _ enkaam _ tughneghagh m _ seghletun _ pi naanghite a _ .
liisimake ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ qaywa _ tughneghagh m _ igleghte te u ghngaagu _ qamagte luku _ nuna _ .
liisimakagh ut _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi luni _ liigike stekaqe ainkut _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh pig _ . _ kiyaghnegh pig mete ukut _ Ighneghanitutemnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ami _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh pig llu _ kenle ite ngughk llu _ unguvallegh _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ iqite nga lusi _ kiyaghnesighwaaghneng _ !
ukut _ lata t _ Elder-meng _ pi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ aghnagh mun _ , _ avaqutagh anun llu _ ipa pig meng _ piniqekagh mnun _ . _ Ellnginaanghitunga _ piniqistezi _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ liisimake lghiit _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ piniqe aisi _ ,
qayughllak _ ipapighqelleq _ ilu mnnite ngughk _ . _ taana _ ipapighqelleq _ ilumnnisaghqaaguq _ quunperugllag _ .
kayusillegh _ , _ nanglleg yug llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh llu _ whangkunnillequt _ kiyaghtengnguluta _ ipapighqelleghqunllu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ . _ taakut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-amengllu _ , _ ata m _ ighneghagh neng _ pi u ut _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ nagaqugh luki _ ila i _ avaqutagh ten _ kiyaghtengnguniluki _ ipapighqelleghqun _ tawateghpigaq _ ata m _ qelegh llegh atun _ whangkuta _ .
aghnagh mi _ , _ pi amken _ pinigh qutu te lta _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ qelghuusaq _ lata tke kegka _ elpenun _ ; _ qelegh sagh u uq _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ qaatke te llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelghuusaanun _ . _ Qelghuusaq _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ unanguuq _ : _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe te lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ puughte i sta _ nuna mi _ mingite luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ apegh naanghite aat _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe igate aat _ . _ Tawatelnguq _ yuug _ puughte i ste u uq llu _ , _ anguyag ke i lghii u uq llu _ Christ-ameng _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ , _ pegte yaqunaan _ qepghagh tekagh i _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh i _ qamagte luku _ allgeghsaghqaqaghsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaasghute kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ-am _ kiyaghnegh _ ellngan ite nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe manginagh kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ-am _ , _ a ta llu _ ighnegh llu _ ellnga nite uk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh yaghtugh kangisi _ atuqe gpenaki _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ aqelqagh ngllagh gpenaan _ nalighmeng _ quyake gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ quyake gkunigu _ qepghalgusiqallghuughlleqaa _ seghlegh meng _ qepghaqagh aneng _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ghngaaghma _ elpesi nun _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ . _ iwernga _ sunanguq _ laalighfike lamsi _ , _ aleghquute nayagh ukut _ gginasaghqugh te luta _ , _ enkaam _ quya te ghllag nayagh ukut _ .
avaqutagh ita _ nakmikegkagh m _ aakagh gpesi _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Elder-meng _ pi u ut _ Gaius-mun _ ipapik _ piniqekagh mnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ liisimake aqa _ unguva sigh gken _ itagnagh uq _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amken _ itagniisqelluten _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ yugunqegtesqellutenllu _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ ila ita _ ugpeqaalgutet _ kaate luteng _ ungipaate yatnga _ ataasiighmete llegh gpeneng _ ipapighqelleghmun _ , _ iiwleng _ elpesi nun _ atuqe u ni luku _ ipapighqelleq _ .
quya pigte aqe unga _ nagaqunemki _ avaqutagh ligh tke anka _ atuqe i u ni luki _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ . _ alla _ saam _ alngunak _ quya te igate aanga _ tawaten _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ pi niigh pigte uq _ ataasiighmete luten _ qepghagh llegh n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengake llegh gpegun _ ugpeqaalgutet _ talwa _ tamaakut _ nallukekagh ten _ .
maani _ yughaghvig mi _ apegh aqe aat _ piniqe llegh n _ . _ kayusiite aghte ki _ nagneghutesqelluki _ iglegha llegh it _ . _ kayusigh i llegh n _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luku
qayughllak _ iglegha u ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ . _ tugukligh i igate ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ kayusillegh meng
enkaam _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh yaghqaqe aput _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ qepghagh lgutke lleqe ainkut _ apeghtugh i u luteng _ ipapighqelleghmeng _ .
lata kaayagh unga _ ugpeqagh nun _ iwernga _ Diotrephes-em _ umiilguyugneghem _ waakigate ai _ liilightugh llegh nka _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa aqe ta a _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ainkut _ , _ iqlengiqe te kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ Tawatenginaq _ pi igate uq _ upugha sug igate ai _ ugpeqaalguteput _ kaate nghata _ . _ upugha te i yu lghiit _ ineghte aqe ai _ , _ upugha te i nghata llu _ eflequgh aqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te vig itneng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghletun _ pikayug stun _ pi gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ pinitun _ pikayug stun _ pi aqe i _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pikayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pikayug m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqagh m _ Demetrius _ pinigh na iqe aat _ yuug _ . _ Ipapighqelluni _ kiyaghtaallghan _ ipapighqutkestaa _ . _ taawa _ whangkuta llu _ tawaten _ piigh ut _ , _ liisima kasi _ akuzillegh put _ ipa u ut _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ esghagh laken _ enkaam _ aleghquute lleqe ukung _ gginasaghqugh te lutung _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Jude-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qepghaghtenganeng _ , _ James-em _ uyughagh aneng _ . _ lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ piniqe aisi _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-amllu _ aflenga kaqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ , _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ nula li _ elpesi ni _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ lata yu pigte aqe amsi _ yuguligh lleg mnneng _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh yamki _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ elpesinilnguut _ , _ apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ simigh aqa _ . _ liisima kasi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ai _ Apostle-etlu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ apeghtiisqelluta _ ugpeqe yaghqagh mnneng _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ allangughte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ellngit a _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata u unga _ qevuute lusi _ kipullginaaghesqelluki _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ . _ apeghtugh i ste gpenaki _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ .
qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maligte te aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate igate aisi _ sa meng _ apeghtugh yug aqe ni lusi _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tugukligh yug igate aat _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ taananginaghhaq _ Igleghutistevut _ , _ atanegh ut llu _ . _ enkaam _ allangughte aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ nanglegtaghllagtuq _ , _ seghevute i kayugu uq _ enkaam _ itagnagh uq _ seghleghqesagh ghngaamta _ sex-kun _ . _ " _ Qavngarugllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate kaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luku _ kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i lghii _ tawaten _ .
Ungipaatkaayaghngaaghpesi _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh aneng _ seghleghqestenun _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ allameng _ taakut _ uspute aqe luki _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ yugulikaqii _ Israel-eghmiit _ Egypt-eghmiineng _ , _ aghulaqe stekaqe ai _ Egypt-meng _ . _ iwernga _ kingu aneng _ taam _ ila i _ Israel-eghmiit _ ugpeqe i nanigh yata _ , _ qaatke te nanigh yata _ ellmi nun _ , _ tuqu stekaqe ai _ .
neqamike luki _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqekagh a _ nagnegh te ma nge i tke aat _ , _ unitekagh at llu _ ne eng _ qilag _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ asighqekagh i _ qiipraghute neng _ nekegnga yaghqagh neng _ quunperugllag _ , _ nekegte stekagh i _ mamleg ghllag kun _ . _ Tawantesnaqngwii _ kenlanga _ aghyuugh lleghqagh minun _ nanqigtivig m _ aghnegh ani _ .
neqamike luki _ Sodom-eghmiitlu _ Gomorrah-ghmiitlu _ , _ uvitangitnilnguutlu _ nuna t _ . _ yaquleg stun _ seghleghqe kau ut _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghleghqe llegh _ sex-kun _ pi ke aat _ , _ talwa _ yug t _ yug lgu tke te lghiit _ atuqe te aqe luteng _ , _ sa u aat llu _ seghleghataghaat _ atuqe kaqe ait _ . _ usputagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyugh i llegh aneng _ seghleghqestenun _ kenle ite ngugh qun _ kenegh kun _ .
Apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ tawatete ut _ . _ pi aqe ut _ qavangugh llghite a nguq _ seghleghqe ste aqe ait _ sex-kun _ , _ qaatke sigate ait llu _ yug t _ igleghutistet _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke ste aqe ait _ yaquleg t _ igleghutistet _ .
naqam _ michael _ , _ yaquleg t _ igleghutistengita _ ila at _ , _ tawaten _ pi llghite uq _ . _ tughneghaan- ke uk _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe yamegnegu _ Moses-em _ yugusigh a _ , _ Michael-em _ seghletun _ akuzi tke mangite a _ , _ anaggute ma ni luku llu _ pi llghite a _ . _ yeghlegi _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ aghyuughmigliten _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ sa u a _ alngunak _ liigikenghilkeseng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aat _ . _ sa u a _ ila a _ liigike aqe aat _ teghig ke sagh stun _ sumeghtaghiigalngughestun _ . _ teghig ke sagh t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pikayug u ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ pikayug u ut _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqestengughtaghaghaqut _ .
Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut _ ellngit _ ! _ Cain-etun _ pi u ut _ , _ tuqute kaqe a _ anglegute ni _ . _ allgegh teqaghte na luteng _ mani meng _ seghletun _ pi kau ut _ Balaam-em _ pillghatun _ . _ Korah-tun _ pi u ut _ , _ qaatkesunghitkaqegkangi _ igleghutistet _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe kaqe a _ ellnga _ , _ apeghtughistesighwaaghetlu _ naafqesaghqagh ke ai _ .
neqenghaghqe te yaghtugh negh gpesini _ , _ communion-emaghpesi _ , _ tamaakut llu _ apeghtughiste t _ pi aqe ut _ . _ yakugh nagh ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ katam _ tawaten _ uyghag ghllag _ megh m _ asi anite ngughk _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyagh nun _ . _ negh aqe ut _ qerngagh meng _ nenglaghqagh iqe te magh meng _ , _ akuzi magh meng _ nepug ghllag t _ kayngu yug gpenateng _ . _ ellnginagh meng _ negh aqe ut _ kinku t _ tuune gpenaki _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ qilawaagh stun _ eslallugilngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ anuqe m _ naghughuskangi _ qule akun _ nuna m _ megh i sag ghllag m _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ piitestingigalngughestun _ uqfig stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ unatagh vig mi _ . _ piite ste i igate ngugh t _ uqfig t _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ piitesiighaghtem _ nusug aqe ai _ paneghte na luki _ . _ enkaam _ maalghug gneng _ tuqukallghuughaqut _ .
kayngu nagh lghiit _ nangaghnegh it _ qagi ghllag stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ temngi _ puugllungllat _ . _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ qaprakayug stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ tawatelnguut _ ighaleqetaagh t _ nalluniigh te u yaghqaa nghite ut _ igleghanun _ . _ Tawateghpig-aq _ igleghte te yaghqaqe nghite aat _ kina _ alngunak _ apeghtughillesighwaalleghmegteggun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ pisaghtiighllagmeng _ nekaghqagh meng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
Enoch-nguq _ maaghraghvinleg ii tke kangat _ kingunghita _ Adam-em _ , _ ellnga n _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ esghagh tek _ , _ atanegh _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag ni _ kelqelluki _ ,
nanqigte na luki _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ . _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ seghleghqestet _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke i llegh it _ ellmi neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghleghqe ste ghllaget _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ quunpeng _ temngi _ akuzilgaghllaget _ , _ efqughutkigalkangit _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghleghqe sigh t _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ piniiyugnegh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe u ughtaghkagh it llu _ kinku t _ sa meng _ qiliigh vike nghmegteki _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ neqamike luki _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ apostle-ngita _ apeghkagh it _ sivugh nghaani _ .
ungipaate kaqe aisi _ whaten _ , _ " _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ nenglaghyugsaghtelguyaghqaaguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapighqellghaneng _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh i _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i yug aqe ut _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ maligte aqe ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ ava ite u te meggneng _ .
iwernga _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ wata _ iknaqughsaamanginaghteggu _ ugpeqagh u ma llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ apeghtuusagh itgun _ . _ yughagh aqe tek _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piniqellghanitekestaghtek _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ tuunesqellusi _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
nanglleg ke luki _ tamaakut _ malghukli nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapighqellghaneng _ .
Yuguliteki _ akuqaqallghuulghiistun _ kenghegneng _ . _ nanglleg ke aqe luki _ ila it llu _ iwernga _ piraamsingwaaghlusi _ luuraq _ seghleghqellghistun _ pi aqe yaaghte usi _ . _ ugumi ke luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ katam _ ugumi ke llegh gpesistun _ nukeggnaghqe ghllagkagh it _ aatkagh teng _ seghleghqengnguluteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelengake yaghqaqe aisi _ seghleghqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ seghleghqe llghite tesaghqagh ke aisi llu _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe usi _ nekeve gkufsi _ sivungagh kun _ nighughqellghan _ .
kiyaghnegh _ taananginaghhaaguq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ yugulikaqiinkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ ima _ tazimakerugllak _ , _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ kiyaghnegh _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ , _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe li _ . _ amen _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ igaqe nga ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagh i _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ai _ ellnga nun _ liigikestesqelluki _ qepghaghteni _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-am _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ qepghaghteminun _ John-mun _ tamaakut _ liisimakesqelluki _ .
taagken _ John-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ esghaghkagh ni llu _ nagatekagh ni llu _ . _ nagate kaqe ai _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ungipagh llu _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
quya stekau uq _ atightugh lghii _ iglagtu luni _ akuzi ta itneng _ uuknaliqe llegh m _ . _ quya stekau ut llu _ nagate luteng _ qaatke te lghiit _ qayughllak _ qantaghaqun _ tamaakut _ pi lleqe ut _ .
ukut _ lata t _ John-meng _ pi u ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughtukayuget _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ Asia-mi _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nite lik _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh neng _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-amengllu _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ . _ ( _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh t _ sivungagh nite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh an _ . _ ) _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ ataasiighmelnguuguq _ liisimake i sta _ ipapilleghmun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghsuwhaaqaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ igleghutistengat _ umiileg ita _ nuna m _ . _ ellnga u uq _ piniqe i lghii _ whangkunneng _ , _ aaw mikun llu _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ Ataneghpagulleghminitestiinkut _ , _ priest- ngughte ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh minun _ ata mun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ allgeghllikek _ nighughqelleqlu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu _ igleghutimun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
ii-i _ ! _ Jesus _ tagi aqe uq _ qilagwaagteggun _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ talwa _ tamaakut _ pana sqellug qu _ pi ke ai ta _ esghagh lleqe aat _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ellnga _ . _ aa-a _ , _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ ! _ amen _ .
" _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga llu _ Omega-nguungallu _ , _ " _ pi uq _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
John-nguunga _ , _ ugpeqaalgutkaghpesinga _ . _ ikfiqe unga _ elpesi stun _ qayughllak _ Jesus-em _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ pi ke ainkut _ . _ ellnga kun _ ikfiqe lleg put _ nuqetutaput _ . _ aglagh stekau unga _ qiighqagh mun _ ategh ke lghii _ Patmos-meng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh llu _ Jesus-meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Atanghem _ aghnegh ani _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ghhaanga _ . _ taagken _ tunutemnilluku _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtuqagh _ qalghightautetu te _ .
whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ esghaghkagh ten _ . _ taagken _ tuyugh naketen _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ : _ Ephesus-melnguut _ , _ Smyrna-melnguut _ , _ Perga-melnguut _ , _ Thyatira-melnguut _ , _ Sardis-melnguut _ , _ Philadelphia-melnguut _ , _ Laodicea-melnguutlu _ . _ "
taagken _ qiive unga _ esghagh na luku _ me _ aleghqughteka _ . _ qiive yalghiinga _ esghagh anka _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ gold-et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ .
taawa _ qukagh itni _ kina _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ akughtughllagegneng _ atkuyaagh ke uq _ , _ sakimag mikun llu _ tafsi nga uq _ gold-meng _ .
Naasqwallu _ nuyagh a llu _ qategh uk _ wool-estun _ nalighmeng _ anigu stun _ , _ iye kek llu _ kenghem _ kumangallghatun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
itegagh i _ qelmeghsaghkagh stun _ siilu stun _ ayuqe ut _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ kenegh kun _ . _ me a llu _ eftugh ghllag atun _ meghllag m _ tevugha llegh an _ ayuqe luni _ .
aghenqignegh mineng _ tugumiiqe ai _ maagraghvinlek _ ighaleqetaagh t _ , _ qaanghanengllu _ aane uq _ savigpag _ inglugtun _ gginagh kek _ ipegsaghkagh k _ . _ gginagh a _ nighug ghllag _ aghnegh m _ qukaa n _ siqinghuughtellghatun _ .
esghagh yamkun _ itegagh an _ manu akun _ ullegh aghte unga _ tuqukagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ aghenqignegh mineng _ iigge mineng _ saafte lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ .
unguva lghii u unga _ ! _ tuqu kaayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ ii-i _ , _ unguva u unga _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ key- lgu unga _ tuqu llegh mun llu _ Hades-munllu _ .
" _ sa aqe ziin _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ esghagh keten _ maaten _ , _ sa u aat llu _ kinguvaqun _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
esghagh aten _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ aghenqignegh ma _ iigganilnguut _ , _ maaghraghvinleg llu _ gold-et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ , _ taakut _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ salin _ qayvighte llghite ut _ . _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ yaquleg u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaghtekagh i _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh i _ taakunguut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yughaghvig t _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Ephesus-em _ . _ whanga u uq _ tugumiigh leg _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ igleghtengnguungallu _ akule itni _ maaghraghvinleg _ gold-et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh itni _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ ughleghiigh lghiisi _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh i llu _ . _ liisimake amsi llu _ tugukligh igate asi _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ apostle-ngunilghiit _ liite aqe asi _ esghapag luki _ temngingu ta i _ . _ taawa _ liite asi _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ .
meghnugh igate usi _ ikfiqe llegh gpesineng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ iilqayugigate usi llu _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh ka _ elpesi nun _ unanguuq _ , _ piniqnaniimaaghpesinga _ , _ ugpeqaalgutesillu _ sivugh nghaani _ piniqe llegh gpesistun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puygu gpenaan _ piniqe ghllag yaqefsinga _ , _ ugpeqaalgutesillu _ . _ Piniqnanighaghpesinga _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ . _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tek _ . _ piniqe nqigte kut _ piniqsugwhaalleghpesistun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lusi _ iqite lleqe aqa _ kenegh lghutagh gpesi _ tunemagh a _ ne aneng _ .
iwernga _ una _ pinitun _ pilqaghsi _ : _ ugumi ke asi _ pi aqe kangit _ Nicolaus-em _ maligsaaghtengita _ , _ katam _ whanga _ ugumi ke lleg mtun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ negh sqe lleqe anka _ piite stekagh aneng _ uqfig an _ unguvallegh m _ , _ tawanlenguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighaghvig ani _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Smyrna-m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ : _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ , _ tuqu lunga _ unguvagh kau unga _ .
liisimake anka _ seghleliigh lleg si _ , _ akluma u usi llu _ iwernga _ aklungite usi _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ ila ita _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ elpesi nun _ . _ Jews-nguniiqut _ , _ Jews-epigunghiteghngaaghmeng _ . _ yugu ut _ qerngughte te kayug t _ tughneghagh m _ synagogue-ngani _ .
alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe te kete naqe kesi _ . _ nagate tek _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ila si _ anusimingllagh ste naqe ai _ nanghiiqu na lusi _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe lleqe usi _ qula _ aghnegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ ataasiighmete tek _ , _ qaywa _ tuquyaghqaaghngaaghpesi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ , _ akileghtuusalilleqamsi _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tuqu llegh m _ aqnighte naanghite ai _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Pergamum-em _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ savigpag leg meng _ pi u uq _ inglugtun _ gginagh leg _ ipegsaghkagh meng _ .
liisimake amsi _ naantutsi _ , _ tawantusi _ tughneghagh m _ umiileg u te i vig an _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ whanga mnun _ ataasiighmete usi _ , _ ugpeqnanillghitaghpesingallu _ . _ tawatete kau usi _ talwa _ Antipas _ , _ ataasiighmelnguq _ ungipaghteke _ , _ kiyaghtengnguluku _ . _ tawani _ tughneghagh m _ kiyaghfig ani _ tuqute kaqe aat _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh nka _ elpesi nun _ ukunguut _ : _ taawa _ elpesi nite ut _ ila i _ qaatke te lghiit _ Balaam-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe a _ Balak _ naten _ seghleghqestesqelluki _ Israel-eghmiit _ . _ enkaam _ Balak-em _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ negh yagh ghngaita _ pisqelluki _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai llu _ itagnagh ni luku _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe lleghqagh _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ ila si _ qaatke te ut _ Nicolaus-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ .
Avuteghqellusi _ seghleghqennanightek _ ! _ pi nghite kufsi _ qantaghaqun _ taku lleqe amsi _ . _ taagken _ pilluwaghlleqanka _ tamaakut _ yug t _ savigpag meng _ qanemnilngughmeng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ ! _ manna- meng _ iigh nga lghii meng _ , _ manna-lilleqaqa _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ ellnga nun llu _ tuune lleqe aqa _ qategh lghii _ uyghag _ , _ ateghraghaghmeng _ igaqe vikekagh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nallukekagh a _ ategh _ iwerngaqun _ allgeghtikaghhiinaam _ uyghag meng _ liisimake a _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Thyatira-m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi u uq _ . _ iye kek _ kumaghugh u uk _ kenghestun _ , _ itegagh i _ qelmeghtutka ut _ siilu m _ qelmeghsalghatun _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ liisimake aqa _ piniqe llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe llegh i _ , _ qepghagh te i llegh i _ , _ nuqetutilleghsillu _ . _ liisimake anka _ tamaakut _ wata _ pi aqe asi _ sivugh nghaani _ pi aqe llegh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ ukunguut _ tengvimun _ ayuqekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ : _ Aghuliighnneghitaghsi _ aghnagh _ Jezebel _ apeghtugh i lghii _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ . _ uuknaliqe ste u na iqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ puughte aqe ai _ yug nka _ seghleghqesqelluki _ sex-kun _ , _ neghesqellukillu _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
Pilleghqalitkaqsaghaqa _ avuteghqe sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe yu nghite uq _ allaniigh nghmeng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ miluute naqe aqa _ qavaghvig mun _ tawani _ ikfiqe sqellug qu _ . _ maligte te luki _ ellnga nun _ miluute lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ gelgaghniilgutangi _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe anka _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe unga _ wetku qun _ avuteghkegkata _ seghletun _ pillghitneng _ .
tuqu lleqe anka llu _ avaquti a _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvignilnguut _ liite lleqe aatnga _ whanga u uq _ liisimake i lghii _ yug m _ tamaghaghhmi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng llu _ ilumike ke ii te neng llu _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe amsi _ tamaghaghpesi _ seghleghqetulegpesistun _ .
iwernga _ ila gpesi _ Thyatira-mi _ , _ maligte llghite asi _ Jezebel-em _ seghlegh t _ apeghtugh i llegh i _ . _ liite llghite asi llu _ tughneghagh m _ aksaqumtaagh ghllag i _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qelegh aghagh naanghite amsi _ ,
iwerngaqun _ ugpeqe manginagh teggu _ apeghtugh lleg si _ kenlanga _ uteghnigh lleg mnun _ .
ellnga _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ atuqe i lghii llu _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mneng _ kenle mun _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelilleqaqa _ igleghutesqelluki _ nation-et _ .
igleghte te sqe luki _ iron-meng _ rod-elighluki _ enkaam _ kagimnnakangit _ qiku meng _ qulmesiite ngllaghkagh stun _ .
tuune lleqe anka llu _ unaangum _ ighaleqetaagh aneng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Sardis-em _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi leg _ maaghragvinleklu _ ighaleqetaagh leg _ , _ pi uq _ , _ liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ yug t _ pi aqe aisi _ unguva ni lusi _ iwernga _ tuqu nga usi _ .
taghtugh lusi _ , _ iknaqughsaghteggu _ sa u a _ salin _ elpek si _ pi i _ tuqu naqe lghii _ . _ liite anka _ ukavantut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ pi sqe sug llegh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
neqamike luki _ apeghtugh tke aat _ elpesi nun _ , _ nagaqugh kasi llu _ . _ qaatke teki _ , _ avuteghqe tek llu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ taghtugh nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lleqe amsi _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ Nallukelleqaghsi _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
paninang _ qafsinggaagut _ yug t _ Sardis-mi _ aatkagh teng _ nukeggnaghqe llghite kangit _ . _ igleghte lgusigh lleqe aatnga _ aate luteng _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ qayughllak _ itagnagh lghii u ut _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ , _ ellngistun _ aate lleqe uq _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ . _ ategh a llu _ gheve snaanghite aqa _ kenle ite ngugh m _ unguvallegh m _ igagh aneng _ . _ ata ma llu _ yaquleg an llu _ sivu itni _ whanga mnun _ piknilleqaqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Philadelphia-m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ agleghnagh lghii meng _ , _ ipa pig meng _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga nite uq _ David-em _ key- nga _ . _ qelpeghtekunigu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg naanghite a _ . _ umeg kunigu llu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ qelpeghte naanghite a _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ liisimake amsi llu _ kayaate usi _ . _ naqamllu _ qaatke asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ , _ mesighagh igate usi llu _ whanga mnun _ maligsaaghteknilusi _ . _ ii-i _ , _ qelpegh te ma amsi _ amig meng _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ tamaakut _ qerngughte te lghiit _ tughneghagh m _ synagogue-ngani _ , _ Jews-nguniiqut _ . _ iwernga _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ ; _ Jews-ngunghitut _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi ste luki _ qungugh ste naqe anka _ sivu gpesigun _ . _ taagken _ liite lleqe aat _ piniqe kemsi _ .
qelqe aqe amsi _ nuqetesqellusi _ . _ qaatke kaqe te gpesineng _ qelegh i llegh ka _ paqniighsaghlleqamsi _ seghleliigh llegh neng _ kaate naqe lghii neng _ nunataghhanun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh t _ nanghiiqu lleqe ait _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ .
tagi yaghtugh unga _ . _ ayepsugite lusi _ ugpeqe manginagh tengnga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ wayanghitesqelluki _ qaghpa si _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ aghveghaqetagh ughte ste lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ma _ temple- nga ni _ , _ allameng llu _ aanaanghituq _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh ma _ , _ ategh a llu _ kiyaghnegh ma _ ne ghllag an _ , _ Jerusalem-eghraghaq _ , _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh mneng _ . _ ellnga kun llu _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh ragh aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Laodicea-m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ amen- meng _ pi u uq _ . _ Ataasiighmelnguuguq _ , _ ipapighqengngalghiinguuq _ liisimake i sta _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ : _ isekinagh nghite usi _ , _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh nghite usi _ . _ isekinagh lghiisi tuq _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh lghiisi tuq _ !
enkaam _ maqaghraaggaategpesineng _ , _ isekinanghilnguusi _ nalighmeng _ uguqnanghilnguusi _ , _ qesiite naqe amsi _ qanegh mneng _ !
pi aqe usi _ aklungite ni lusi _ , _ allgegh te ghllag aqe ni lusi _ , _ aklu igate ni lusi llu _ . _ iwernga _ nalluke usi _ seghleghwaaghuusi _ , _ nanglleg nagh usi _ , _ akluma usi _ , _ ayaa nga usi _ , _ amsikaghmete usi llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ aklungighisqellusi _ gold-tengyaghtughtek _ whanga mnun _ qigeghtengngwaaqameng _ kenegh kun _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ qatelghii neng _ aatkagh neng _ saapesqelluki _ kayngu nagh lghiit _ amsikaghmete lleg si _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ agha kaghqagh meng _ iye gpesinun _ esghaasagutesqellusi _ .
tamaakut _ piniqekagh nka _ nallghusagh aqe anka _ , _ aghyuugh aqe anka llu _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqnegh ughte tek _ , _ avuteghqellusi _ seghleghqennanightek _ .
ii-i _ ! _ nekeve lunga _ amig mi _ tenglugtugh unga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh kunigu _ me ka _ , _ amig meng _ qelpegh te ma kanganga _ itegh lleqe unga _ ellnga nun _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aqa _ , _ ellnga n llu _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aanga _ .
kayaalqe i i lunga _ enkaam _ aqumga unga _ saaghw ani _ ata ma _ umiileg u sigh akun _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ aqume ste lleqe aqa _ saaghw mkun _ umiilgusignekun _ aqumutagh mkun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ "
taagken _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ amigh k _ qelpalnguq _ ! _ me _ nagate kaqe a _ qalghightautetu te _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ mayugh a _ whavek _ . _ elpenun _ esghagh ste naqe anka _ sa u aat _ pi yaghqagh t _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ taghneghagh gnite unga _ . _ taawa _ qilag mi _ esgaghagka _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh k _ , _ kina _ aqumga uq _ .
aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gni _ esghaqaaluni _ iqeghta gketun _ jasper-enkuk _ carnelian-enkuk _ ayuqe uq _ . _ Uvitangani _ umiileg u sigh m _ taawa _ aglu k _ iqeghta kek _ emerald-etun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
Uvitangani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh lghute t _ . _ Taakutgun _ aqumga te nga ut _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ elder-et _ qatelghii meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ , _ gold-mengllu _ qaghpa lug teng _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkeneng _ kallug m _ nighwaagpagtagh u i _ , _ leveklugti a _ , _ tengngaagti a llu _ pi ut _ . _ sivu gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ torch-et _ kumangalghiit _ , _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ taghneghagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ sivu gkeni _ taawa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ qergese _ , _ meghraakeghtaq _ crystal-estun _ . _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ uvitangani _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ sani gkeni _ , _ taawa _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ iye ghllag u ut _ saye megteggun llu _ aqsagemegteggunllu _ .
sivuligh _ unguva lghii _ lion-esugniteftuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ ox-esugniteftuq _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ sa u a _ unguva lghii _ gginagh lgu uq _ yug m _ gginagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ tengaa kayug tun _ qawaagpag tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ tamaghhagh meng _ aghvinleg neng _ yaquleg utu te ut _ , _ elngaatall _ yugusigh at _ iye ghllag u ut _ talwa _ qamavek _ yaqghwita _ asi itnun _ . _ aghneghtugh ma n _ unugtugh magh an _ taaqe igate ngugh t _ ilagagh nghmeng _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ Atanghuuq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ ! _ "
taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ ilagagh ut _ ilagaate itneng _ usuqe i llegh m _ , _ quulvaghillghem _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh m _ aqumga lghii mun _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh ghllag gni _ , _ kiyaghte lghii mun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi nghata
yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ elder-et _ niinghute aqe ut _ sivungagh kun _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenun _ , _ manigugh aqe aat _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ taakut _ elder-et _ qaghpa teng _ mat- aghte luki _ lli aqe ait _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenka _ , _ enkaam _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ,
" _ whangkuta _ atanegh ut _ kiyaghnegh ut _ ! _ elpek _ tugu pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ usuqe llegh ghllag t _ , _ quulvalleghllaget _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag t _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghpenun _ . _ ulima kaqe te gpeneng _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ , _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ enkaam _ allgegh u lleqe ut llu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ iimgat _ igagh t _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh nite luki _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ taakut _ iimgat _ igagh t _ igagh vike kau ut _ inglugtun _ , _ umeg luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ seal-eneng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ yaquleg _ . _ iglagtu luni _ aapte i lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ seal-ellghet _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ ? _ "
taawa _ avangite uq _ kitumeng _ alngunak _ qilag mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna m _ asi ani _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
enkaam _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag unga _ qayughllak _ naalke nghite kangat _ kina _ alngunak _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ elder-eneng _ pi unga _ , _ " _ qiya gpenang _ ! _ ii-i _ , _ lion-a _ . _ Judah-m _ ramke aneng _ pi u uq _ , _ David-emllu _ kingunegh ke a _ . _ kayaalqe i i ste u uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ itagnagh uq _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ seal-ellghet _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ saaghw ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ . _ Qukiitniteftuq _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ elder-etlu _ . _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ esghaqaaluni _ nikimqun _ tuqu tke aq _ . _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg neng llu _ iye lgu uq _ . _ taakut _ iye t _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh ke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayagtekagh i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ .
Penniighaghaam _ taku luku _ umu i llgu sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh neng _ tuwii _ iimgat _ igagh t _ .
tugu yaki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ , _ taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ yuginagh llu _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ elder-et _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ Penniighaghaam _ . _ Tamaghaghmeng _ tugumiiqe luteng _ harp- meng _ , _ gold-mengllu _ sagnegh ghhagh neng _ esleqnga lghiit _ incense-meng _ . _ Incense-et _ yughaghkagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ .
ilagagh ut _ nutaghagh meng _ ilagaate meng _ whaten _ : _ " _ itagnagh uten _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ iimgat _ igagh t _ , _ ikugh yaghqaa luki llu _ seal-ngit _ . _ tuqute kau lghiiten _ , _ aawpenengllu _ tukfigh kaqe aten _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellngit _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ ramke neng _ , _ ulu neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ nunatagh aneng llu _ .
enkaam _ Ataneghpagullghanitestaten _ , _ priest- ngughte ta ten llu _ kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ umiileg stun llu _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ nuna mi _ . _ "
esghapag ma lunga _ nagaqugh anka _ me it _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ kestepagningilnguut _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ uvitangani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ elder-etlu _ .
iglagtu luteng _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ tuqu tke aq _ , _ itagnagh uq _ allgeghsaghqagh u luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleq _ , _ aklungi _ , _ peghqinellegh _ , _ iknaqe llegh _ , _ quulvalleq _ , _ nighughqelleq _ , _ usuqe llegh llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ tamaghhagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ qilagmelnguut _ , _ nunamelnguut _ , _ nuna m _ asinganilnguut _ , _ kelliinilnguutlu _ . _ qamagte luteng _ pi lghiit _ aqumga lghii mun llu _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ , _ Penniighaghaghmunllu _ , _ " _ usuqe i lleg nge tek _ , _ quulvallengitek _ , _ nighughqellengitek _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguteklu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ , _ " _ elder-etlu _ sekete uute luteng _ nuna mnun _ , _ manigugh agket _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ , _ Penniighaghaankuk _ .
taagken _ esghapag aqa _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghtekanga _ sivuligh _ seal-elleq _ taakuneng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seal-elleghneng _ . _ Tawanteftut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ ataasigh _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ me a _ kallug stun _ tengngaalghii _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ ughluvegh lgu uq _ , _ qaghpa lightu aat llu _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kayaalqe i ikagh _ anguyag mineng _ , _ enkaam _ aane uq _ kayaalqe i i manginagh na luni _ .
Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ seal-ellghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
ila a _ kuuni m _ aane uq _ , _ kavilngugh u uq _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ pi lleghqagh lightu aat _ yug t _ nekeggmetunnaniitesqelluki _ tuququutesqelluki _ . _ tuunekagh at llu _ savigpag ghrugllag meng _ .
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ pi nga yiite anga _ seal-ellghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ pingayut ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ esghagh aqa _ tagnegh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ apegh kau sigh lgu uq _ iigge mini _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me stun _ ayuqesugnilnguq _ akule itni _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Quart-em _ imagh a _ wheat-a _ akike a _ ataasigh m _ denarius-em _ . _ pi nga yu t _ quart-em _ imigh a _ barley-t _ akike ai _ ataasigh m _ denarius-em _ . _ iwernga _ naafqe gpenakek _ olive-em _ mesiigh a _ , _ wine- a llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ estamat ii ta a _ seal-ellghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
esghagh aqa _ aghsaallaak _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste yan _ ategh ke a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ Hades-em _ maligte a _ . _ Pilleghqalitkaaftuk _ tuquqiisqelluki _ estamaghqellghan _ nuna m _ yug i _ savigpag kun _ , _ paneghaatelleghqun _ , _ aqnighnegh kun _ , _ ugwighsalghiitgunllu _ teghig ke sagh itgun _ nuna m _ .
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ tallimat ii ta a _ seal-ellghem _ , _ esghagh anka _ asi anite luki _ aghqefig m _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu quqagh t _ . _ tuqute kaqe kangit _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kaqe kangit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh qu ma inagh ke ait llu _ .
akilghuu ghllag ut _ , _ " _ kaay _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ atanegh _ , _ agleghnagh uten llu _ , _ ipa pigu uten llu _ ! _ tamaakut _ nuna m _ yug i _ tuqu quqagh t _ whangkunneng _ , _ naten _ tagkaan _ utaqa i uute naqe ziki _ nanqigte yaghqaa luki llu _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki llu _ ? _ "
taagken _ ataasikaghtiita _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu tke aat _ qatelghii meng _ atkuyaalitkiit _ , _ meghnaali aghte sqekagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgutngit _ , _ Christ-amllu _ qepghaghtengi _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ ellngit a _ tuqutellghistun _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali naqe ut _ kenlanga _ uglaghtalngit _ naamigtekata _ tamaakut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ .
esghapag aqa _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ aghvinleg ii ta a _ seal-ellghem _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ siqinegh _ tagnegh a _ suvinagh lghii tun _ qiipaghagh tun _ ulimakagh tun _ goat-em _ melqwaneng _ . _ Tanqiqllu _ esleqnga lghii _ aaw stun _ lliigh uq _ .
ighaleqetaagh t _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ nuna mun _ katam _ tawaten _ qigumangilnguut _ figs-et _ ifkagh qu uute lghiit _ uqfig meng _ anuqe ghllag m _ ufsug te llegh atun _ .
qilag a _ aviighute uq _ iimgat _ igagh t _ imellghistun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ naayghagh t llu _ qiighqagh t llu _ nuugh qugh te ut _ ne meggneng _ .
taagken _ nuna m _ umiileg i _ , _ igleghutistengi _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg it _ , _ aklungilnguut _ , _ qiilngumighte i kayug t _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu _ iigh uute ut _ qaye ni _ , _ akule itni llu _ uyghag t _ naayghagh ni _ .
naayghagh nun llu _ uyghag nun llu _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ ullegh vike kut _ iighesqelluta _ gginagh aneng _ aqumga lghii m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ , _ sakraa llegh ghllag aneng llu _ Penniighaghaam _ !
kaa tuq _ aghneq _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh ghllag ak _ whangkunnun _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ anag lleqe agu _ ! _ "
tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ esghagh anka _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ estamat ni _ kangighagh itni _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ nuqneqeftiit _ estamat _ anuqe t _ anuqligh nghite sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ nalighmeng _ kellii ni _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig ni _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ mayugh lghii _ asivaghmeng _ tugumiigh leg _ nalluniigh ta aneng _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ yaquleg m _ akilghuugii _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng _ naafqe sqellug qu _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a llu _ .
yaquleg m _ pi a _ , _ " _ naafqe gpenaan _ nuna _ nalighmeng _ kellaag igh a _ nalighmeng _ uqfig t _ ! _ utaqa itek _ kenlanga _ seal-ellemnnun _ qagugh itgun _ qepghaghtengi _ kiyaghnegh mta _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ qafsig nge ta i _ yug t _ seal-elaghtuqiit _ qagugh itgun _ . _ yug t _ uglaghtala it _ 144,000-nguftut _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ramke aneng _ Israel-em _ .
Judah-m _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Reuben-em _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Gad-em _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ ,
Asher-em _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Naphtali-m _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Manasseh-m _ ramke aneng _ 12,000-nguftut _ ,
Simeon-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Levi-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Issachar-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ ,
Zebulun-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Joseph-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ , _ Benjamin-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 12,000-nguftut _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh anka _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kitum _ alngunak _ kestepagningilkangi _ ! _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ nunatagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ ulu neng llu _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ Penniighaghaamllu _ sivu gkenkun _ . _ qiipaghagh u uute luteng _ qatelghii neng _ , _ tugumiigh iigh luteng llu _ palm-em _ uqfig an _ avayagh itneng _ .
akilghuu te ghllag ut _ , _ " _ yuguligh llegh _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ Penniighaghaamllu _ ! _ "
qamagte luteng _ yaquleg t _ nekeve uute ut _ uvitangitni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ elder-etlu _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ . _ taagken _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tamaghhagh mi _ usuqe ligu _ , _ nighughqelligu _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike ligu _ , _ quulvaghligu _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ peghqinellegh leg _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelek _ , _ iknaqe lleg leg llu _ . _ ellnga _ tawatete uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ ! _ "
taagken _ ataasigh m _ elder-eneng _ aapte aanga _ , _ " _ kinkungaawa t _ qatelghii meng _ qiipaghaghngalghiit _ , _ naken llu _ pi u aat _ ? _ "
